710280207.content: (Sigh) But no talking-to has made Zenkibo change her ways so far. How did you get Leviathan to listen to you?

710280208.content: I... don't know, either. But she always... called me Master.

710280209.content: "Master"? Hmm... That's it! I'll make Zenkibo call me that too!!!

710280210.content: I... don't think that's a good idea.

710280211.content: I see Zenkibo. I'm off, then!

710280302.content: You should get out of the lab sometimes. You know, for your health.

710280304.content: Don't be so stubborn. People say that "Tin Man Vs. Jackfruit" is a really good movie.

710280305.content: Hey, what do you think you're doing...? Let go of me!!!

710280306.content: As Thor's arm is stronger than the resistance Ookuninushi puts up, the two eventually make it to the movie theater.

710280307.content: ... The design of that prop completely defies the principles of aerodynamics.

710280308.content: Come on, this is just a movie. Don't analyze everything.

710280309.content: But... it just might work, actually.

710280310.content: Thor, come with me to the lab later. I need your power for some experiments.

710270101.content: One day at the battle simulation room.

710270102.content: I did quite nicely at training today. Woohoo!

710270103.content: Suddenly, a dark gray figure approaches from the darkness. On closer inspection, it turns out that it's Fenrir.

710270104.content: Oh! Fenrir! What are you doing here?

710270105.content: If Fenrir is here, it means Master is somewhere around here too!

710270106.content: Leviathan looks around excitedly with that little head of hers, and finally comes upon a rather familiar-looking figure leaning against a tree.

710270107.content: Why are Master's eyes closed, though? She isn't someone who'd fall asleep here...

710270108.content: No, don't tell me something's wrong with Master's chip again?!

710270110.content: Vidar has barely opened her eyes in response when she feels a tight hug from presumably what is a charging baby killer whale.

710270111.content: (Whimpers) Oh, thank goodness, your body is still cool, Master... I thought you passed out or something.

710270113.content: But why are you here, Master? It's so sunny out here. Are you sure you're feeling alright?

710270114.content: The sun is just a projection, Leviathan. Don't worry.

710270115.content: I made a four o' clock booking for the battle simulation room. I didn't realize you'd be here too.

710270116.content: Four o' clock? But I think I—— Ah!

710270117.content: As if she's just thought of something, Leviathan pulls up her terminal. The time on her calendar appointment reads 14:00.

710270118.content: Oh, I'm so sorry, Master... I made a mistake... my booking was for two o' clock...

710270119.content: Had I known you were coming, I wouldn't have wasted your time like that.

710270120.content: I wanted to look at how you did at training anyway. Overall, that was a pretty good job.

710270121.content: I closed my eyes just a few moments ago to think about how next to proceed with your training. Let's use the room together for the rest of the time slot.

710270201.content: Leviathan, I can't finish this twin popsicle by myself. Do you want half of it?

710270202.content: Zenkibo breaks the twin popsicle into half and hands a piece to Leviathan. However, Leviathan doesn't reach for it immediately but eyes it skeptically instead.

710270203.content: Did you... put wasabi in the popsicle or something?

710270204.content: You're an idiot, Leviathan. Why would there be wasabi in the popsicle?!

710270205.content: Besides, I never play the same prank twice. That's just unprofessional.

710270206.content: Still skeptical, Leviathan takes the popsicle and starts examining it carefully.

710270207.content: It doesn't look like it was cut apart and put together again... and neither does it smell funny...

710270208.content: Could it really be that Zenkibo wanted to share this with me?

710270209.content: Hurry up. You don't want the popsicle to melt.

710270210.content: Zenkibo then starts on her half of the popsicle.

710270212.content: As soon as Leviathan sticks out her tongue to lick the popsicle, the tip of her tongue is firmly stuck to the treat.

710270214.content: Ahahahahaha! This is an ultra-low-temp popsicle that sticks to your tongue, specially designed for Leviathan, you fool!

710270215.content: Aaaaand that's another successful prank brought to you by Zenkibo, folks!

710270217.content: Zenkibo quickly disappears from Leviathan's sight, and returns to her room after a while.

710270218.content: Leviathan is hilarious. I wonder how I should prank her the next time?

710270219.content: Zenkibo is still pondering the question as she picks up her game device.

710270220.content: But we're done for the day with pranks. Let me play a game or two for some new inspo.

710270221.content: Huh? Why can't I get it to open up? What is this... a piece of paper?

710270222.content: Zenkibo removes the black sheet of paper that's taped to her device screen, and a massive Leviathan projection suddenly pops up.

710270224.content: Ha ha ha! I scared you, didn't I? I knew you'd wanna play games when you get back to your room. This is a prank specially designed for the meanie Zenkibo!

710270225.content: And that's a draw now! You won't get the better of me again, Zenkibo!

710270301.content: What do I do now, Poseidon? The school wants to bring us on a trip to the aquarium next week.

710270302.content: I've heard that there are these terrifying penguins at the polar exhibit in the aquarium!

710270304.content: Poseidon looks at the little killer whale in front of her with a smile. The little girl's cheeks are all puffed up, and she can't help but poke her in the cheek.

710270305.content: Leviathan. Penguins may look a little standoffish, but they're actually very honest and sweet creatures.

710270306.content: They come to you because they're curious. They won't harm you.

710270307.content: No, that's not true. Back when I was at the pole, those penguins rushed over to bite me as soon as they saw me.

710270308.content: And no matter where I hid, they just kept finding me.

710270309.content: The penguins at the pole may have inadvertently hurt you while looking for food, Leviathan. But the penguins at the aquarium are fed by keepers and won't hurt you.

710270310.content: No, no, no! I know it's not because of food! It's because penguins are meanies!

710270312.content: It's true! They were all so mean to me!

710270313.content: I don't think so, though. How about we go to the aquarium together? Then you can show me, Leviathan.

710270314.content: Hmph! Fine, I'll go. If the penguins come at us, though... I... I'll protect you with my anchor, Poseidon.

710270315.content: Soon after, Poseidon and Leviathan approach the polar exhibit at the aquarium.

710270316.content: Hmm, I'm not sure I can do this...

710270317.content: No need to be afraid, Leviathan. Look, aren't you already inside the aquarium now? You're even standing right in front of the polar exhibit! You're a big, brave girl!

710270319.content: Besides, look: the penguins aren't coming at us. They might even be afraid of you, Leviathan.

710270320.content: Which means: I've beaten the meanie penguins!

710270401.content: Leviathan, this is a Shashvat specialty, ice cream rolls. Choose a flavor, it's my treat.

710270402.content: Thank you, Kali! I'll take this red one, it looks yummy.

710270404.content: ARGH! It's spicy!!! How can ice cream be spicy?!!!

710270405.content: That one may be a little too much for kids. It's flavored with a chili pepper native to Shashvat.

710270406.content: I've some water here. I can take care of the rest of it.

710270407.content: There's just a little bit of the ice cream left. I can finish it.

710270408.content: You sure don't like to waste your food, Leviathan.

710270409.content: I used to live at the pole where there's nothing to eat. I learned from Master that food is a very precious thing and we mustn't waste it.

710270410.content: That must have been hard on you, living at the pole like that...

710270411.content: Hello! Give me another ten of that Devil's Ice Cream, please!

710270413.content: I'm buying us ice cream for the next few days. For practice.

710270414.content: Being able to take spicy food is a sign that you've grown up. So, Leviathan, let's start you off little by little with this!

710270501.content: Leviathan! Mop up the monsters coming up on the deck on starboard!

710270502.content: I hear you! HI... YAH... Monster cleanup complete. Awaiting new instructions from Captain Skadi!

710270504.content: The duo's vision begin to sway soon after.

710270505.content: Watch out!!! The big one's coming up from the bottom of the sea now! Leviathan, I'll leave the deck to you!

710270506.content: Oh my gosh, there are so many of them! Can I really deal with all of them....?

710270509.content: Skadi and Leviathan work together very smoothly, and soon the message "Stage Complete" appears on the screen in front of them.

710270511.content: See? I said you could do it, Leviathan. You're my worthy sailor indeed.

710270512.content: Did I manage to help you in any way, captain?

710270513.content: You were a huge help! I wouldn't be surprised if you were to become a captain yourself one day.

710270514.content: A captain... do you really think I can do that?

710270515.content: You can be the captain in the next game. I'll be your crew.

710270516.content: Like I said, trust my judgment!

711390101.content: Inside the Division Nine lobby. Hera is sauntering coolly and unhurriedly around the place.

711390103.content: Oh, hello! Is there something you need from me?

711390104.content: Are you Lady Hera of the Society of Muses?

711390105.content: Yes. Oh... You're Poseidon. It's been a while since we last met.

711390106.content: I didn't think you'd remember me, Lady Hera. Yes, it's been a while.

711390107.content: Are you lost? I can walk you to the reception area upstairs if you like.

711390108.content: (Clears throat) I'm not lost at all. I just wanted to take a walk around here, that's all...

711390109.content: Poseidon is taken aback for a moment. Then, she nods to indicate understanding.

711390110.content: Alright, then. If and when you get tired from your walk, the reception is upstairs. You'd want the third door to your left. That's assuming that you'll be using the elevator behind us, or it'd be on the right side instead of the left...

711390111.content: Um... I'm feeling rather tired all of a sudden...

711390112.content: Then allow me to walk you there...

711390113.content: Thank you. That is much appreciated.

711390114.content: The layout of this building is rather involved, I must say...

710390101.content: Heh heh, the "Zenki's Special Dolphin Plushie Confetti Bomb" is now complete! Now, on to where Poseidon stores her plushies...

710390104.content: That doesn't sound like "nothing" at all. Are you up to some kind of prank again...?

710390105.content: No! Actually, I was hoping to get in some counselling time with you.

710390106.content: I see. I sure didn't see that coming... Well, come with me.

710390108.content: (Just how much longer do I have to listen to Poseidon...?)

710390109.content: (Oh no, I totally forgot to configure the timer I placed in the plushie! Which means its default countdown duration is...)

710390111.content: "One hour"? What about it? Hmm, I see that we've been at this for a while. I shan't keep you any longer, Zenki.

710390112.content: I hope you're feeling better now though?

710390113.content: Y-yeah, yeah! I feel so much better now!

710390114.content: Here's a small plushie for you... I think I already gave you one before, but you can have another one now.

710390115.content: Then... do you think I could trade the one I took with me the last time for another one? I think I'd prefer something else.

710390117.content: Zenkibo quickly reaches for the plushie that's been sitting in her pocket. However, she's already too late.

710390120.content: Zenki, there's confetti all over your face.

710390201.content: Ver, is something bothering you today?

710390205.content: No, it's nothing, Poseidon. You don't have to worry about me.

710390206.content: But what is it that I'm hearing right now...? Is that your stomach growling?

710390207.content: I wonder what I should have for dinner... Hmm, I still have a second 50% discount voucher for the restaurant just downstairs...

710390208.content: Are you talking about that restaurant that just opened not too long ago? I've been wanting to try their food! But it looks like a rather pricey joint...

710390209.content: Let me get this. Would that make you feel better?

710390210.content: Wow, thanks a bunch, Poseidon! I sure am feeling loads better... Guess I couldn't fool you after all.

710390211.content: Good food always raises the spirits.

711390201.content: Poseidon. Would you teach me how to grow up to be a person like you?

711390202.content: To be a person like me? What do you mean exactly?

711390203.content: Hmm, I'm not sure not to put it... What I mean is a person who is very gentle, who can make people feel better with their words, and whose lap is super duper comfy...

711390204.content: Uh, I'm not sure I'm describing it right. Anyway, what I mean is, I want to grow up to be a super nice person like you!

711390206.content: I don't know what's going on with me... I can't quite figure out how to answer your question.

711390207.content: I think it must be because of the sea? I've loved the sea since I was a child, and I want to become someone who's just like the sea.

711390208.content: Someone just like the sea... what do you mean?

711390209.content: Someone gentle and who embraces everything... Something like that.

711390210.content: Is that how you see the sea, Poseidon? But to me, I just think that... the sea is full of tasty fish.

711390211.content: Ha ha! It's a matter of individual perspective. Oh by the way, I'm thinking of going for a walk along the beach. Do you want to come with me, Leviathan?

710390303.content: (Sighs) So, that means you've been keeping yourself going by drinking coffee all this time, Shu...

710390304.content: Tell you what, I'll take care of this business. You should go take a long nap, Shu...

710390305.content: I'll start with this file. I still remember what to do with it...

710390306.content: Three hours later, Shu, who's been sleeping on the couch, sits up with a start after some rubbing of her eyes.

710390307.content: What? I've been lying here all this time?!

710390308.content: What time is it now...? Oh, good, good. How did I fall asleep here? I have to get to the Cryptics' budget proposal now, it has to be reviewed by today——

710390309.content: Hmm? Poseidon? What are you doing here?

710390310.content: Oh, you're awake now. You're done with your tasks for today.

710390312.content: I've cleared there for you. You know, I'm quite capable of handling these simple files.

710390313.content: ... I should check them again just in case.

710390314.content: Why did I fall asleep even after all that coffee?

710390315.content: Sorry, Shu, but I switched out your usual coffee for decaf. I just wanted you to have a good rest...

710390316.content: Oh, no, I'm not mad at you or anything.

710390317.content: In fact... I ended up with a good dream. Thank you.

710390319.content: But I should look through the files one more time anyway.

710390320.content: Subsequently, it's proven that Poseidon is indeed more than capable of handling those tasks, and that day turned out to be one of the most restful days in a month for Shu.

711190101.content: I didn't think I'd run into you at a place like this.

711190102.content: I do like my late-night snacks.

711190103.content: That's true. So how do you find the grub at this place?

711190104.content: The chef can be a little heavy-handed with the seasonings, I find.

711190105.content: But from the look on your face, I don't think what you just said is how you really feel about the place.

711190106.content: Well, after a long day of work, it's nice to indulge in something that's not so healthy.

711190107.content: What's with this health consciousness of yours? I mean, you're a Modifier anyway.

711190108.content: Come, I'll get the drinks. Tea or coffee for you?

711190110.content: Mmhmm... I'll get the tea then.

711190111.content: If only you were this easygoing at work. It'd be so much easier for us to work together then.

711190112.content: I'll have to respectfully pass on that.

711190201.content: Hmm? What are you looking at, Shu?

711190202.content: Now that the rookies have passed their assessment, I'm getting a gift for them to celebrate the occasion.

711190203.content: You're getting a gift for them? Let me help you! I'm really good at that!

711190204.content: For example... How about this? It's the latest portable gaming device on the market!

711190205.content: ... I feel that this is something you or Zenki would appreciate more.

711190206.content: Nah! This is a gift anyone can appreciate!

711190207.content: Besides, think about it: playing games together can help build camaraderie!

711190208.content: You do have a point there.

711190303.content: I... don't quite understand what this part of the combat manual is saying..

711190304.content: What do they mean by... "one should also swiftly retreat when advancing," and "make sure to turn during an attack"...?

711190305.content: Hmm? I don't recall the manual saying that... Let me take a look...

711190306.content: Ver, where did you get this manual from?

711190307.content: I couldn't find my copy, and so I borrowed Zenki's...

711190309.content: Looks like someone's going to detention again.

711190311.content: Anyway, you can ignore that. I'll get you another copy.

710190101.content: Could I trouble you to come organize all this stuff with me?

710190102.content: It's no trouble at all. These old items are actually rather interesting to look at.

710190103.content: Why is there a baseball bat here?

710190104.content: If I remember correctly... Odin wanted to play baseball out of the blue.

710190105.content: Ah... I remember it now! We played for an entire afternoon and I ended up walking away still not really getting the rules of the game...

710190106.content: After all, it's not really a baseball match if there are only three people playing.

710190107.content: We really had so much fun then...

710190109.content: How about we play again? We can get everyone at Aether Gazer to join us.

710190110.content: A match for all of us at Division Nine, huh...

710190111.content: That's right. I bet it's going to create quite the buzz!

710190201.content: Have you taken a look at my budget proposal for this month?

710190202.content: Yeah I did. But I'm still not sure about why there's a request for a budget increase?

710190205.content: It's for Version Two of the BunBun Handgun.

710190206.content: Version Two of the BunBun Handgun? That sounds like a great idea. But I'll need the design drawing for it at least to make a proper assessment.

710190208.content: Are you sure that's a BunBun Handgun...?

710190210.content: I mean... it looks more like a "Gatling Hairdryer" to me...

710190212.content: Did you really think you could hoodwink me with this? Request denied.

900000001.content: July 30, 2310, 12:45. Omorfies, the Society of Muses.

900000002.content: You must have had that Access Key for quite a while, haven't you, Lady Hera?

900000003.content: Ever since I awakened. But for some reason, I've never been able to summon its powers.

900000004.content: That shouldn't be too much of a problem. It can happen with any change in your body's data. Awakening the Access Key is a simple matter of recalibration.

900000005.content: This is a resonance stabilizer developed by the Cryptics. It stabilizes the resonance frequency of a specific Access Key to a configured range.

900000006.content: Okay... Yup... and... that's it. It's been recalibrated!

900000007.content: Sorry for making you come all this way just for recalibration.

900000008.content: No problem. That's the thing we do—help others with their Access Keys, no matter if they are Aether Gazer Modifiers or not.

900000009.content: Not to mention that the extra data we get helps a lot with future research.

900000010.content: I'll have Mintha and Leuce prepare tea and snacks. Please make yourself at home. Take a rest.

900000013.content: Tomorrow is the opening day of the grand ceremony. I just want to confirm where it will be held.

900000014.content: Oh? I thought you were accompanying me to the racetrack.

900000015.content: The main purpose of our visit is to represent Aether Gazer at the 19th Ardisis Ceremony. Everything we do should be in the service of that goal.

900000016.content: That's not exactly what Ookuninushi told me. I interpreted this visit as a vacation.

900000017.content: It's not a problem. Have a rest, and then we'll set out.

900000018.content: Well then, why don't we leave now?

900101003.content: There, there, Goldtop. It's okay. It's safe here—very safe for you to train.

900101004.content: Goldtop? Is that the horse you're after?

900101005.content: Yes! My beloved darling! I raised her from a foal.

900101006.content: I thought you said she was a racehorse. What is she doing in the ceremony square?

900101007.content: The Knights of Convallaria don't have enough horses for the ceremony, so they've started recruiting racehorses.

900101009.content: It's been a while, Lady Hera. Who are your guests?

900101010.content: Reverse-forcefield titanium alloy armor.... Oh, apologies. It's my first time seeing actual Convallaria armor in the flesh. Greetings, I'm Heimdall. Pleased to see you.

900101011.content: I am Shu, Aether Gazer's representative. The Society of Muses invited Heimdall and me to tomorrow's Ardisis Ceremony.

900101012.content: Aether Gazer? Ah, I've heard of you. I believe I have you to thank for watching my foolish brother.

900101014.content: I heard your new commander sent you off to Crete—a deserted island. I thought you'd already left.

900101015.content: Oh no. I consider it a great honor being appointed commander of the Knights of the Lighthouse. And I don't mind the solitude. It's peaceful, and... it beats having to watch my tongue in meetings with the Council.

900101016.content: Athena thought it best that I attend the opening ceremony before heading out. It's a rare opportunity for a Knight of the Lighthouse.

900101017.content: I was hoping to mail some quality black tea I found, but this is even better. It saves me from having to trouble Iris.

900101019.content: Oh? Not especially. Just typical courtesy.

900101020.content: Speaking of courtesy, I was hoping to pick up some local handiwork to give to Poseidon.

900101021.content: Then we should check out the Old Lantern Path. They'll have plenty of interesting souvenir shops. I'll get to buy some things before I leave.

900101022.content: The Old Lantern Path? I remember something about a musical theater there...

900101023.content: I'm glad to hear that your interests extend beyond horse races and research. Would you like to go?

900101024.content: No harm in that. After all, you never know what will come in handy for research.

900101025.content: The theater manager is an old friend of mine. I'm sure he'll give us free tickets if he sees me with you. Want to come along, Lady Hera?

900101026.content: You should know that I regard this lot as little more than eccentric playwrights and traveling minstrels. But insofar as the visit relates to the society's honored guests... I might deign to attend.

900102002.content: July 30, 2310, 19:30. Omorfies, Old Lantern Path—Travelers' Theater.

900102003.content: We're just going in to see a little show, Goldtop? Okay? Just stay here and be good.

900102004.content: Why must your horse accompany us?

900102005.content: I haven't seen Goldtop in so long. And he really needs a walk around town.

900102006.content: He needs more opportunities to interact with others. Especially to reduce his anxiety, considering tomorrow's ceremony.

900102008.content: That begs the question, in an age of increasingly advanced Tranzist Ore technology, why would Omorfies have much use for horses or horse-drawn carriages?

900102009.content: This is the artistic capital of the world, and we'd like to keep it that way. Tranzist-powered vehicles are loud and disruptive. We'd rather have quiet city streets and the sound of hooves upon stone.

900102010.content: Some of the wealthiest citizens have taken to horseback riding—particularly with the strong economic recovery. Stablemasters can earn extra money by lending retired animals.

900102011.content: And don't forget Omorfies' waterways. Not every road is suitable for a vehicle. Horses don't have that problem. Sometimes going on horseback or in a carriage can be more convenient than in a car.

900102013.content: The show is starting. We should head in now.

900102014.content: There's hardly anybody here. Isn't this the artistic capital of the world? I would have thought the place would be packed with people eager for their daily dose of culture.

900102016.content: It's nothing. I'm just wondering how the division is getting along without me. It's hard not to think about my work.

900102017.content: My records have you at 277 consecutive work days. I suspect Odin assigned you this trip with the express purpose of giving you a forced vacation.

900102018.content: Anyway, Baldr and the others are perfectly capable of handling whatever issues come up.

900102019.content: Baldr... I just hope nothing goes wrong.

900102020.content: Well, since you're here anyway, you might as well practice enjoying life. Nobody's so important that the world will come crashing down without them.

900102021.content: I remember hearing much the same thing many years ago. Thank you, Hera.

900102022.content: Lady Hera? Is that really Lady Hera of the Society of Muses?

900102023.content: Do you remember me? It's Caspar, one of the contestants at this year's ceremony!

900102024.content: You heard the song I composed during the Society's certification exam!

900102026.content: Step aside please! Lady Hera, I'm a huge fan of your books! Could I get an autograph?

900102027.content: Ladies and gentlemen, we welcome you to a production of the White Mill Troupe.

900102028.content: Today we are honored by the performance of a special guest who brings a... very unique show...

900102029.content: The name of the play? Annihilation!

900102030.content: They've turned off the lights. It's starting! They sure made us wait!

900102032.content: I don't like the feel of this. Everyone... watch out!

900201004.content: I think those Visbanes learned their lesson.

900201005.content: I'm fine. I activated the Circles of Reason's protections in advance.

900201006.content: Bane Energy concentration is at 32% and climbing. We seem to have been sucked into a simulated space constructed by the energy.

900201007.content: From the directional frequency, I see that the simulated space is generated by cumulative Bane Energy outflowing from a single source.

900201008.content: The troupe leader? He seemed a little off. And there was that strange red mist after he opened the show.

900201009.content: I should have noticed that earlier. I got distracted by the crowd. It's my fault, and a dereliction of my duty.

900201011.content: She wasn't blown away by the collapse of the Bane Energy data, was she?

900201012.content: I'll start looking for a way out. But I need more data samples to decrypt the encoding.

900201013.content: Rather than wait around, I say we go on the offensive and investigate.

900201014.content: Flowfly Mist... dispel this red fog.

900202003.content: Why does it feel like we're dealing with an endless supply of Visbanes? There's just no end to them.

900202004.content: This entire space is merely an illusion generated by Bane Energy. To be more specific, we're not defeating real Visbanes, but merely projections formulated from this soup of Bane Energy.

900202005.content: So it stands to reason that our enemies really are limitless—until we find the source of the energy.

900202006.content: Bane Energy levels still rising. This will be a harrowing experience for any humans trapped in here...

900202007.content: We have to pick up the pace!

900202008.content: A local scan indicates that the simulated space is ten times the size of the theater.

900202009.content: If we check every platform, we'll be able to exit the simulation... by the time the opening ceremony ends tomorrow.

900202011.content: But I do have some good news. I've picked up several highly concentrated data sources. Unless I'm mistaken, one of these is our target.

900202012.content: We'll be able to leave right after we eliminate the troupe leader, right?

900202013.content: Not necessarily. Even after locating the source, we'll need to proceed in an exact sequence dictated by the Circles of Reason's analysis.

900202014.content: We'll have to maintain the exact same frequency as the simulated space before we can open an exit on one of the walls.

900301003.content: The manager mentioned it was a production of the "White Mill Troupe." Have you ever heard of them, Hera?

900301004.content: They're probably just a new theater group. The society president is close with Senator Selene, and I've been over their way plenty of times, but I've never heard of them.

900301006.content: Any theatrical group in Omorfies, no matter how small, must be registered with a society before their first performance. So I should have at least seen them on a list somewhere.

900301007.content: Is it possible—given that we're in a Bane Energy simulation anyway—that everything that we saw since entering, including the entire theatre and audience, is fictional?

900301009.content: I'm sure I saw Goldtop's hoof prints on the ground.

900301010.content: But we have to admit, we haven't found proof of human activity since we entered.

900301011.content: Do you want to give up?

900301012.content: No... I'm just thinking that your safety takes priority. And I'm worried that if we keep this up without finding any survivors, we're just wasting our time. And we don't want to risk getting stuck here permanently.

900301013.content: Heimdall, take Hera and keep searching for the Bane Energy source. I'll stay behind to look for others.

900301015.content: You have to stop thinking that the whole world depends on you. Life goes on—even if we all vanish.

900301016.content: Let's get one thing clear: I don't take orders from anybody here. But I share your concerns. We don't want anybody sacrificing themselves needlessly.

900301017.content: Goldtop might still be around here. And if he is, I can't give up on him.

900301019.content: All I can say is that it's an honor to fight by your side.

900302003.content: He's different from the other illusions.

900302005.content: Is it over? Data analysis confirms it was an Encroacher Type.

900302008.content: But then why is it showing a radically different frequency from the space? My calculations are rock-solid. Where have I gone wrong?

900302009.content: Maybe we've been after the wrong target the whole time. Someone else is responsible for the simulated space.

900302012.content: No. I'm just reminded of a story I overheard at tea some time ago.

900302013.content: It was a legend about a brilliant composer who was murdered. His talents had never been properly recognized, and he'd failed to enter a society by the cutoff age. Subsequently, his vengeful spirit haunted other artists who had somehow lost their way.

900302014.content: That's ludicrous. All human consciousness returns to the Source Layer upon death. Even in the unlikely event that some data remains on the Surface Layer, it couldn't sustain an entity capable of inflicting harm.

900302015.content: And I am not slow enough in wit to believe in any old cockamamie story I hear.

900302016.content: However, if we're dealing with an Encroacher Type, then maybe it read a human's data after corrupting them? Learned their habits, allowing it to mimic human speech and movement?

900302017.content: ...Tantamount to an "amalgamation of habits"... In some sense, this conjecture could explain the legend.

900401004.content: These poor humans will be totally corrupted by the Bane Energy if we don't do something soon.

900401005.content: What's going on? D-Did you see that monster?

900401006.content: I have an investment in Spealght Industries that's about to make me a multi-millionaire! I'm not dying here!

900401007.content: Every room is the same! There's no way out! We're done for!

900401008.content: I can't go like this—not before I'm married to my Prince Charming!

900401009.content: No, no, no... It's just a coincidence...

900401010.content: It was so hard for me to get into the Ardisis Ceremony! Tomorrow will be my big day!

900401011.content: Forgive me, Ardisis! Save me! I beg you!

900401014.content: Just get up here on the horse with your mom, little girl. I'll protect you.

900401015.content: Your name is Goldtop, isn't it? I need your help.

900401016.content: Hey! That Convallaria Knight over there!

900401017.content: I... I can't hold on much longer. I'm Professor Loris of the Stellaris Academy Sculpture School. I've been awarded the armband of honor by Senator Cadyllon.

900401018.content: Here's 500,000 if you can get that lady to give me the horse!

900401019.content: Get your dirty hands off the reins!

900401020.content: How dare you speak to me like that! Isn't your entire purpose to protect artists like me, knight?

900401022.content: The Visbanes again... That was fast.

900401023.content: Don't panic, okay? Everyone, get behind me!

900402004.content: B-Brother... How has it come to this?

900402005.content: Watch out, everyone! This illusion is different!

900402006.content: Cover your ears! Do not let the horn get to you!

900402008.content: Prepare to be consumed by fire!

900402010.content: I'm glad I made it in time. Are you alright, Artemis?

900402011.content: I'm pulling an abnormal read-out of Bane Energy. I'm surprised to find you and the rest of the audience here.

900402012.content: Good thing I heard you fighting, or...

900402014.content: Letting someone finish their sentences would be, I should think, basic courtesy. Forget it. I'm not lowering myself to the standards of... intellectuals.

900402016.content: The Ardisis Ceremony is tomorrow. I have to participate!

900402018.content: I'm Caspar of the Society of Music. My songs have been honored on numerous occasions by Society President Selene. Believe me, I'm going to be selected for this year's ceremony!

900402019.content: I believe you. But all the contenders say that.

900402020.content: I've given so much just for a chance at this honor! I can't die here!

900402021.content: I hear you. Don't worry. We'll get you out of here safely.

900501003.content: Where are we? And how do we get out?

900501004.content: Given what we've seen, I suspect this strange space is the product of an interaction between a deceased human consciousness and a Visbane.

900501005.content: The size of the space indicates that it has been in existence for some time.

900501006.content: If we defeat the Visbane, then the space holding us in here will break apart.

900501008.content: No, I think it's someone else in the troupe.

900501009.content: We've run into a number of Encroacher Types that may be the source of Bane Energy.

900501010.content: And each of them, without exception, is a former member of this troupe.

900501011.content: I'm guessing something disturbing happened to the troupe years ago.

900501013.content: We've already ruled out many suspects. The third data source has a 45.81% probability of being the energy source we're after.

900501014.content: But the humans may not hold out for much longer. If we can't find the source soon, I'm afraid they...

900501015.content: Then let's get to it now.

900502003.content: Here it is! This ball of Bane Energy is the source of the space!

900502005.content: Don't lower your guard just yet. Prepare for battle.

900502006.content: I'll need some time to analyze this jumble of data. It won't take long, so don't go far.

900502007.content: Have you figured out what's responsible for this awful place?

900502008.content: The data is very complex. It seems cobbled together from many different types of Visbanes.

900502009.content: I suspect the entire space was formed by a repeated layering of human consciousness data and Bane Energy. This allows it to use the computing power of a number of psychological data archives.

900502011.content: Put simply, no individual human consciousness could generate such an impressive theater, even with all this Bane Energy. But what if we used all the consciousness data of a whole acting troupe?

900502012.content: Several strong-willed individuals ran into the wrong Bane Energy after they died?

900502013.content: Could a whole acting troupe really run into a Visbane capable of corroding them all? And in Omorfies of all places, which has never experienced a quake?

900502014.content: We have insufficient information for a meaningful hypothesis. Whatever the details, we'll need to destroy this theater to protect others from the same fate.

900601004.content: We did it! The passage is open!

900601007.content: You beast! What are you after?

900601008.content: The entire space is about to collapse. This accessway won't hold much longer. Whatever you're doing, do it quick.

900601009.content: Everyone, through the exit! I'll hold off the Visbanes. Hera? Cover me!

900601010.content: Wait! My music! Give me back my music! Those monsters have taken it...

900601011.content: Do you have any idea what you're doing? Is your music worth your life?

900601012.content: How would you know?! You've never had to struggle to be recognized for your talents!

900601013.content: I gave everything just to produce one work! How many Omorfians can say that?

900601015.content: Are you mad? Get back here!

900601018.content: Ah! Give it back! Ardisis promised it to me!

900601019.content: Everyone else has left. If we stay any longer, the Visbanes might use our accessway to pour into the city!

900601020.content: The exit won't hold much longer, Shu!

900601021.content: Artemis, leave with Heimdall first. I'll be right with you.

900602003.content: Leave me here if you want to go.

900602004.content: Someone once told me when I first joined Division Nine, "Never leave anyone behind."

900602005.content: I'm sure Heimdall can reopen the accessway.

900602007.content: Look around you. Don't you realize how insane this? Who cares about music at a time like this? Do you want to die here?

900602008.content: You have a whole life ahead of you as a distinguished artist. You can create more masterpieces. Don't let one old piece of music hold you back.

900602009.content: Without that sheet music, I can't even be called an artist. I'm just a... nobody chasing foolish dreams.

900602010.content: How many struggling artists in Omorfies have given up their lives to get the recognition people like you take for granted!

900602011.content: A composer without acclaim whose talents can't even help him give a bouquet of roses to the person he loves.

900602012.content: Watch out, Hera! The Bane Energy is congealing!

900602013.content: The White Mill Troupe... Have you fought for so long only to return to where you began?

900602015.content: Hera, the Bane Energy has gotten into him. He's corrupted! Stay back!

900602018.content: We must try to save him!

900602019.content: The Bane Energy in has fastened onto him as an anchor! And it's gaining strength. He may look human, but he's long gone!

900602020.content: I have to stop him, no matter what! Hera, use your Access Key!

900701001.content: The streets of Omorfies are especially quiet tonight. The entire city resembles a statue, set against the black backdrop of the night, telling the tale of a century of elegance.

900701002.content: The silence is broken by the sudden intrusion of two girls onto street corner.

900701003.content: Do you know how to reopen the accessway?

900701004.content: The space keeps changing! I've got to lock onto the right frequency before I can locate Shu and the others!

900701005.content: But there are literally billions of combinations to choose from. How am I supposed to figure out the right one?

900701006.content: Don't blame me. If we'd been more firm with that stupid composer, none of this would have happened.

900701007.content: Chin up, Heimdall. You are the best researcher of all the Cryptics. I'm sure you can solve a little problem like this!

900701008.content: There must be some kind of formula I can use to narrow down the options. Let me think...

900701009.content: I don't know how to narrow down a randomly changing range of variables within an unlimited data set. It's impossible!

900701013.content: You must have had this Access Key for quite some time.

900701014.content: I had the Access Key when I first awakened. It means a lot to me.

900701015.content: That shouldn't be too much of a problem. It can happen with any change in your body's data. Awakening the Access Key is a simple matter of recalibration.

900701016.content: This is a resonance stabilizer I helped develop. It stabilizes the resonance frequency of a specific Access Key to within a configured range.

900701018.content: Even if I can't lock onto the exact frequency of the simulation, I can find a frequency within that I already know!

900701021.content: As soon as I reopen this accessway, we'll have to deal with a horde of Visbanes eager to escape the collapse. They're going to pour into the city.

900701022.content: Over a hundred would be a conservative estimate...

900701023.content: Just focus on maintaining the accessway with your key. Leave the rest to me.

900701024.content: You really think you can hold them off on your own?

900701025.content: When you're a watcher in a lighthouse facing an approaching storm, you just do your job—no matter what comes, no matter how desperate it gets.

900701026.content: Because that's the only reason that lighthouse exists—to guide other ships safely through the storm.

900701027.content: And as a Knight of Convallaria, it's my job to go where the danger is greatest. When the storm comes, I protect the Omorfians and our society.

900701028.content: Trust me. Like Shu trusts in you.

900701033.content: Ahhh! Agathe, what have I done?

900701034.content: Why is there such powerful Bane Energy here?

900701035.content: What happened to the composer? And what's going on with that Visbane?

900701038.content: I'll tell you later. Right now we've got to worry about Visbanes running amok in the city!

900701039.content: Get out of here! Evacuate! And close the accessway!

900701041.content: Wait, this simulated space must be destroyed first.

900701043.content: Understood. It's time for the curtain call.

900701044.content: Phantasmal Dawn! Let me enlighten you!

900701047.content: The accessway is about to collapse, Shu!

900701049.content: I can't hold on any longer!

900701050.content: A fireball of blinding white light flashes out of the space, disintegrating the exiting Visbanes into black and red fragments.

900701051.content: The pillar of light is so powerful that it reaches the sky, illuminating the entire city with a brightness akin to the sun, if only for one brief instant.

900701052.content: The accessway closes, and the city returns to its customary darkness, as if the fleeting dawn never had happened.

900701053.content: Don't tell me we failed again...

900701054.content: No!!!! If only I'd been able to hold on a few more seconds! Shu and Hera might have...

900701055.content: A familiar voice behind Heimdall interrupts her as she paces.

900701058.content: Shu, Hera! I thought that you were...

900701059.content: Stuck inside? Almost. It was a close call.

900701060.content: We were fortunate enough to hitch a ride on Goldtop.

900701062.content: It's finally over. And I've had quite enough of theaters and their insufferable productions for a long time.

900701063.content: No. There's still one more thing!

900701065.content: I lost the gift I got Poseidon, so I'm going to have to buy another one before the end of tomorrow's opening ceremony.

900702002.content: Stellaris Academy, after the 19th Ardisis Ceremony has ended.

900702003.content: (Sigh)... Thus ends the ceremony. I'm so tired.

900702004.content: Didn't you spend half the time on the judging panel nodding off?

900702005.content: Wow, I was seated really far from you. How did you notice? Were you watching me? Are you following me around now instead of Odin?

900702006.content: Don't be ridiculous. I don't have an artistic bone in my body.

900702007.content: Surely you do. Everyone has the ability to appreciate and judge art if they really want to.

900702008.content: Right. So what did you think of the ceremony?

900702009.content: As outstanding as the one before it... brimming with masterpieces, heartfelt performances, and carefully curated productions.

900702010.content: Outstanding, but nothing more, right? The same kind of boring masterpiece you can see anywhere else. It's not as fresh and exciting as the graffiti you saw when you entered the city.

900702011.content: I never said anything like that.

900702012.content: Never mind. No artwork can escape the critics.

900702013.content: You should head back tonight. Convey my regards to Odin.

900702015.content: Milady, a carriage has been ordered for you.

900702016.content: Would you like to travel with us?

900702017.content: I'm sorry. I need to accompany someone to the racetrack in my last hours here.

900702018.content: Have fun then. Perhaps the next ceremony will bring something... more exciting?

900702019.content: Oh? Interesting. What do you have in mind?

900702020.content: Come now. Telling you would spoil the fun. Let your imagination run wild!

900801001.content: Good morning, Captain Thor! Someone's shining bright today!

900801002.content: Good morning, Apollo! Morning, Zen... ki... bo!

900801004.content: What are you doing? Let go!

900801007.content: Where did you get these movie tickets from?

900801010.content: I got them from an older gentleman who's a regular at the restaurant I temp at. His son works as a film crew.

900801011.content: He wanted to thank me for bringing him some reminders of home.

900801012.content: Shall we go see the movie together, Captain?

900801013.content: No, I don't think I'd be interested in a movie like this.

900801014.content: Come on, let's go! Let's waste a perfectly good ticket.

900801015.content: Don't you agree, Pi—I mean, Apollo?

900801017.content: Zenkibo, have you fulfilled your training requirements yet?

900801018.content: Um... Hey, don't try to change the subject, Captain!

900801019.content: You've been on several missions lately, Captain. It'll be good for you to unwind a little.

900801020.content: That's right! Come on, come with us!

900802003.content: Why so quiet, Captain? This isn't like your usual sunny disposition.

900802004.content: I'm just questioning my decision from two hours ago.

900802006.content: I can't believe I wasted more than an hour on this crap—um, on this film.

900802007.content: Do you not like it, Captain?

900802008.content: It honestly has been a long time since I've seen anything so devoid of logic...

900802009.content: Ha! I didn't know you cared about logic in movies.

900802010.content: What do you mean by that?!

900802011.content: I just didn't expect it from you.

900802012.content: What do you think I care about, then? Huh?!

900802013.content: Special effects, the fight sequences, stuff like that.

900802014.content: Do I seem that basic to you?

900802015.content: Don't tell me the two of you really liked that film?

900802016.content: Um... I didn't dislike it. I think it was interesting.

900802017.content: I liked it a lot! Especially that explosion scene at the end!

900802018.content: I thought some of the jokes in there were good.

900802019.content: Mmhmm! And that scene where Toastman saved the day? Not gonna lie, I did shed some tears there.

900802021.content: Are we actually talking about the same movie?!

900901001.content: By the way, did you just insult me, Apollo?

900901002.content: Impossible! I don't engage in such uncouth behavior.

900901003.content: You said that I don't care for logic.

900901004.content: Oh my, Captain, please don't take my words out of context...

900901005.content: I made the comment based on your usual approach to battles, Captain.

900901006.content: So you don't think I'm a logical person!

900901007.content: But... we never ever plan our missions beforehand.

900901008.content: That's because there's no need for planning when we have absolute power on our side.

900901010.content: Sounds just like "With great power, comes great responsibility."

900901011.content: Hmm? Sounds profound... and not something you'd say.

900901012.content: Hehe, that was from the film just now.

900901013.content: Pfft. I guess there's some saving grace to it, after all.

900901014.content: It must have something going for it. I mean, the Toastman franchise has always done well at the box office.

900901015.content: Enjoy it for what it is, Captain.

900901016.content: But the plot makes me so mad.

900901017.content: I mean, all Breadman had to do was to kick the baddies' butts. There wasn't any need for all those twists and turns.

900901018.content: Well, not every protagonist is as good as you, Captain. And you always need a little bit of spice in stories.

900901019.content: If you were the protagonist, Captain... I'm guessing the movie would've been over in three minutes.

901001001.content: So, are you saying that there are several Breadman movies?

901001002.content: Yep! Like "Iron Can Man" and "West Coast Captain"...

901001003.content: Those two are the more popular ones.

901001004.content: I feel like I've heard of them before...

901001005.content: Have you seen either of them, Captain?

901001007.content: Maybe because the names all sound the same after a while...

901001008.content: Oh! I remember where I heard them now!

901001009.content: Once, when I was on a mission, I ran into a group of people arguing at King's Boulevard.

901001010.content: I think they were arguing about them.

901001012.content: They were arguing about which one was stronger... It almost turned into a full-on fight!

901001013.content: Do people actually argue about stuff like that?

901001015.content: Well, since I was already there, I stepped in to ensure that order was maintained.

901001016.content: And the group voluntarily went to the police station to admit their errors of judgment.

901001018.content: But... are you sure they went to the police station voluntarily, Captain?

901001020.content: They even bowed and thanked me profusely when I left!

901101001.content: But I still don't quite understand why a film like this is so popular.

901101002.content: What is it about the film that you liked, Zenki?

901101004.content: The protagonist was real good-looking, the special effects were really cool, and the story was interesting...

901101005.content: Didn't you feel that it didn't make sense in places?

901101009.content: Do you not like hanging out with me, Captain Thor?

901101011.content: I mean, you're not the smiley type to begin with, Captain, but you look particularly grumpy today.

901101012.content: It's not you. Of course I like spending time with you.

901101013.content: Will you still come with me then, the next time I ask you?

901101015.content: Then you're coming with me to see "Toastman Vs. Lady Cream Puff" at the theater next month!

901101017.content: Somehow I don't feel very wanted here...

901101018.content: Or what about we watch anoth—

910001001.content: Oh? Is that you, Admin? Seems like you have some time. Want to help me out here?

910001003.content: I've been studying Xu Heng's chunlian lately, you know, that rhyming couplet tradition. But I've no idea how to start writing couplets of my own.

910001004.content: Rhyming couplets? Yeah, I can help.

910001005.content: That's a quick yes! Let me guess, you want something from me...

910001006.content: No! I just want to help! (Coughs) So, any ideas so far?

910001007.content: Mmm... So, I was thinking for the first line... "Buoyant on the wind, a white crane flies."...

910001009.content: So I need some help with the second line, Admin. Inspire me, and I can—ahem—teach you something special too...

910001010.content: Something speci— Um, let me think.

910001012.content: Ha-ha, I can't believe you're missing that place!

910001013.content: It's hard not to! But what rhymes with "flies"? "Knives"? But that's not quite a pretty picture, is it?

910001014.content: That's true. But I suppose you can try something else?

910001015.content: ...How about "eyes"? Something about shiny eyes, maybe?

910001016.content: Mmm... Let me think. How about this? "Where horizons meet, the sunset sparkles in her eyes." Not bad at all!

910001018.content: Since the crane is high in the wind, we can say that it's just returned from a victory. Alright, I feel the light bulb coming on now...

910001019.content: "Returning triumphant from upon high."... Yes, you've been a real help, Admin.

910001020.content: You came up with that only by intuition? Mmm, I like that.

910001021.content: I tell Kuninotokotachi what I have in mind for the second line.

910001022.content: "Soaring, haughty, but non the wise."... Interesting. Sounds more like poetry rather than a rhyming couplet, though.

910002001.content: Morning, Ver! What are you doing?

910002003.content: Why are you sneaking around like a thief?

910002005.content: I look behind Ver, and I catch a glimpse of some red paper and ink.

910002008.content: Nothing to be embarrassed about, though.

910002009.content: I just saw the first line lying around here, and suddenly felt like completing it.

910002010.content: Mmm. Sounds like someone's feeling creative today. So what's the first part?

910002011.content: It reads, "A stroke of rainbow, comes upon a tranquil dream."

910002013.content: Yes... So I suppose I should complete it with something relevant too, right? Like, "A galaxy of stars, flows along an endless stream."

910002014.content: That makes sense! How about... "The stars awaken somewhere in between"...?

910002015.content: "I am awakened, by the greetings of the wind."... A bit odd, ha-ha. But still impressive as you've come up with that so quickly!

910003002.content: All of a sudden, I hear someone let out a scream some distance away. Then, the sound of something hitting the floor. I run over to take a look.

910003004.content: Leviathan has gotten back up on her feet again. But there is some ink on her face, making her look like a kitten with whiskers.

910003005.content: As I help her clean her face, I see the red paper, writing brush, and ink on the table.

910003006.content: Are you trying your hand at rhyming couplets? Why the sudden interest?

910003007.content: Umm... Everyone's doing it! So I thought I'd give it a go too.

910003008.content: I think Master will be very happy if I present her with a couplet written by myself!

910003011.content: I don't quite understand how to go about writing one...

910003012.content: Don't worry. Let me have a look.

910003014.content: The first line reads, "Go with the new year and new friends that come with."

910003016.content: "Treat old foes and old grudges like no more than a myth"... Admin, you're amazing!

910003017.content: "Embrace your new days with their spring buds aplenty"... Mmm... I don't get this. So... what does it mean?

910003018.content: It means you should put your best foot forward in the new year. Or something like that.

910003019.content: "But forget not the places and faces of former times lived"... Mmm... I really have no idea what's going on now!

910004002.content: Oh, morning, Poseidon! Is something bothering you?

910004003.content: Um... Not really, I guess. It's just that...

910004004.content: Is there anything I can help you with?

910004006.content: I follow Poseidon into her room. It turns out that she, too, is trying her hand at writing rhyming couplets.

910004007.content: It feels like I'm using up my last brain cell on this Xu Heng tradition...

910004008.content: Ah, so that's why you look so exhausted.

910004009.content: Exactly. It's not easy starting from scratch. I've been just staring at this piece of paper for ages.

910004010.content: Hmm, but I see that there's already something on it... "New friends gather, like tides flooding from all directions." Did you write this?

910004012.content: It does sound like something witten by an ocean lover. It has certain... momentum in it, yet graceful.

910004013.content: But... what's the next line going to be?

910004015.content: I don't quite get it. What do you mean?

910004016.content: We can simply build on the liveliness of the first line. For example, "A spring brook flows, shining with its gentle reflections."

910004017.content: Let me see. "Directions one may look, good fortune will be discovered."... I didn't know you were that crazy about money, Admin.

910004018.content: That's not what I mean... Just a nice New Year's wish for everyone, after all.

910004019.content: "May inspirations strike, like lightning piercing the oceans." Hmm... that's quite the vision you have!

910101001.content: Marvelous, just marvelous! It took you only three days to do this! As the old saying goes, "The student may surpass the master someday", indeed!

910101002.content: It's a pity that I'll be going back to Xu Heng soon... I don't know when we will meet again. But as they say, "Gather the flowers when they're still blooming"... I guess we'd better just live in the moment!

910101003.content: Let's keep watching the fireworks, Admin!

910102002.content: Wow, it's beautiful, Admin. Did you really do this yourself?

910102003.content: Admin, you're amazing... Can you teach me to make one, too?

910103001.content: I've seen something this phenomenal once upon a time... The bright flashes, the colors, the noise. Humans crave this sort of thing.

910103002.content: These fleeting moments have a certain charm to induce people's admiration. How curious.

910103003.content: Makes sense. The purpose of pretty things is to wow people, after all.

910103005.content: The fireworks are not what you're looking at, are they?

910104001.content: So pretty, but.... they come and go so quickly. It's like how beautiful moments never last...

910104004.content: Would you stay with me a little while longer?

910105002.content: I heard that the Gaea government banned fireworks in the last century due to heavy marine pollution caused by the materials used. It was only after improvements were made by Xu Heng that fireworks reappeared on the market again.

910105003.content: It's all thanks to the efforts of everyone involved that we can witness such a grand event this year...

910105004.content: It's the same with you, Admin. Without you, there'd still be a big question mark over Gaea's chance of making it through to the next year.

910105005.content: And I wouldn't have the chance to... share a special moment with you under the dazzling fireworks...

910105006.content: It's all thanks to you, Admin.

910106001.content: Fireworks... burning bright to bring others light...

910106002.content: I don't really fully understand all this, but I think I got the gist...

910107001.content: Thank you for the past year, Admin.

910107002.content: Things at Aether Gazer wouldn't have gone so smoothly without your help.

910108002.content: I've got a new idea for the BunBun series.

910108004.content: I was only able to improve upon the BunBun series the last time around thanks to you, Admin.

910108005.content: So, to ensure future improvements... you must... stay with me. All the time.

910109001.content: There's a sale at the supermarket's grocery section today. Look at my haul!

910109003.content: #{nickname}#? You alright? Something seems to have been bothering you the last few days.

910109005.content: Admin... I know what's on your mind...

910109006.content: But it's all over now, and you can't change anything by dwelling on what's happened. But, of course, I'm always willing to chat if you need me.

910109007.content: Oh, by the day, I think a new aquarium's opened up near here. We can hang out there.

910109008.content: Yes. It's going to snow the day after tomorrow, Admin, remember to bundle up!

910109012.content: You shameless knave! How dare you do such a ghastly thing in broad daylight, in front of Jinwu? Surrender now and walk out of the darkness into the light! I can spare your life if you repent and return the stolen item to its true owner!

910109014.content: Besides, you can't prove that this is yours, can you?

910109015.content: Are there two stitching lines on the left ear?

910109017.content: There are two red dots on either side of its mouth!

910109018.content: Alright, alright. Back to its owner.

910109022.content: So... I blamed an honest and innocent person?

910109024.content: Ha-ha, relax. It's a good thing that you've found it at last. But your dress... you aren't from Ain Soph, are you?

910109025.content: That's right, I hail from Xu Heng.

910109026.content: Xu Heng? That's a long way from Ain Soph... What business do you have here?

910109027.content: I actually came here by accident. My master's instructions were for me to go to Yu Jing and get trained there...

910109028.content: Then... how did you end up here?

910109029.content: I was on my journey when I saw a mysterious man with a strange demeanor and awkward of expression sneaking around. Hmph! I recognized his true form right away—it was the demon that threatens the peace of the world, the Yaoguai!

910109031.content: I think that's the name of the supervillain in a shonen manga that has gone viral these days.

910109032.content: As the guardian of the people of Xu Heng, I battled it for three hundred rounds in a row... But the cunning Yaoguai got the better of me, and knocked me unconscious when I wasn't looking!

910109034.content: When I came to, I found myself in this land. My search for a way to return to Xu Heng has sadly been fruitless so far...

910109035.content: Oh dear, I just saw the bruises on your leg. Those must really hurt! You should get your wounds looked at.

910109038.content: The ancients endured the pain of scraping their bones to find the cure for poison. What I suffered today is a mere superficial injury, not even worth mentioning!

910109039.content: However, I never thought I'd stray far from Xu Heng while on this journey. I wonder if you two can tell me the way back to Xu Heng?

910109040.content: It's not easy for most folks to travel to another Sephirah Zone. You'll have to put in an application at the Photon Rail Administration.

910109042.content: But you won't be able to do it now, since the Photon Rail Administration is on a break today.

910109044.content: That cut on your knee... You should really come with us to get it treated.

910109045.content: Um, may I know who you are...?

910109046.content: We're employees of Aether Gazer. I'm Poseidon, and this is #{nickname}#.

910109049.content: Look at how excited she is...

910109050.content: I love the dolls from Aether Gazer!

910109052.content: When did we start making dolls?

910109053.content: Oh, I remember now! It's the "Dreamweaver" project that Division Eight was working on this year. It was spearheaded by Mi-Nian, I think.

910109054.content: Mi-Nian? Oh, the M.E.O.W. that's in charge of finance? I think I've only run into her twice...

910109055.content: Ha-ha, Mi-Nian may seem a little intimidating at first, but she's actually quite the cuddle bug in private. Hold on... what's that in your hand, Jinwu?

910109056.content: Heh heh, allow me to introduce them to you...

910109057.content: This one's called Shallot, and this one is Pups.

910109058.content: Aren't these two dolls... Micoco and Mimir?

910109059.content: Hehe! You have no idea how much trouble I went through to get them!

910109060.content: Just how many dolls do you have, though? It doesn't look like your bag can hold them all.

910109062.content: Jinwu's rather elevated speech has barely left her lips when she's interrupted by a sudden grumbling...

910109064.content: Oh? Why do I have an extra burger here?

910109067.content: Jinwu looks at me with her big, innocent eyes. It seems that she can burst into tears in the very next second...

910109069.content: I didn't know you could be so cheeky, #{nickname}#.

910109071.content: Wow, that really hit the spot! It's been a whole six hours since I last had something... (Sobs)

910109074.content: Sure. Hang in there a little more, Aether Gazer's just right around the corner. It'll stop hurting once the medicine's applied.

910109075.content: You have my utmost gratitude, my saviors!

910109076.content: I feel someone tugging at the hem of my shirt, and I turn to see that Jinwu is following me closely and gazing at me with her big, misty eyes as we step into the Aether Gazer building.

910109077.content: Once done with treating Jinwu's wound, Poseidon went off to deal with her groceries. And so, the job of helping Jinwu pen her application for permission to travel to another Sephirah Zone fell on my shoulders...

910109078.content: Huh? It's going to be a month before I can go home?!

910109079.content: I miss Master Xihe so much! Looks like... I won't make New Year's Awakening, too.

910109081.content: The road home is long and winding indeed...

910109082.content: I'll go with you to the Administration when the time comes. But let's fill out that application first.

910109083.content: In Xu Heng, we hold a New Year's Awakening celebration at the end of each year. Everyone get together and share their wishes for the coming year. I really love it!

910109084.content: That sounds like quite a grand celebration to me. Oh, where are we in the application now?

910109085.content: Jinwu, place of domicile: Xu Heng. Current address: Ruomu Palace, Nanjiao Isle. Occupation? Mmm... I suppose you can call me a daoshi...

910109088.content: Nothing. It's just that I've never heard of this occupation here in Ain Soph. I was just curious, that's all.

910109089.content: (Clears throat) Daoshi, priests and priestesses who mainly practice the Way of Balance, supplemented by the Astral Arcanum. Everything we learn can potentially make a great contribution to the good of Xu Heng.

910109090.content: As you can imagine, my profession is quite a remarkable one in Xu Heng!

910109092.content: Alright, I'm done with the application... Oh, by the way, #{nickname}#...

910109094.content: A doll? You're giving it to me?

910109095.content: Yes! I'm really grateful for your help, #{nickname}#. Without you, I might still be wandering the streets... And I might have lost Nian by now.

910109097.content: Is that the name of the doll I saw in the morning?

910109098.content: Yeah. There's a little fella inside it called Nian. It could have greatly contributed to the reconstruction of Xu Heng—except it got corrupted by Bane Energy in a battle with a powerful Visbane. Later on, my master sealed it inside this doll powered by an Access Key.

910109099.content: But why do you have it with you?

910109100.content: The corruption has regressed a bit thanks to the doll... but only its true owner can completely cleanse it of the Bane Energy. And my task was to go to Yu Jing and find this owner...

910109102.content: I must find them, no matter what. I just can't let my master down...!

910109104.content: But, before I find Nian's owner, I must make sure that the seal stays put on the doll. It'll be a disaster if Nian escapes.

910109105.content: A disaster? It looks pretty harmless to me...

910109106.content: Nian is actually composed of some powerful foul energy. If the seal weakens, it is very likely to escape from the doll.

910109107.content: It is massive in its physical form, with very, very sharp claws, and it is capable of taking on a hundred opponents all by itself!

910109109.content: Mm-hmm. But I won't allow it to cause harm to anybody!

910109110.content: Why have you taken out a weasel hair brush... and cinnabar?

910109111.content: To reinforce the seal on Nian, first, I have to paint some dots on it with cinnabar using a weasel hair brush. Then, cast the Astral Arcanum and wait for forty-five minutes, and then we're done!

910109112.content: Looks like you've painted not dots, but two "whiskers" on it... Hmm?

910109113.content: What's going on?! Is the whiskered Nian flying?!

910109114.content: Pshaw! You're not going anywhere, oh you devious Nian! Don't you think I don't know your little tricks, trying to get me distracted by doing adorable things like this! HYAH!

910109115.content: Evil truly does run rampant in this world! To think, a mere "Nian" has the power to obscure the clouds and the sun from view... And yet destined to drive away the evil be I, and never will I allow malicious forces to spread throughout Gaea!

910109117.content: Nian is just sitting on your face.

910109118.content: Fuzzy Wuzzy was a bear. Fuzzy Wuzzy had no hair...

910109120.content: A gust of wind rises from Jinwu's feet, lifting Nian into the air. As Jinwu's chanting ends, the two cinnabar "whiskers" on Nian collapse back into two dots with a "ping", and in a flash, Nian returns to its original position.

910109121.content: I can not help but take a glance at what Jinwu has just said she'd give me—the cute, grinning doll on the table.

910109122.content: Please don't tell me this is also...?

910109123.content: Oh, relax! The doll I'm giving you is one of my best warriors, capable of dispelling evil and warding off disaster. It's no Nian, that's for sure.

910109124.content: Aren't they all made of cotton? Can't Nian hide in there?

910109125.content: Nian's doll was made in its image by its owner. The only reason Nian is willing to stay in it is because it's dearly familiar.

910109128.content: Shu would like to speak with you, Admin. You should go see her.

910109130.content: On the other side of the door, Poseidon is waiting for me. Just as I am about to leave, a plushie is thrust into my hands. I turn my head to see Jinwu waving to me and smiling.

910110001.content: I'm going to take my son to watch "Yu Jing Verses", that new film coming on this holiday. What are your plans?

910110002.content: Oh! That movie has been all over the news. I want to see it too, but I'm thinking I'll take my wife on a trip. It's been a while since I've spent time with her. Hmm? Who are you?

910110003.content: I remember, you're from Division Nine, right? What brings you to the warehouse?

910110004.content: Oh, these are... I understand. But this? This should be yours. Here, take it.

910110005.content: The doll Jinwu gave me a few days before had fallen into the box at some point. As the box is handed to me, a piece of paper falls out of the doll's scarf.

910110006.content: I pick it up for a closer look. It is a small map drawn on a sticky note, with a heading reads "Nanjiao Isle". I am just pondering over the meaning of it when my thoughts are interrupted.

910110007.content: Hey bud, are you planning to go home too for the holiday?

910110009.content: I'll probably stick around here at Aether Gazer.

910110010.content: Hats off to you. What a dedicated professional!

910110011.content: Though I've been with Aether Gazer for over a year by now, I still haven't managed to remember where I came from, let alone who and where my family are.

910110012.content: I leave the warehouse and enter the elevator. I look at the smiling doll in my hand, and then at the note marked with various strange terms, and think of Jinwu. She is also unable to go home.

910110013.content: The elevator doors suddenly open, and I can hear Ookuninushi and Mi-Nian having a heated discussion...

910110014.content: Research funding is very important! Our newly developed products are on a completely new paradigm in terms of wartime command! I don't get why Shu made that face when I submitted my budget request...

910110015.content: Don't worry, Ookuninushi. If I were Shu, I'd sign your request for the development of your Good Luck Detector in a second!

910110016.content: It's just that... if we can't tap into the division's existing budget...

910110017.content: Shu may agree if we can get additional funding through new businesses. In short, I'll think of a way to get this done.

910110019.content: Yes. But now I— Oh! What...?

910110020.content: The elevator shakes violently for a moment. Its doors burst open, letting in a ray of light, as well as a crystalline voice.

910110021.content: How dare you, evil spirit in the metal box, swallow the common people in broad daylight! You should pass the trial from this Tenblaze in my hand first!

910110022.content: Thank you so much, young lady.

910110023.content: This child has claustrophobia. I really didn't know what to do when the elevator stopped...

910110025.content: You're welcome! I'm always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need!

910110026.content: I'm really sorry! It's our fault that...

910110030.content: Which one of you here made a hole in Elevator B's door over there?

910110031.content: Wow! It's Shallot in a God of Wealth costume... This is adorable!

910110032.content: "Shallot"? What's that? My name is Mi-Nian... Hey! Hey! Hey! Hang on, just who are you?

910110033.content: Jinwu immediately starts running at Mi-Nian, causing her to jump behind me.

910110034.content: With a loud bang, Jinwu's forehead slams into my shoulder. Mi-Nian seizes this opportunity to flee to the elevator opposite with Ookuninushi.

910110035.content: Oh boy, I feel dizzy. Why am I seeing stars inside here?

910110037.content: Mmm, just having a little trouble standing up straight...

910110040.content: To be honest, when I was out a few days ago, I saw another metal box demon who was swallowing up people! I've concluded that it was the work of the minions of the source of all evil, the Yaoguai!

910110041.content: Hmph, but I saw through its disguise right away! As soon as I flashed my Tenblaze, the demon trembled and spat out its victims in an instant!

910110042.content: Um... That... We call that an elevator. I'm guessing there aren't many of those in Xu Heng?

910110045.content: Xu Heng hovers in the sky thanks to the Cloudsong Ore, and most vehicles are made of the same ore, too. As for elevators... I don't think I've ever seen something like it in Xu Heng before.

910110046.content: Well, I've heard that Cloudsong Ore is an anti-gravity mineral unique to Xu Heng. But I never thought that it could be used in infrastructure or transportation.

910110047.content: Sounds like there are some really dramatic cultural differences between Ain Soph and Xu Heng... No wonder you always have this look of curiosity on your face.

910110048.content: You could say that Cloudsong Ore is literally the foundation of our lives. However, our ancestors had to struggle with it for years before they managed to control it...

910110049.content: I've heard about that, too. The people of Xu Heng are quite impressive.

910110050.content: I'm proud to call it my home!

910110051.content: Hold on, we're digressing here... I wanted to talk to you about something.

910110052.content: Hmm? What do you need from me, my savior?

910110055.content: I've been looking for it for a while. #{nickname}#, where did you find it?

910110056.content: It was tucked inside the doll you gave me.

910110057.content: Without this, I might not be able to go home...

910110059.content: Um, I've spent all my life in the mountains, and this is my first trip outside. So, I don't know my way around very well and...

910110060.content: So, that's why you drew the map?

910110061.content: Don't tell me... You're gonna draw a map of Ain Soph too?

910110062.content: Thou knowest me best, #{nickname}#! I'm just about to head out to get familiar with the roads around here.

910110063.content: That booklet in your hand... You drew it with brush and ink? Hang on, is this really the way back to Aether Gazer??? That doesn't look right at all... Are you sure you'll be able to find your way back?

910110066.content: Just a grocery run, I'll be back real soon.

910110067.content: Tell you what, I'll come with you. I need some fresh air anyway.

910110068.content: But why the sudden interest in cooking?

910110069.content: I just felt like having something from home all of a sudden...

910110070.content: Ah, Xu Heng cuisine... I haven't had that before.

910110071.content: This is your lucky day, then!

910110072.content: A good harvest foretold by the auspicious snow!

910110073.content: The snowfall's getting heavier. Look at how it's piled up in the alleys...

910110074.content: Hmph! How dare you, a mere snow mochi spirit, try to take me on?! How dare you smile so brazenly at me! I'll teach you a good lesson right now!

910110075.content: "Snow mochi spirit"...? You mean this snowman? Look at how its smile reaches all the way to its ears... I wonder which genius made this. But there's something odd about the position of its carrot nose...

910110078.content: Um, apart from its slightly off-putting smile, I don't think it's done anything harmful...

910110079.content: Yesterday, I was mailing something to my master when I suddenly saw someone who'd been bewitched by this demon and was about to prey on the weak. He said, "H-h-h-ands up-p! D-d-on't... m-m-move!"

910110080.content: Sounds like this person had a serious case of the stutters. But what has this to do with the snow mochi sp—um, I mean snowman?

910110081.content: I had already subdued the robber when, out of nowhere, I was tripped by the snow mochi spirit and fell to the ground. The robber naturally took advantage of this to vanish without a trace... Hmph! I'm 100% sure that the snow mochi spirit is the mastermind behind this!

910110082.content: You tripped and fell? Were you hurt?

910110083.content: No, I'm alright! The snow was still soft. But everything in my bag fell out...

910110084.content: Are you sure you picked up everything?

910110085.content: Of course! Everything on the snow-covered ground stood out like stars in the night sky!

910110086.content: There was also a kindhearted man who came to help me. I was able to put everything back in very quickly!

910110088.content: But I wasn't expecting to run into someone who collects Tian Lu cinnabar here in Ain Soph.

910110089.content: "Tian Lu"...? Isn't that the name of a famous company in Xu Heng?

910110090.content: I think they recently opened a store here in Ain Soph called Linlang Groceries, which sells art supplies and gadgets from Xu Heng, like cinnabar and red seal ink paste, among other things. Might that be where he bought the cinnabar?

910110091.content: I see! I'd love to check out when I have the time, then.

910110092.content: What do you want to buy there, Jinwu?
