910110093.content: I'm running out of talisman paper, so...

910110095.content: I heard that the Sea Guardians Association is holding a lecture at Ain Soph Plaza today, so I came to take a look. I didn't expect to run into you here. Are you planning to go shopping at Linlang?

910110096.content: No... I wanted to cook, so I came out here to buy some tripe and fish...

910110097.content: I honestly can't tell what you might be making with that, Jinwu. Are you... making some Xu Heng dishes by any chance?

910110098.content: Yes! I want to share it with all of you.

910110099.content: Ah... In that case, let me help you. I know the stores around here very well.

910110100.content: Huh? Aren't you going to that...

910110101.content: The lecture starts in an hour. I've got more than enough time to drop the two of you off at the store and come back.

910110102.content: We ended up buying a ton of ingredients, and by the time we left, the sky had gone from dusk to night. Jinwu is now walking in front of me with visible excitement. The bright yellow of her dress glows in my eyes, like a little streetlight that warms the cold, snowy night.

910110103.content: Um? What's this...? Why do I see Pups and Shallot on it?

910110104.content: This poster has doll stickers all over it... Hmm? The "Ain Soph New Year's Eve Plaza Design Contest"?

910110105.content: The winner will receive a giant, custom high-quality doll, and... Wow, look at the cash rewards! Just who is so generous... Hold on, it says "Aether Gazer Division Eight" at the bottom here.

910110108.content: That's it! I'm going to win first place in this contest!

910110109.content: There are many outstanding designers here in Ain Soph. It won't be an easy task to stand out from the rest.

910110111.content: Do you have experience in designing themed plazas?

910110112.content: Oh, my confidence doesn't come from my abilities, but from the biggest holiday from back home, New Year's Awakening!

910110113.content: So, you want to come up with a New Year's Awakening theme? Hmm... That actually sounds promising.

910110114.content: I remember that there was a Xu Heng movie that was a real hit recently, it was called... Um... What was it called again? Anyway, Xu Heng culture is quite the in thing now. A theme like that could serve to help the people of Ain Soph get to know Xu Heng better.

910110115.content: Thou knowest me best, #{nickname}#! (Clears throat) Besides, apart from creating greater awareness and appreciation of Xu Heng's culture, I also want a giant Mi-Nian doll for myself!

910110116.content: Pfft! I knew what you're really after. But you know, it's interesting that Heimdall actually took inspiration from Xu Heng's God of Wealth when designing Mi-Nian. An interesting coincidence...

910110118.content: What did I just hear? How mortifying.

910110120.content: Step back! Step back! Let's maintain a three-meter distance from each other, please.

910110122.content: Oh my. Ookuninushi's left her room. I won't be surprised if all the snow turns red now.

910110124.content: It's just that... my budget request... So I...

910110125.content: Hmph. I don't wanna talk about it anymore.

910110126.content: I heard you two talking about it earlier in the afternoon. Have you come up with any potential new businesses now?

910110127.content: Mmm... Based on market research, there isn't much variety in the food offerings available in Ain Soph. I think this is a market gap that we can exploit.

910110128.content: However, the current rules surrounding the control of information between the various Sephirah Zones are rather strict, and using the usual means won't allow us to come up with innovative dishes that suit the taste buds of the people of Ain Soph.

910110130.content: Your face isn't telling me that you understood what I just said...

910110131.content: Oh, by the way Jinwu, aren't you from Xu Heng?

910110132.content: Indeed! Of Nanjiao Isle in Xu Heng am I born and bred...

910110134.content: Ookuninushi, we're trying to uncover potential new businesses here... We have to be serious about this...

910110137.content: Here's the spicy duck blood in chili sauce!

910110138.content: It looks... fiery. Look at all that chili oil on top...

910110139.content: Hehe! This is a famous dish in Xu Heng, and one of my specialties! Enjoy, everyone!

910110140.content: Argh... The fire... I can feel it in my chips now...

910110141.content: There's an old saying that goes, merry are the people of Xu Heng when there is spice. All of us in Xu Heng are really good at cooking spicy food. So I'm real confident!

910110142.content: What is this? It's really tasty...

910110144.content: Hehe, of course! This is one of the eight delicacies you must have at a New Year's Awakening feast in Xu Heng!

910110145.content: That's right. Didn't you say that for the contest, you want to submit a design using the theme of New Year's Awakening?

910110147.content: Many decorations in Xu Heng are made of Cloudsong Ore, as the ore helps them to hover in mid-air. But I can't find Cloudsong Ore here in Ain Soph...

910110148.content: I can take care of that!

910110150.content: This is an actual Xu Heng person standing before us here...

910110151.content: (Clears throat) Jinwu, I'm happy to pay you a creator's fee if you are willing to provide us with authentic Xu Heng recipes for our new business. I'll even help you with the design contest.

910110152.content: Once we have our dishes, we can use the plaza as a marketing venue. You really have a head for business, Mi-Nian...

910110155.content: So, I take that as a yes?

910110156.content: I'm really grateful for having the chance to let everyone in Ain Soph try the delicacies of Xu Heng, and it'd be even greater if I could recreate the grand scenes of New Year's Awakening on New Year's Eve! It makes me so excited to just think about it, I bet I won't even be able to sleep!

910110157.content: Ah, the energy and drive of youth.

910110158.content: Come on, Admin. We'll need your help perfecting the recipes.

910110159.content: Over the following few days, I underwent a near-total immersion program in Xu Heng culture. During the day, I'd pore over the themed plaza design, and at night, I'd help with selecting the Xu Heng dishes that'd be suitable for Ain Soph.

910110160.content: But even though I've been busy from dawn to dusk, surprisingly, every single day is filled with laughter. The holiday I'd originally thought would be gloomy and boring turns out to be warm and full of joy.

910110161.content: #{nickname}#, could you bring me the chili oil please...

910110162.content: Here. I've washed the veggies too.

910110163.content: Wow... look at the teamwork of you two.

910110164.content: Mi-Nian, so the new "dishes" you were talking about are to be made by Admin and... Hmm? Who's this?

910110166.content: (Clears throat) Good day to you! I am Jinwu, from Xu Heng. Pleased to make your acquaintance.

910110167.content: Can't believe she didn't just run up for a bear hug. Looks like she's learned her lesson...

910110169.content: How professional. We're talking to a senator of the Ain Soph Culinary Arts Association indeed.

910110170.content: The creation of new dishes for a new concept restaurant is an important matter for Aether Gazer's Food Department. Besides, I can't hold a candle to you when it comes to business negotiations, anyway.

910110171.content: This is spicy duck blood in chili sauce, bullfrog with pickled peppers, sautéed chitterlings, and steamed fish head with chopped chili pepper. Please enjoy!

910110172.content: They all look pretty good. Which one should I start with...

910110174.content: I don't like that facial expression...

910110176.content: This steamed fish head with chopped chili pepper... Why?! Why would you feed me something so good?

910110177.content: What am I going to do the next time I crave it and can't find it here?!

910110178.content: Although we have yet to submit our design for the themed plaza, the success of our Xu Heng dishes is a real shot in the arm for us. And soon, the new restaurant led by Mi-Nian opens with great fanfare.

910110179.content: Today, Jinwu and I have arrived at the opening of New Year Delicacies, a Xu Heng themed restaurant, at Mi-Nian's invitation, who is currently giving a speech at the entrance.

910110180.content: New Year Delicacies is now open! Come and try the most authentic Xu Heng dishes in Ain Soph! All are welcome!

910110181.content: Now, let's give a hand to our ace chef, Jinwu, and #{nickname}#, who will speak a few words!

910110183.content: Come on, #{nickname}#! Let's go up there!

910110184.content: Before I can react, Jinwu grabs me by the hand and walks to the front. I watch her speak about her understanding of Xu Heng cuisine with great excitement. In that instant, it seems like the whole world has been lit up.

910111001.content: Although we've achieved an early success with our R&D of Xu Heng cuisine, that didn't help us to make any headway in terms of a plan for the New Year's Awakening theme plaza. The atmosphere in the room is glum.

910111005.content: We've got to pull ourselves together!

910111006.content: Yes. Although the architectural styles of Ain Soph and Yu Jing are very different, there must be a way to recreate Xu Heng New Year's Awakening atmosphere here. We have to keep thinking.

910111007.content: The first version had too many red embellishments and didn't fit the architectural style of Ain Soph at all.

910111008.content: So, to tackle that problem, we switched to a variety of building materials in the second version. But we still couldn't recreate the "feel" of Yu Jing, and to be honest the style is not even close to that of Xu Heng.

910111010.content: Well, we still have three hours to the deadline. Let me try and think again... We might not be able to get the whole scenery of Yu Jing, but I'm sure we can recreate the atmosphere!

910111011.content: If we can't get the scenery of Yu Jing, what about Nanjiao Isle? Isn't there where you're from? Could we go in that direction?

910111012.content: I... have lived in Ruomu Palace since I was very young. When I look down the mountain from the pavilion, I can see the cattle walking across the fields. And when the breeze blows, you can even smell the rice ripening.

910111013.content: Then, how do you usually celebrate New Year's Awakening back at home, Jinwu?

910111015.content: For New Year's Awakening, we paste paper cuttings on the doors and windows of every house, and put up red lanterns along the cliff paths. The firecrackers start crackling even before the reunion dinner to guide and welcome the travelers home.

910111016.content: After having a hearty meal, people then release sky lanterns to make wishes for the future. You see these little dots of light rise slowly from the foot of the mountain into the clouds. Everyone goes around visiting their friends and relatives under the starlight, New Year's gifts in hand.

910111018.content: As the sky lanterns disappear into the mist, you also hear the fireworks through the thick night fog, chasing away the darkness and the cold of the winter with their dazzling light!

910111019.content: I'm guessing from your facial expression that you really like fireworks.

910111020.content: But of course. Fireworks are my—

910111024.content: I have an idea! Thank you!

910111025.content: Jinwu happily runs over to me and hugs me gently, her soft hair rubbing against my chin, and then leaves in a hurry looking like a really pleased kitten.

910111028.content: Looks like she's thought of something. Let's give her some time to organize her thoughts.

910111032.content: Guess I've been eating too much spicy Xu Heng food recently.

910111033.content: Jinwu unrolls a scroll, gradually revealing an ethereal-looking landscape painting before us. The echoes of the morning bell ringing in the mountains seem to be drifting from the paper...

910111036.content: Is Mi-Nian... turning into another Jinwu already?!

910111037.content: That's a pretty good idea. You can build a rather immersive experience with that. But...

910111038.content: If we are to base the design on this landscape painting, and add ornaments for New Year's Awakening... We may not have the time to get everything that we need.

910111039.content: If we want to save on purchasing costs... since this painting is rather figurative, maybe we can—

910111040.content: We can use holographic projection, perhaps?

910111043.content: I can take care of the proposal submission. I'm old friends with the folks over at Division Eight.

910111044.content: We'll leave it to you, then!

910111045.content: As we wait on the result, I finish some of the tasks I have yet to complete at Division Nine. As I am heading downstairs to buy myself a cup of coffee, I run into a confused-looking Jinwu, who is stuck in the middle of a crowd standing at the entrance to the Catterfly Comic Convention.

910111046.content: Hi! What character are you cosplaying?

910111048.content: Take a picture with me, bestie?

910111049.content: "Bestie"? What does that mean? Are you talking to me?

910111050.content: Jinwu? What are you doing here?

910111052.content: I thought these folks were from Xu Heng too, so I came over to take a look. But seems like I was mistaken...

910111053.content: Hmm, they're dressed up as characters from this movie about Xu Heng, Yu Jing Verses. Oh, by the way, apparently there's a very cool close-up shot of the fireworks at the end of the film. It's all over the internet.

910111055.content: I just remembered why I'm out here, Admin!

910111057.content: I was on my way to buy materials for fireworks! On New Year's Eve, I'm going to set off super beautiful giant fireworks, so big that everyone in Ain Soph Plaza will be able to see them!

910111058.content: You mean... Our design has been accepted?

910111059.content: Yes, #{nickname}#! They really liked our proposal!

910111060.content: Mi-Nian must have forgotten to tell me.

910111061.content: I think Mi-Nian was also the one who suggested the tie-up marketing campaign between Catterfly Comic Con and Yu Jing Verses. It's generated quite the buzz... I wonder how things are going with Ookuninushi's budget request for the Good Luck Detector.

910111062.content: Wait, didn't you just say you were getting stuff to make fireworks? But... I don't think the materials market is on this floor. Are you... lost?

910111064.content: I take Jinwu to the right floor and buy a ton of materials. Back at the dorm, she opened up the packaging while humming Xu Heng tunes, then started making her fireworks.

910111065.content: This seems rather dangerous. Do you need a hand?

910111066.content: I can handle this by myself!

910111067.content: I mean, I did nearly blow up a building once, but Master told me it wasn't a big deal.

910111069.content: "Not a big deal", huh? You and your master seem to be operating on a whole different scale...

910111071.content: Don't worry about me! I've been making fireworks since my adulthood ceremony. I'm a long way from blowing up buildings.

910111072.content: But it'd be nice to work with you, #{nickname}#. Hee!

910111073.content: Mmm, my hands are all dirty now.

910111074.content: Ha-ha! #{nickname}#, stop touching your face! You're getting ash all over it.

910111075.content: I seem to have made a mess of your room. Sorry about that.

910111076.content: Don't worry about it. Cleaning up won't take long.

910111079.content: Hmm... Because the way it looks to me, fireworks are just like everything in the world...

910111081.content: Well, it's like you have this nondescript black powder here. You work on it, refine it, and it becomes this incredible display that lights up the night sky.

910111082.content: Then in the end, it's a matter of ashes to ashes, dust to dust. As the fireworks burn up and their bright light fizzles, they returns to the world's embrace and start a new cycle...

910111084.content: Isn't it? I got it from my master!

910111089.content: As Jinwu's voice falls away, the fuses of the fireworks burn out, and the dazzling fireworks bloom in the dark night. The colorful light is dancing on Jinwu's large, clear eyes...

910111090.content: It was only later on I learned that Aether Gazer management had issued an order to seize all fireworks materials after they heard that someone was setting off fireworks in the company dorm. However, a certain Lady intervened and cancelled the order, perhaps after having witnessed the sheer beauty at that moment, too.

910112001.content: Before the New Year's Awakening themed plaza opens to public, Jinwu and I carry the giant fireworks she made to the site.

910112005.content: Why are you staring at me with that grin? Is there something on my face?

910112006.content: Hee! I'm just so excited knowing that everyone in Ain Soph will be able to see Xu Heng-style fireworks tonight!

910112008.content: Hi, I'm the person in charge of the New Year plaza. Are you #{nickname}# and Jinwu?

910112010.content: This is yours truly, the one and only!

910112011.content: I've heard about you two. I understand that you've brought homemade fireworks to add some zing to the event? That's really thoughtful of you. I'd like to thank you both on behalf of Division Eight.

910112013.content: You don't have to be so humble. Without you, we wouldn't be seeing so many visitors to the plaza on New Year's Eve this year.

910112014.content: We've specially reserved a spot in the sky garden for you to watch tonight's fireworks. You're free to help yourself to the food and drinks there, and there's an open-air kitchen, too.

910112015.content: Marvelous, just marvelous! But, if you don't mind me asking... When will I be able to get my doll?

910112016.content: Oh, that! It just came off the line, and the tracking shows that it's now stored on the first floor of the Aether Gazer building. You can go get it now if you like. Just tell them your name when you get there.

910112018.content: We've also included some gifts sent by your fans with the doll. There's quite a lot there, so you two may have to make a few trips.

910112019.content: Looks like we've created a hit... Hey! Jinwu! Where are you going?!

910112020.content: Come on, #{nickname}#, hurry up! That's my giant Mi-Nian doll we're talking about!

910112022.content: Ehehe. I've finally got my hands on you, Mi-Nian.

910112024.content: Look at the pile of gifts we've received!

910112025.content: Are these all thank-you letters? Oh my!

910112027.content: I'm just so happy that this is resonating with people.

910112032.content: Isn't this the hankie I lent you earlier?!

910112033.content: Now that everything's on track, I wonder how Ookuninushi is doing.

910112034.content: Oh. Her budget request was approved after Mi-Nian started the new business.

910112036.content: And Ookuninushi asked Mi-Nian to give me this... What is it called? A "Firecracker Crone" or something...?

910112037.content: I was just wondering what's in your bag. It's a drone, I see...

910112038.content: That's right. And this is a... um... "demonic control"?

910112039.content: You mean a remote control. Are you actually enjoying naming things in your own... style?

910112040.content: Hold this by the grip here. I'll teach you how to use it.

910112042.content: The map is in the upper right corner, and the red dot indicates the position of the drone in real time. Use this button here to set off the firecrackers...

910112043.content: Hold on, not now! You'll set the firecrackers off!

910112044.content: You're amazing, #{nickname}#! I would never figure out how to use this by myself.

910112045.content: I suppose you never had to use anything like this back on Nanjiao Isle.

910112046.content: Yeah. My master says they can be distracting.

910112047.content: Hmm. Look at the sender's address on this package...

910112049.content: Ah, my master replied to me! And there's a New Year's gift, too! Whee! I knew it! She hasn't forgotten about me! If only she knew what I've accomplished so far... she would be so happy!

910112050.content: Hmm? I see another package here—"Best Wishes for the New Year"? Are these written by your master? The calligraphy is beautiful.

910112051.content: Yes, my master wrote this herself! She said in her letter that this is her New Year's gift to everyone.

910112052.content: That's lovely. Is this the New Year's Awakening gift-giving custom you were talking about? I need to think about what I should give in return...

910112053.content: My master also says that... Oh, by the way, isn't it the ninth day of the twelfth lunar month today?

910112055.content: Exactly one year ago, Nian was sealed into the doll. It must be really agitated right now, so I have to reinforce the seal. Or else...

910112057.content: What happened to my cinnabar? And why is there red seal paste instead?

910112059.content: Darn it, have the Yaoguai's minions come to this place? As the protector of the people of Gaea, I will never sit still and wait for death! I'm gonna...

910112062.content: Remember you tripped and fell in an alley a few days back?

910112064.content: Maybe you accidentally took that guy's red seal paste, and he took your cinnabar.

910112065.content: Oh my. That... makes sense! But even so...

910112066.content: I remember that red seal paste also contains cinnabar?

910112067.content: Red seal paste is cinnabar that has undergone processing. It's not potent enough for talismans...

910112069.content: The seal on Nian's head has disappeared!

910112070.content: Relax. Haven't you been using the Astral Arcanum to reinforce the seal on it? I'm sure that will keep it in...

910112071.content: The words had barely left my mouth when I heard a loud noise from outside the window. A giant Nian had appeared on the bridge, sending the folks at the plaza running in all directions.

910112072.content: An urgent call came through from Shu at the same time.

910112073.content: Admin, we've detected the appearance of an unidentified Visbane over at Ain Soph Plaza Zone B. It's total chaos over there. We've dispatched our personnel to work with the Ain Soph Defense Bureau.

910112074.content: We've also deployed the Modifiers on duty to the plaza. What's your current location?

910112075.content: I'm near Ain Soph Plaza. I can be at Zone B in a few minutes.

910112076.content: Good. The field squad will be there soon. I need you to take command on the scene.

910112078.content: As I get off the call, I realize that Jinwu is already on her way out the door. I call out to her.

910112080.content: I will take responsibility for what I've done! Since I brought Nian here with me from Xu Heng, I will take care of it myself!

910112081.content: You haven't recovered yet. Even a fast walk would put a strain on you.

910112085.content: You brought Nian here with you, right?

910112088.content: Firecrackers! That was what my master used to subdue Nian back then.

910112089.content: And don't you have firecrackers in your bag right now?

910112091.content: Do you know how to use the drone now?

910112097.content: We finally defeated Nian after a long battle. It turned into a weak ball of energy and returned to the doll. Right now, Jinwu is busy using her weasel hair brush on the talisman to reinforce the seal.

910112099.content: Behave now, Nian. Don't be naughty again! I'll find your owner, I promise!

910112100.content: I'm off to the sky garden. All that fighting's got me hungry. See ya!

910112102.content: And so the year quietly came to an end with much laughter and frolicking. The long holiday which I'd thought would be lonely and boring became one that was full of joy thanks to Jinwu's presence.

910112103.content: It seemed that she could bring everyone together with just a snap of her fingers. When asked how she did it, she would just smile and say, "You can thank New Year's Awakening for that!"

115261003.content: A procession marches down a street in Omorfies. Neither large in scale nor disruptive to the other passersby, they just raise their small flags printed with a crest of a composite gear and shout out their slogans.

115261004.content: The passersby have also grown accustomed to this. In the month or more since Hades announced the reformation to the art scene, there have been too many anti-reformation demonstrations to count.

115261006.content: Pause, we need a pause here...

115261007.content: As it passes a magnificent building on the street corner, an abrupt silence falls over the procession. Lingering shouts from a few scattered marchers are quickly hushed by more attentive companions.

115261009.content: As a senator known to all in Omorfies passes the procession, the dozens of marchers are muted by an invisible pressure weighing down on them.

115261010.content: Not casting even a single glance toward the procession, she walks toward the building as if no one else were around. The marchers sigh with relief, but then grow furious.

115261011.content: Isn't that Senator Hades? Why aren't we protesting at her directly?

115261012.content: Tch, she was the one who proposed the reformation. You think she'd even deign to look us in the eye? She clearly looks down on the Fact-Finding Committee.

115261013.content: We're only here to march this time, don't go off-script.

115261015.content: If a reformation doesn't shake things up, it's either hollow at its core or veiled by a veneer of stability.

115261016.content: Trauma, anxiety, confusion, disorientation... Can you feel their displeasure, Hera?

115261017.content: With no sense of security, they huddle together for warmth and speak in a voice that, though unified, is not their own. They recoil into the cocoon of "the past," yet blame the clouds for obscuring their sunlight.

115261018.content: Sympathizing with those who pave the path to mediocrity with their bodies is a luxury I can't afford to have.

115261019.content: In their arrogance and idleness, they'd rather bind their own limbs than face the future... They have no one to blame but themselves for falling behind.

115261020.content: However, Hera, Omorfies doesn't require anyone to become a sacrifice.

115261022.content: For those who lose their way in the darkness but still have a heart for true art, I would not be disinclined to guide them back into the light.

115261023.content: Every moment of epiphany adds a touch of elegance to Omorfies' crown, and thus such an effort can hardly be taken as a waste.

115261024.content:
She saw light sprout in the darkness of night—

She saw warm, rapturous hues emanate from the night sky.

Her father plucked them down to adorn the courtyard.

Then, one day, her father left, taking the light of heaven and earth with him.

"Forget about them, child..."

Jeering, scornful words come in various shades of gray.

The drawn out view of his back amplified the pallor of the world.

115261033.content: I'm so sorry, Lady Hera. My mind wandered.

115261034.content: The prismatic latticing on the glass windows diffuses the glow of the setting sun, bathing the Society of Muses hall in light.

115261035.content: The slogans that pulled her into memories of the past are no longer audible. Seated in the guest chair, Chloe squeezes her fingers nervously as she explains herself in a quiet voice, not daring to look up at the disinterested Hera.

115261037.content: You mentioned to me that you're the daughter of the pyrotechnic designer Clement, and told me the story of his mishap in the show.

115261039.content: Many people were injured in the explosion, and the Society of Fireworks has hated ground fireworks shows ever since.

115261040.content: Not a single person from the Society came to see my father in prison, not even in his final days... They refused to acknowledge his art to the end...

115261041.content: And I suppose that's why you're seeking certification from the Society of Muses?

115261042.content: Yes... I've also heard that the Society of Fireworks has joined the Fact-Finding Committee. They reject anything that doesn't conform to tradition...

115261043.content: Indeed. Your work is but another attempt of defilement to their tradition, amidst other hideous forms of new arts that they hold in detestation since the revolution.

115261044.content: Chloe takes the suitcase at her side, which bears a flammable contents symbol, into her arms and opens it for Hera to see. There's a folded-up metal device inside.

115261045.content: Cylindrical pyrotechnic reaction layers are installed from the base to the top. The complex wireframe structure is roughly the height of a person when fully extended, so one can only imagine how much it weighs.

115261046.content: I've reconstructed all of my father's designs, all I need is the chance to be certified...

115261047.content: "Near Ground Deflagration Shelf Fireworks," if I recall correctly. The explosion lifts the fireworks device into the air, whereas the display results from the device burning and changing shape.

115261048.content: Yes, Lady Hera. It integrates mortar rack fireworks and display shell technologies.

115261049.content: A decent experimental idea. My only complaint would be the name. Have you ever given it a second thought?

115261050.content: The name was my father's idea, I don't want to...

115261051.content: Seemingly mired in an internal struggle, Chloe's gaze wanders.

115261052.content: It's all right. Names hardly matter when it comes to certification, so pay it little mind if you have to... Though, have you really not grasped the situation yet?

115261053.content: The Society of Muses only appraises unconventional art. You maintain your craft to be fireworks, and I don't see any reason for you to seek our certification.

115261055.content: Though staring ahead somewhat blankly, Chloe seems to have read between the lines. She knows she should leave, but she refuses to give up like this as she fidgets in her seat.

115261056.content: With no one else waiting in line to be certified, Hera lets Chloe continue to sit there as she examines a list.

115261057.content: A few minutes later, she hears a familiar rhythm of footfalls. She raises her head and looks towards the front door.

115261059.content: Everard's organizing another student art show, school isn't out yet.

115261061.content: When she turns to see Hades yawning as she enters the Society of Muses, Chloe nearly leaps out of her seat.

115261062.content: First time at the Society of Muses, huh? No need to be on your toes.

115261063.content: Hera, have you decided on the featured exhibits for the Salon this month?

115261064.content: Hera raises the list in her hand.

115261065.content: A little more time, if you would allow... Though I don't recall the art societies' roles during the first Salon. What made them change their minds?

115261066.content: Right now, anyone with a modicum of confidence is preparing for all the art appraisals available to them. Few people have approached the society for certification at all this month, much less those who came with fair work for display.

115261067.content: Oh? In case I've forgotten to mention it, It's not a formal invitation, so it doesn't matter if we abstain.

115261069.content: I'd like to see it at least in our charter, formal or not.

115261070.content: Hades goes upstairs. Hera tosses the list to the corner of the table, then looks at Chloe, who has hesitated to speak since laying eyes on Hades.

115261071.content: Hades is not available to offer her help. If there's anything you wish to say, speak freely.

115261072.content: Chloe's face flushes red as she nods her head.

115261073.content: Have you heard of the Salon?

115261074.content: An association, it is, that requires no certification to participate. Rather than professional judges, the audience is invited to vote for art pieces worthy of an award. The next Salon starts in ten days, if that interests you.

115261076.content: Since you don't believe the Society of Fireworks would do your work justice, why not test your fortune at the Salon? For an artist, an award from such events holds no less than acknowledgment from the Society.

115261077.content: That's true, but... my father's certifications for ground fireworks were revoked after the accident.

115261078.content: Even if my father might not be forgiven... I want to at least bring back the recognition that ground fireworks deserve.

115261079.content: Hera calmly regards the rather fired-up Chloe, the momentum the latter just mustered up now slowly receding.

115261081.content: Hera lifts her teacup from the table. When her fingers touch the cooled porcelain, she frowns and sets the cup back down.

115261082.content: Then I'm afraid my hands are tied here. You may see yourself out.

115261083.content: That's... what Lady Hera said to me.

115261084.content: It's already sunset and the sky is dark outside the brightly lit Society of Fireworks hall.

115261085.content: People with Fact-Finding Committee badges affixed to their clothes stream in and out with the unconcerned bombast of association heads. Some of them recognize Chloe, and a murmuring crowd begins to form around her.

115261086.content: ...Young people these days don't know anything. You've never heard of the Clement explosion incident?

115261087.content: I have, but that was years ago, right? And didn't Clement die in prison? How are there still people making ground fireworks?

115261088.content: That's Clement's daughter. She came here once two years ago, but her work doesn't hold a candle to her old man's. Heh, clinging to junk like treasure, she's practically begging for humiliation...

115261089.content: After repeating Hera's feedback, Chloe stands with her hands hanging at her sides, trying her best to ignore the jeers. Clutching at the hem of her shirt, she waits for the middle-aged man across the table to open her suitcase.

115261090.content: But the outcome is just as she anticipated.

115261091.content: Hmph. I warned you two years ago to stay away from your father's leftovers. You ignored my warning—fine. But then you ran off to the Society of Muses?

115261092.content: Fireworks may not be popular art, but an association that corrupts the traditional ethos like the Society of Muses does has no business appraising it!

115261093.content: Quentin Galvani, a renowned pyrotechnic designer from an artistic family and the President of the Society of Fireworks, brusquely pushes the suitcase back toward Chloe.

115261094.content: The unease Chloe felt at the Society of Muses pales in comparison to that which she's feeling in this moment—not only because of the difference in status, but the drudging up of the past as well.

115261095.content: Please, Quentin, I implore you to take a look. I've double and triple checked Father's design, nothing like that will ever happen again!

115261096.content: Look? What are you asking me to look at? That explosion injured more than a dozen people. Do you think anyone will accept ground fireworks again after that?

115261097.content: I can forgive Clement after all these years we've been through as friends. But can you say the same for the society, the art world? What's wrong is wrong, it's useless to keep dwelling on it. Now go home!

115261099.content: Quentin shoos Chloe away with an impatient wave of his hand, then turns his back to her.

115261100.content: Even more color drains from Chloe's face as she hears guffaws all around her. She picks up her suitcase and makes her way outside, her head hung low.

115261102.content: Containing his irritation, Quentin walks over to the window. His mind seems to wander into the past as he looks into the gradually darkening night.

115261103.content: Mr. President. That girl, Chloe—Just how are her pyrotechnic skills?

115261104.content:
She learned her basics more or less from Clement...
Why, are you interested?

115261105.content: Not in anything so vulgar. Perhaps her work can find its place in a comedy show, but not at the Fact-Finding Committee.

115261106.content: The graying Fact-Finding Committee official sniggers self-assuredly.

115261107.content:
That said, if something like this is at all serviceable, we'd still want to see its "value" put to good use.
Rest assured, Mr. President. The proposal will go exactly the way you're hoping.

115261108.content: The only light left now is the hazy afterglow of dusk at the very edge of the horizon. Chloe, not knowing where to go next, watches from a street corner as Omorfies' glittering lights are kindled by the fall of night.

115261109.content: It's so dark now, where else can I go...?

115261110.content: Maybe people will be able to accept ground fireworks in a few more years. Yes, I just have to try again in a few years...

115261112.content: She heaves a sigh, then casts another glance back towards the Society of Fireworks building. To her surprise, she sees Quentin in the distance walking in her direction.

115261114.content: Chloe looks around nervously—no one else around seems to be waiting for him.

115261115.content: Yes, Chloe, I'm looking for you.

115261116.content: Quentin clears his throat. His eyes travel from Chloe's puzzled-looking face down to her suitcase.

115261117.content: I was too harsh before. Everything I said was to keep up appearances. Don't take it too personally.

115261118.content: ...Do you still want to be certified by the Society?

115261119.content: Chloe is stunned. Life begins to return to her despondent eyes.

115261120.content: You'll... You'll help me? For really?

115261121.content: Hmph, I'd love to if I could. I may have nominally studied ground fireworks with Clement back then, but only he knew the core techniques.

115261122.content: If you want to vindicate your father's legacy, I certainly won't stop you. You'll have my full support. But as the President of the Society of Fireworks, I must take responsibility for all certified pyrotechnic works.

115261123.content: People need more than a few years to forget about the pain that accident has brought them. The more painful the experience, the deeper it's embedded in their memory.

115261124.content: I could forgive you, the entire Society of Fireworks could forgive you—but without Omorfies' forgiveness, there'll be no escaping the past!

115261125.content: I... I never thought about it like that.

115261126.content: Feeling as much like sincere counsel as stern criticism, these utterances leave Chloe at a loss for words. Quentin shakes his head sentimentally, rustling his expensive trench coat.

115261127.content: You're so anxious that you're ahead of yourself. So was Clement...

115261128.content: That young lady Hera did get one thing right though: Time has changed. An association certification isn't the only path to an artist anymore.

115261130.content: Correct, the Salon's not a bad way to go. Winning an award there means you've earned the public's approval. Then all you'll have to do is reattempt certification.

115261132.content: Hmph, what good is a work that can't even win an award in a competition where the bar's practically on the ground?

115261133.content: It's settled then. I'll be responsible for organizing the fireworks show for the Salon's opening ceremony. When you're finished with your fireworks, send them to the Society. I'll have them arranged in the program to increase exposure a little.

115261134.content: You'll really do all that...? Oh, thank you... Thank you, Quentin.

115261135.content: I'll give it everything I've got!

115261136.content: As her only hope turns into a determination to succeed, Chloe clenches her fists and her eyes are filled with earnest anticipation.

115271001.content: Hera watches the commotion on the streets from her window. The Fact-Finding Committee march, now several times larger than it was two days ago, is gradually being dispersed under the Knights of Convallaria's supervision.

115271002.content: Throngs of people as well as journalists gather around near and far to watch. Before the Knights of Convallaria arrived, none dared stand up to the already somewhat fanatical-looking Fact-Finding Committee members.

115271005.content: Rain drizzles down outside the window. The zealous marchers, unbothered by the raindrops dampening their clothes, continue to shout their slogans as they disperse.

115271006.content: This gathering is over. Now I require your cooperation in restoring the streets to their former peace.

115271007.content: You should be pointing that blade at those who seek to take the artistic order down to the ground with them, knight—not at me!

115271008.content: I understand what you're saying, but right now, you're the one plunging social order into chaos. Please refrain from engaging in further radical behavior.

115271009.content: If you have justice in your heart, don't sit idly by while Omorfies falls once again. We are already on the eve of an age of darkness, only the revelers are blind to the threat looming over the arts...

115271010.content: Invigorated by the media's and pedestrians' cameras, the marchers do not yield to the imposing Knights of Convallaria. Instead, they continue vehemently evangelizing as they walk.

115271011.content: The marchers disappear from Hera's line of sight, finally marking the end of the unexpected rally.

115271012.content: Was there any damage to the Society of Muses?

115271013.content: No. They were here to "change our minds," but the pressure of public opinion will have them change theirs if vandalism had occurred.

115271014.content: Good... The Knights of Convallaria have received a number of reports recently concerning people in possession of prohibited and dangerous materials. The Fact-Finding Committee is likely involved. My greatest fear now is that these marches turn into armed conflicts.

115271015.content: I've already confirmed the activities of Fact-Finding Committee members in the other associations with them... Shall I confirm the list for you?

115271016.content: Surely they wouldn't come to our "den of traitors to tradition" to involve themselves in "a third-rate association that no one asked for?"

115271017.content: You needn't pay their rhetoric any attention.

115271018.content: Do I look upset to you? As an art critic myself, I'm hardly a stranger to their slanders.

115271019.content: But if they keep bringing that racket to our front door, I won't stand for it.

115271020.content: They've been warned. Besides, the Society of Muses wasn't their sole target.

115271021.content: The first Salon put forward many artists who weren't association-certified, as well as some... more unusual art forms. The Fact-Finding Committee's aim is to boycott these emerging arts.

115271022.content: The next Salon is right around the corner, but their sporadic protests aren't making a difference. That's why they organized this massive march, so they could draw more attention to their cause.

115271024.content: Why the Society of Muses? We have never organized an exhibition before.

115271025.content: Their leader said it was a spur-of-the-moment decision. Many in the Fact-Finding Committee have a more traditional, old-fashioned mindset, and the Society of Muses is hardly exempt from their preconceived notions.

115271026.content: It's a highly inflammatory organization, a forum for all sorts of anti-reformation sentiments. If an artwork that deviates from tradition is promoted, they'll protest it.

115271027.content: For instance, the Society of Fireworks has provisionally added a "ground fireworks" performance to the fireworks show. They've denounced it on the basis of its medium as well as the accident this kind of performance once ended in.

115271029.content: That's the artist's name, yes. Do you know her?

115271030.content: She came to the Society of Muses a couple of days ago seeking certification, if my memory serves me well... Which reminds me, I'd like to check something at tonight's rehearsal.

115271031.content: If you intend to see the ground fireworks, I must advise caution.

115271032.content: While the incident with Clement was truly just an accident, I've heard that Chloe has completely replicated his design. There's no guarantee a similar incident won't happen again.

115271033.content: You can save your warnings for the Knights of Convallaria and other audience members.

115271034.content: If the explosion proves to be more destructive than Ladon's attacks, we will have Chloe's talent shine elsewhere, namely, handling the Visbanes...

115271035.content: Speaking of talent, Athena, you turned down the Society of Music's invitation to perform at the Salon?

115271036.content: The topic now veering beyond the bounds of official duty, Athena turns her head away slightly as her face twists into a somewhat unnatural expression.

115271037.content: As I've made it clear to the Society of Music many times, I'm the Commander of the Knights of Convallaria now. I will not be participating in any associations' plans...

115271038.content: Besides, I'm responsible for security at the Salon. I can't be on stage performing.

115271039.content: ...Hmph, just as I expected. You care for nothing other than the Knights of Convallaria.

115271040.content: You're neglecting your duty as an artist by letting your talents go to waste like that. If you'd show the world your gifts, I just might acknowledge you as a bona fide lady.

115271041.content: ...I shall take it as a compliment.

115271043.content: If there's nothing else the Knights of Convallaria can assist you with, I shall take my leave.

115271044.content: Hera watches Athena and her team depart from her window, then cradles her forehead in her hand as she heaves a sigh of regret.

115271045.content: Whoa... That's a lot of reporters.

115271046.content: Heh, relax. If dealing with reporters isn't your forte, I'll handle them instead.

115271048.content: The Salon—An event to be held on a monthly basis in which new artworks vie for the prize. Anyone can join, and any type of artwork can be showcased. In a departure from tradition, the winner is chosen by the audience rather than a panel of professional judges.

115271049.content: As an important channel of the "artistic liberty" promoted by the reformation, the Salon is held in the city's largest square park. Even the rehearsal, which is closed to visitors, draws swarms of cameras and industry professionals.

115271050.content: All manner of fireworks, already neatly arranged to the north of the square, are just waiting for their cue. Chloe, feeling like a fish out of water with all these eyes on her, follows Quentin to the observation deck in anticipation of their painstakingly prepared program.

115271052.content: Big events have their proceedings. Patience, child.

115271053.content: Quentin waves his hand, his eyes wandering around the observation deck. Suddenly, he raises an eyebrow and directs Chloe's attention in the direction of his outstretched finger.

115271056.content: It's all thanks to her that you got a second chance. If she hadn't declined to certify you, tonight's fireworks show would not be featuring ground fireworks.

115271057.content: Hmph, at least that girl has some sense in her. She'd be out of her mind if she agrees to certify anything like fireworks...

115271058.content: I see! I'll go and thank Lady Hera properly after the show.

115271059.content: Quentin's smug smile stiffens somewhat upon hearing this.

115271060.content: Well... greatness is only achieved when we let go of the past, and I guess you're right on that part...

115271061.content: It's starting soon. If you want to make great fireworks, it's also important to learn to appreciate them.

115271062.content: ...Without further ado, we'll commence this evening's grand occasion with a fireworks show! Together, we will behold the future of the arts!

115271063.content: With the host's announcement, the cameras turn northward. Chatter ceases between the Society of Fireworks members as they too turn their attention to the sky to admire their own work.

115271064.content: Following a five-second countdown, the first cluster of shining sparks shoots into the sky with a piercing bang. Just before its glimmer fades completely, explosions burst forth in all directions as countless slender, green tails of light unfurl like avian feathers. The fireworks show has officially begun.

115271065.content: Hundreds of fireworks are ignited in a pre-arranged sequence. Some ascend in turns, others are volleyed in rows together. Dazzling lights of every color scatter across the sky in dense clouds of smoke.

115271067.content: Chloe looks up. The brilliance of the manifold sights and sounds weighs down slightly on her spirit.

115271068.content: There's a vast world of traditional fireworks techniques awaiting you, if you're willing to learn. Just come and join the Society of Fireworks, I could instruct you. Your work would be just as good as theirs.

115271070.content: Chloe is about to say something when she's startled by a sound coming from behind her. She whirls around with a look of immense surprise on her face.

115271071.content: A near-ground explosion lifts a lightweight device as tall as a person nearly ten feet into the air. Special chemical agents on the device's exterior ignite layer by layer, outlining the contours of a green flower bud suspended in the air.

115271073.content: The device's folding frame extends and drops, expanding the aggregated petals outward. Meanwhile, the flames produced by the chemical agent in the inner layers gradually turn a shade of pink as they burn more fiercely.

115271074.content: A rootless lotus flower with lifelike petals of molten flames hovers in the air. After blooming to its apex, it quickly withers with a bang.

115271075.content: Its petals droop as the flames extinguish, followed by rueful sighs emanating from the observation deck.

115271076.content: So, these were ground fireworks? Not half bad.

115271077.content: Tch, outdated tricks, that's it... But I must admit, it took some skill.

115271078.content: Over the course of the ground fireworks display, only a few fireworks were sporadically launched to maintain the atmosphere. Everyone's focus, however, remained on the lotus flower.

115271080.content: She thought she would be jumping and cheering at this moment, or maybe crying tears of joy.

115271081.content: But when the fireworks actually go off and she hears the comments and praise of the journalists and artists behind her, Chloe instead just softly purses her lips together, tucking all these feelings of joy and relief into her heart.

115271082.content: Heh, that was more successful than I'd imagined. How does it feel to be the topic of everyone's conversation? Nice, isn't it?

115271083.content: I was just one contributor to the fireworks show. I'm just glad that everyone enjoyed it.

115271084.content: Chloe's modest response leaves Quentin feeling a little embarrassed, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.

115271085.content: The other fireworks stopped once the ground fireworks were lit... Did you plan it that way?

115271087.content: The ground fireworks display was good, but it was too quiet. If other fireworks were set off simultaneously, would anyone have even noticed the fireworks going off on the ground?

115271088.content: That's the reason I gave up on ground fireworks. At the end of the day, fireworks are an aerial art. How enchanting can those lights and sounds be without that aerial stage?

115271089.content: Of course Quentin would say something like that.

115271090.content: As a Galvani, he comes from a long line of traditional pyrotechnic artists. His grandfather was the pyrotechnic designer for the first Ardisis Ceremony. You'd be hard-pressed to get him to acknowledge a craft that wasn't passed down in his family.

115271091.content: After the fireworks show ends, Chloe and Hera talk as they take a path leading to the center of the square without drawing too much attention to themselves.

115271092.content: On the observation platform a short distance away, Quentin gives an interview as a representative of the Society of Fireworks. He speaks eloquently and with vigor.

115271093.content: Mr. Galvani, as a Fact-Finding Committee judge, what are your thoughts on the Salon this month?

115271094.content: I am an artist first and foremost. I only joined the Fact-Finding Committee to serve as a voice for my community. The Salon has given us many opportunities to showcase our work, and for that, it of course has my approval.

115271095.content: However, as an heir to traditional pyrotechnic arts, I've always taken an encouraging, but prudent approach to emerging art. The Salon is giving the opportunity to exhibit work not only to artists, but laypeople lacking a systematic view of art...

115271096.content: They could vaguely make out Quentin's words, but neither cares for the bureaucratic parlance of such interviews.

115271097.content: ...You aren't the least bit bothered by his statements.

115271098.content: Quentin... I mean, President Galvani, um, he's helped me a lot. His criticisms do make some sense...

115271099.content: It may have just been an interlude in the fireworks show, but I'm already really pleased that everyone could see and acknowledge my success.

115271100.content: ...A success? Is that how Quentin marked the performance as well?

115271101.content: Yes... President Galvani said it was more successful than he imagined.

115271102.content: I hardly agree... Was that your thought as well?

115271103.content: Dumbstruck, Chloe doesn't know how to respond. Hera restates her question.

115271104.content: Do you believe, that you've already succeeded with that work of yours?

115271105.content: Um, no, of course not. It was only a rehearsal, after all...

115271106.content: I'll rephrase the question—Do you see your current work at its finest? Did it fulfill your highest expectation?

115271107.content: If that whoosh of a performance would be a "success" to you, then you've already failed.

115271108.content: I... I don't understand. Did people not like the ground fireworks?

115271109.content: They liked them, naturally. When an audience is presented with a new toy that isn't terrible, they'll be elated to have their sense of curiosity satiated.

115271110.content: However, art is to sate people's aesthetic needs, not their fleeting curiosities.

115271111.content: Your display was acoustically earth-shaking, but lacking in substance. Over-reliance on the device designed for monotonous and mechanical flame configurations has led to insufficient integration with the natural stage and inadequate exploration of colors.

115271112.content: Overall, it was prosaic. No, one could even say it concludes itself with an anticlimax at the end without even an attempt in impressing the audience. And what was that final explosion? An AGI Mecha's self-destruct sequence?

115271113.content: Ephemeral beauty is to dazzle. But what you created and destroyed in five seconds was nothing more than a "shiny object."

115271114.content: Chloe goes quiet after hearing such ruthlessly cutting criticism. She hangs her head low for a while without saying a word.

115271115.content: Art isn't about displaying your technical skills, nor is artistic innovation merely some childish game that can be won with novel ideas alone. Labeling your work "art" yields you nothing when you fail to understand that.

115271116.content: Now, any other affairs of yours that require my assistance? I'd be very grateful if you can spare me from your "thank you for declining to certify me". I scarcely did anything.

115271117.content: With Chloe silent, Hera turns to leave. In this silent gap, the two hear Quentin giving his bombastic interview.

115271118.content: You haven't mentioned ground fireworks so far in the interview. What are your views on them?

115271119.content: As everyone probably knows, I also dabbled in the study of ground fireworks back then. However, since they possess no evident superiority to rack fireworks—but insurmountable safety issues—I ultimately abandoned them.

115271120.content: However, it has been a trying task to assess this immature, unstandardized technology. I'm also not deeply familiar with the technology that Chloe's using, and it's difficult to reach a conclusion on its safety from the perspective of traditional art. Therefore, it's currently in a trial and observation phase.

115271121.content: Should ground fireworks be proven yet again to pose latent safety risks, the Society of Fireworks will certainly play an utmost active role in addressing the issue. We would never allow anything that threatens the security of Omorfies to be hailed as "art"...

115271122.content: Chloe shudders, and Hera stops in her tracks.

115271124.content:
Yes...
President Galvani must just be saying that to keep up appearances...

115271125.content: Thank you very much, Lady Hera!

115271126.content: Chloe smiles and gives a slight bow towards Hera, whose back is to Chloe.

115271129.content: I'll make my fireworks even better. When the show officially begins... I'll be honored if you can present yourself once more.

115271130.content: The streetlamps above create a sharp division between the light and shadows on Chloe's face. Her earnest eyes don't show a trace of resentment or hesitation.

115271131.content: Hera glances back at her, then waves a hand goodbye.

115271132.content: The real show is in a few days. Be on your way, if you wish to make improvements.

115281002.content: A slight sound shatters the mirror of the night, then multicolored beads of light pour out from the cracks.

115281003.content: Then, from a barely perceptible origin point, ripples of color fan out like the ebb and flow of the ocean tide.

115281004.content: An understated, yet blazing light dilutes the shroud of the darkness. Boundaries are clearly defined then spilled over, overlaying to form bright lights and castles.

115281006.content: The floating colors, brilliant yet lonesome, burst like bubbles on Chloe's fingertips.

115281007.content: The boundaries that parted them now removed, the myriad colors wobble and flicker, then blend together into a hazy white glow that fills Chloe's vision.

115281008.content: She feels warm, as if she's standing in her very own playground of light at the center of this infinite darkness. Everything she seeks is here, the future is here...

115281009.content: Ugh, when did I fall asleep...

115281010.content: In the Society of Fireworks' lab, Chloe slowly sits up from the table. It's early morning. She rubs her eyes as they gradually adjust to the sparsely lit room.

115281011.content: Why's the computer screen lit up...? Oh, is the analysis complete? The analysis of the report from the simulation experiment?

115281012.content: Flame spread... Passed. Reaction buffering... Passed. Flame retardant safeguard... Passed. Total reaction expected error... 0.44%!

115281013.content: As she reads the text on the screen line by line, Chloe is quickly roused from her drowsiness. When she reaches the end, her mouth opens in excitement and astonishment.

115281015.content: After staring for a while at this perfect simulation report, Chloe snatches up the design from the table and rushes out the door. She soon stops, however, and a look of hesitation and apprehension surfaces on her face.

115281016.content: It has been a trying task to assess this immature, unstandardized technology...

115281017.content: We would never allow anything that threatens the security of Omorfies to be hailed as "art"...

115281018.content:
Was he really just saying that as a formality...?
I'll just have to test it and see.

115281019.content: It's a little chilly this morning at the Society of Fireworks, and there seems to be far less Fact-Finding Committee activity in the Society since the rehearsal ended five days earlier.

115281020.content: But this isn't the first thing on Chloe's mind. She heads for Quentin's office, knowing that he arrives at the Society early each morning.

115281021.content: Chloe? What are you doing at the Society this early in the morning?

115281022.content: I'd like to make some improvements to the fireworks for the official show... Here's my design.

115281023.content: Leaning back in his chair and flipping through a newspaper, Quentin takes the drawing Chloe passes him. He scans it twice, then presses it down on the table.

115281024.content: The Salon is less than two days away. How do you expect to make these changes with so little time?

115281025.content: I've considered the time constraints, and the improvements aren't too difficult to implement. Just give me one day... no, half a day to re-submit my work to you.

115281026.content: It's not a matter of difficulty. The fireworks to be displayed have all already been packed up, and now you want to extract everything back from it?

115281027.content: Um... But Lady Hera did point out some issues with my show. They could use some improvement...

115281028.content: Quentin's expression immediately sours upon hearing Hera's name.

115281029.content: Hera? She's notoriously critical. She could find fault with the golden ratio if you asked her. You'll go the rest of your life never making anything you're happy with if you listen to her.

115281030.content: The fireworks performances are all linked, and I meticulously designed the rhythm and gradation. Given everything's in order, there's no sense in making changes now on a whim. What do you think we are, short-order cooks?

115281031.content: Chloe can't help but take a step back as Quentin raises his voice. Quentin halts his rebuke and is silent for a while until his expression gradually softens.

115281032.content: There's nothing wrong with striving for perfection, but you need to take it one step at a time. The successful rehearsal was a good start, now the real show just needs to go without a hitch and you'll have nothing to worry about.

115281033.content: ...Okay, we've both wasted enough time here. I need to get back to work. You just take it easy and wait for the Salon to start.

115281034.content: Wait... And how is the time waited spent?

115281035.content: Not on tenterhooks, nor burning with impatience—just looking at the clock again and again, watching the hour hand hang in the gap between two worlds going in entirely different directions...

115281036.content: Clockwise, the passage of time is profoundly slow. Counter-clockwise, it passes almost instantaneously.

115281037.content: ...Without further ado, we'll commence this evening's grand occasion with a fireworks show! Together, we will behold the future of the arts!

115281038.content: It was seemingly only after hearing these words that Chloe was aware of being at the Salon.

115281039.content: In the centerless, unrestricted Salon Square, the lights dim following the host's announcement. Standing in the sea of spectators, Chloe feels a sense of weightlessness. The sound of applause permeating the square makes her head spin.

115281040.content: She hears the excited whispers of visitors and sees artists preparing to exhibit their works at the roadside. She looks up at the northern sky, but the sense of anticipation she should feel is subsumed by a nebulous emptiness.

115281041.content: Is this what I wished for...?

115281042.content: With no one accompanying her, she goes alone to look for a railing near the fireworks field to lean over. Resting her head in her hands, she waits for the fireworks show to begin.

115281043.content: Just like in the rehearsal, the first massive bundle of fireworks shoots into the sky, and green sparkles in the shape of a peacock's feathers are reflected in Chloe's eyes.

115281044.content: You needn't pay attention to the rules here, for there aren't any. Take it like an amusement park and you'll be fine. I'm going to catch up with an old friend. Meanwhile, why don't you go take a look around on your own?

115281045.content: Don't worry about the votes. At the rehearsal, lots of reporters were very interested in your fireworks, and the same can be said for ordinary spectators. Even if things don't work out this time, there's always next time.

115281047.content: Starting with the green, the familiar colors unfurl in the sky to a fixed rhythm. Casting a soft glow over the square, they tint the expressions of joy and repose on people's faces.

115281048.content: Chloe tilts her head up to watch for a while, then lowers her line of sight to around ten feet above the ground—the height at which her ground fireworks display will appear.

115281049.content: Exactly the same as in the rehearsal. Is this what I wished for...?

115281050.content: "Exactly the same as in the rehearsal." Even she's not sure whether it's relief or disappointment she feels at these words.

115281051.content: Oh! You're Chloe, aren't you! The one doing the ground fireworks?

115281052.content: Hey, that's not a polite way to greet someone...

115281053.content: Um, yes, that's me... Excuse me, but you are...?

115281054.content: We're just regular old fireworks aficionados. We saw your picture in the news coverage of the rehearsal.

115281055.content: I heard that your fireworks made it into the fireworks show? This must be an amazing opportunity for someone fresh on the scene!

115281056.content: Thank you... I just hope everyone enjoys the show...

115281057.content: This is not a good place to appreciate the fireworks, to say the least.

115281058.content: Chloe freezes as she hears footsteps approaching from behind her, certain that these words were addressed to her. She turns to see someone she wasn't expecting.

115281059.content: Lady Hera? To what do I owe the...?

115281060.content: Paperwork at the Salon Council required my attention...

115281061.content: Now, what are you doing here outside the venue? The show has started, hasn't it?

115281062.content: Oh... I can see them just fine from over here.

115281063.content: Except that anyone standing this close to the fireworks field would have to tilt their head back to see the fireworks above. It's hardly a good viewing spot, the lack of other spectators around being a case in point.

115281064.content: You're worried that no one will vote for you, and refrained from joining the rest of the audience?

115281066.content: If your goal is to win an award, the quality of your work from the rehearsal will certainly be insufficient. You may forgo the thought.

115281067.content: Yes, I understand... I was really inspired by your comments to improve my fireworks. They could be so much better.

115281068.content: Unfortunately, by the time I completed the improvements last night, it was too late to enter them into the show. They haven't been approved, so I can't bring them in...

115281069.content: Hera's eyes widen in astonishment as she sees Chloe hang her head in despair.

115281070.content: That sounds like to me a rather cursory improvisation. Now that you're no more in a rush, perhaps you can take the time to refine your work?

115281071.content: Meanwhile, do elaborate on your modification. Such an unadventurous event scarcely deserves my attention for a second time, so I need something else to keep me occupied.

115281073.content: Like a student suddenly called on in class, Chloe nervously rifles through her backpack in search of her improved design... but she can't seem to find it.

115281074.content: She laughs awkwardly, and after thumping her head a few times, she seems to think of something.

115281077.content: When it comes to fireworks, what people are most drawn to are their bright colors, right?

115281078.content: I cut the scale of the explosion and the size of the device, and divided several reaction layers to allow for more color variation, not restrained by fixed shapes...

115281079.content: I also added some buffering agents to slow down the burning speed so that people can see the color changes more clearly. Though, I might need to find another way to help it stay in the air...

115281080.content: If possible, I'm hoping I can make the fireworks appear more lightweight so they look more like they're floating. Cohesiveness would be another problem to tackle, though, since it can't be too fragmented either...

115281081.content: As she talks about her design, Chloe's timid exterior slowly falls away. Though seemingly talking to herself, her ideas flow smoothly.

115281082.content: ...And that's pretty much what I was thinking...

115281083.content: So you're talking about something that resembles color-changing coral?

115281084.content: Coral? Hmm, now that you mention it, yes.

115281085.content: Then why not take the opportunity to rename them "coral fireworks?" A huge improvement from the previous name.

115281086.content: Hmm... I'm not sure if changing the name all of a sudden is a good idea...

115281087.content: Um... Lady Hera... May I ask for your opinion on my ideas?

115281088.content: Not half bad. But your modification still seems to be confined to the framework of its predecessors—rising into the air, then exploding at a fixed position.

115281089.content: More room is to be had for emphasizing the colors, should you not limit the design to these parameters of a firework, still... I trust you would like to honor the name "ground fireworks?"

115281090.content: Chloe lowers her head and says nothing.

115281091.content: Your train of thought is too disjointed to be called a chain, but the fact that you were able to come up with all of this apace despite being an amateur is still impressive.

115281092.content: I have no intention to apply any pressure to you, nor do I have any right to. The form an artwork takes never limits the level it can attain, and you should bear that in mind.

115281093.content: The fireworks show now halfway through its program, the noise gradually softens. Hera walks toward a terrace where a crowd has gathered. Despite having no high-profile publicity, her arrival has attracted plenty of attention.

115281094.content: The coral fireworks will make their official debut soon. Are you not seeing them with your own eyes?

115281095.content: Please don't change the name all of a sudden...

115281096.content: Chloe rushes after her. Hera's affirmation seems to have given her more hope for the future.

115281097.content: (This is just the way it'll be this time. I'll have more opportunities in the future...)

115281098.content:
As the last sparks cascade from the sky, no more fireworks are launched.
Per Quentin's design, the ground fireworks are given ample space to perform.

115281101.content: This single sound, though like that from the rehearsal, already seems slightly different.

115281102.content: A strange feeling surges in Chloe's chest, stopping her dead in her tracks. She turns her head north...

115281103.content: Red. But not the warm, shimmering red of fireworks.

115281104.content: Fire. But not the controlled, restrained fire produced by chemical agents.

115281106.content: The panicked screams erupting across the site do nothing to muffle the ear-piercing noise of densely-packed explosions.

115281107.content: Nearby spectators watch in terror as a chain of flashing lights condenses in the vibration of the explosions to form a wave of fire. It quickly engulfs the entire fireworks field, then continues to spread outward.

115281108.content: From where Chloe's standing, all she can feel is hot wind assailing her face. The bright, searing flames consume her sense of distance and completely fill her vision.

115281110.content: Chloe's face is flushed, and the blistering waves seem to grow hotter from the heat in her chest, leaving her a cold shell of a puppet pulled by strings.

115281111.content: She hears Hera's voice from what sounds like an uttermost distance, but it seems as unreal as the ever-encroaching flames. She tries, but she can't will her body to move.

115281112.content: She knows she saw something, and she knows that something happened. The clamor that disrupted the Salon is interspersed with familiar words, but she can't remember anything...

115281113.content:
She saw light sprout in the darkness of night——

A fleeting bloom that became burning, bright despair.

"Deviant thing, begone from these halls of art!"

Alone in the long, dark night, the lights that wither in the air build a wall of solitude around her.

She hides in secluded desolation, in the gentle neglect of a silent place.

"Suffering will always be suffering, mistakes will always be mistakes, so..."

Let it go, let it go.

The infinitesimal dream has already been laid to rest...

115281121.content: The myriad colors wobble and flicker, then blend together into a hazy white glow—a happy haven suspended in endless darkness, like a candle flame about to go out.

115281122.content: I have... to grab hold of it...

115281123.content: She reaches out toward the candlelight, toward the dream that hasn't yet burned out...

115281125.content: Seeing Chloe and a few scattered spectators still standing by the railing, Hera immediately calls upon her Divine Power. Scarlet Scepter appears in her hand and establishes a link with the wave of fire.

115281126.content: But when she hears the screams behind her, Hera frowns. She does not immediately suppress the flames.

115281127.content: (Of all the places, it had to be somewhere this crowded... How irksome.)

115281129.content: A soft glow like starlight noiselessly rises from the edge of the wave of fire. Gleaming golden ripples then roll out and instantly sweep over the entire event site.

115281130.content: Heh, they were lucky to have me.

115281131.content: Her shining, starry Access Key hovering before her, Hera straightens out her dress, surveys her surroundings, then gives a satisfied nod.

115281132.content: Wispy white fractures flicker through the space, and everything in sight, including space itself, is completely still—the crowd on the observation deck, the wave of fire in the fireworks field, all the vegetation and buildings in the garden square...

115281133.content: In this frozen moment, only the flowing light carrying Hera's Divine Power continues on its course as its luminous glow dims the wave of fire.

115281134.content:
It has been a while since I asked for the Access Key's aid, but it seems to have answered my call accordingly.
Except...

115281135.content: When she activated Phantasmal Dawn, Hera nearly lost her link with her Scarlet Scepter, making it impossible for her to quickly switch Access Keys while maintaining temporal stasis.

115281136.content: She'd stopped time in order to buy time while avoiding others' eyes and ears, but she also needs Scarlet Scepter's power to dispel the flames.

115281137.content: Hera looks up helplessly toward Phantasmal Dawn—she knows this artifact can read her thoughts.

115281138.content: You had the honor of been born with me, that much I shall acknowledge. But shouldn't you get off your high horse for the occasion?

115281139.content: Ever since Phantasmal Dawn was summoned by Heimdall five years ago, Hera could sense the discord between the two Access Keys. The lofty, dazzling Phantasmal Dawn doesn't seem to deign to share Divine Power with other Access Keys.

115281140.content: Even though she was stronger with Phantasmal Dawn as her Access Key, Hera rarely used it in battle due to all the extra effort it required of her to maintain the connection with Scarlet Scepter.

115281141.content: This pride, though tolerable in the past, greatly displeases Hera at the moment.

115281142.content: Caprice and apathy are nary qualities becoming of a lady. You're an Access Key, and your temperament should agree with that of your master.

115281143.content: You've seen my endeavor in the Source Layer. Athena, a vexing knight as she is, can make for a decent partner under my guidance...

115281144.content: She pauses. With no one else around, a seldom-seen oblique expression appears on Hera's face.

115281145.content: No amount of diligence and cleverness is enough to acquire all the grace of this world...

115281146.content: ...Even I turn to others occasionally. You could stand to learn a thing or two about that.

115281147.content: This motionless world sinks into a brief silence. Phantasmal Dawn is shining more brightly than before, but it has slackened its pressure on Scarlet Scepter.

115281149.content: (...Now that I think about it, this is my first time attempting to communicate with it.)

115281150.content: Hera languidly averts her gaze. Discarding any seemingly superfluous thoughts, she prepares once again to switch Access Keys.

115281151.content: At this moment, the flames have only just swelled out from the fireworks field—they haven't reached the nearby spectators yet. As long as she can make the fire disperse naturally, there shouldn't be any grave consequences.

115281152.content: ...But were the ground fireworks really the cause of an explosion of this scale?

115281153.content: Giving the chain explosion-induced wave of fire a final once-over, Hera senses something strange about it, but she does not give it any further thought.

115281154.content: She summons Scarlet Scepter again, then thwarts the wave's outward momentum in the final seconds of the temporal stasis.

115281155.content: The flow of time resumes its course.

115281156.content: Seeing the flames fizzle out at the edge of the fireworks field, the spectators—though finding something unnatural about this anticlimax—breathe a collective sigh of relief.

115281157.content: The emergency response goes flawlessly. The fire department quickly cordons off the affected area, and the Knights of Convallaria, in charge of security at the Salon, begin arranging the evacuation.

115281158.content: Due to the accidental fireworks explosion, the rest of tonight's Salon program has been temporarily put on hold. We ask that all guests vacate the premises in a timely fashion. I repeat...

115281159.content: Like a bubble bursting in the water, muffled distant sounds pour into Chloe's ears from all directions and thrust her back into reality with an almost soul-tearing force.

115281161.content: Head down and mumbling to herself, she doesn't even notice as Hera approaches her.

115281162.content: We have yet to learn anything about the accident. What are you so upset about?

115281164.content: Chloe, looking stiff and vacant, doesn't even dare to raise her head to meet Hera's eyes.

115281165.content: But this... that was the second time... Will anyone accept ground fireworks again after this?

115291001.content: Rain... You may have mine, if you didn't bring an umbrella with you.

115291002.content: No, I'm fine, it's just a drizzle...

115291003.content: It's already late at night by the time the two leave the Knights of Convallaria office.

115291004.content: Hardly anyone is out on the streets in this drizzling rain. Its profuse lights shining no more, all that can be heard from the direction of the Salon venue is the noise of hurried repairs and construction.

115291005.content: Very good. Once again I'd like to remind you that the information you provided on your fireworks' gunpowder yield will be used as the basis of comparison for the explosion size as well as in our subsequent investigations.

115291006.content: The Knights of Convallaria will verify your other testimony during the investigation, so we expect all the information from you to be truthful and reliable.
