Apollo: "It's a bit of an exaggeration, but to be honest, it's about right!"

Thor: "No, it's not! I don't want anyone to think that about my teammates! It's just that I haven't given you the chance to reach your potential yet."

Thor: "Okay, so it's settled then. Thunder Squad Special Ops Plan A, go go go!"

Apollo: "You've brought the Visbanes, Captain, but... aren't there a lot more than you said there'd be?"

Thor: "Don't worry about the details, just get Zenkibo to detonate the explosives!"

116292038.content:
Apollo: "O-okay... Zenki, now!"

Zenkibo Tengu: "Roger! You might want to cover your ears... NOW!"

Zenkibo Tengu: "Huh? Why didn't they go off?"

Apollo: "Wait, you didn't bury them on our..."

Zenkibo Tengu: "Whoa! Landslide incoming!"

116292045.content: What idiot would bury explosives on their own side of the mountain?!

116292046.content: Oh... I'm sorry, C-C-Captain... I'm sorry...

116292047.content: Quit your whining and get us out of here. I still need to go fry those Visbanes. I doubt Apollo can handle them on his own...

116292049.content: It's just a scratch... The mission... cannot fail. I always prepare... for the worst-case scenario...

116292050.content: Captain, the Visbanes are going crazy!

116292051.content: Copy that! I'm... on my way!

116292053.content: After that op, you didn't mention Zenkibo's mistake in your report because you didn't want her to get into trouble. But that also meant that your injury didn't get any medical treatment.

116292054.content: While Thor is holding the tower up, Apollo comes up behind with his bow and smiles wryly as he recounts the memory she had forgotten.

116292055.content: And then you continued to cover for us by saying you were fully healed by the next day.

116292056.content: But I'm guessing you lied—no one can be crushed by that many rocks and just walk away without a scratch.

116292057.content: So you see? That guy has definitely altered your memories. How else could the invincible Thor have an old back injury?

116292059.content: I'm sorry, Captain, but Zenkibo and I are going to keep on holding you back. Because I know you would do the same for us without a second's hesitation...

116292060.content: Apollo lifts his bow and aims a solar arrow at Thor's back.

116292061.content: For once, we're going to rescue you, captain.

116292062.content: The arrow hits its mark. For Thor, who is already fatigued from holding up the tower, it's the last straw. Her protective lightning cover shatters, and she is crushed beneath the tower.

116292063.content: Even now, she manages to hold it up long enough for Zenkibo to escape.

116292064.content: How... could I have lost... to you...?

116292065.content: You didn't. We took advantage of your affection for the Thunder Squad, that's all...

116292068.content: Without the lightning cover, Skuld is now able to look straight into Thor's eyes and erase the false memories Uld had implanted.

116292069.content: Huh? That's strange, I'm... Hey, what's going on?

116292071.content: I remember being on a patrol with Odin and the Administrator, and we found this suspicious shadow... and then...

116292072.content: It's a long story. We'll tell you everything once you've rested up, Captain.

116292073.content: We're just going to take care of this guy and then we'll get you out of there!

116301001.content: Hehe... I have to admit I'm impressed. I never thought you'd win. It would seem that you're not overly happy with the story I've written for you all.

116301002.content: No matter. A good writer always listens to feedback from his readers. I'm confident I'll do better next time.

116301003.content: Uld, you're a Modifier too, right? Why go to all this effort to infiltrate Aether Gazer? And why control the other Modifiers?

116301004.content: I answered that question for you before, human.

116301005.content: I am a Modifier, but I am a higher level of being than the rest of them.

116301006.content: I was born perfect, without flaw, and with a little story called "destiny" on my side, I was to become a god and protector of this world.

116301007.content: The world is on the brink of collapse. You need a god to save you, but the bright light of divinity is dimmer than it's ever been.

116301008.content: Rather than sit back and watch you all perish under the weight of your own stupidity, I thought I'd create a new generation of Modifiers to protect and rule the world. It's the only way you can be saved.

116301009.content: Rubbish! You're the one who attacked the Modifiers and stole their Access Keys!

116301010.content: If what you say is true and you really want to lead the Modifiers in our battle against the Visbanes, why would you harm us?

116301011.content: The Modifiers are small, worthless and weak. For them to participate in the birth of a new god is the highest honor they could hope to achieve.

116301012.content: Uld sighs, and his gaze shifts to Skuld, who hasn't said a word.

116301013.content: 0705, I have no desire to change the minds of fools. The reason I possess these powers is precisely to correct such anomalies.

116301014.content: But you're different. We were born together. Surely you can understand where I'm coming from!

116301015.content: I don't understand what you're saying... But I won't let you hurt Tantan.

116301016.content: Uld's smile slowly fades. He shakes his head ruefully, although he looks like he was expecting this.

116301017.content: This is the fourth chance I've given you, 0705... It's also the last.

116301018.content: In my hands I hold the power to rule the world. I'm the one it chose, so I will carry out its will as well as my own.

116301019.content: He doesn't use the scepter to try and brainwash us again, but instead summons a black fog. It gently expands to envelope his entire body.

116301020.content: 0705, perhaps my only mistake was not killing you the moment I met you... You're a variable in my story, and I've indulged you long enough.

116301021.content: Stop all your posturing! You relied on Thor's strength. Yes, you were quick, but that only means you've got even longer to wait until your reinforcements arrive!

116301022.content: In other words, you're weak and outnumbered, meaning it's the perfect time to attack you!

116301023.content: Oh? Hahaha... Is that what you think?

116301024.content: The black fog surrounding his body solidifies and takes shape, until his original form is no longer visible. He grows rapidly, as does the feeling of danger.

116301025.content: The reason why gods don't take matters into their own hands is that they are showing the world their mercy.

116301026.content: If you think it's because they're powerless, then you're even more stupid than I thought...

116301027.content: Oh no, Tantan... Get out of the way!

116301028.content: The black fog condenses around the scepter and then dissipates in an instant. Two wings blacker than the night itself unfurl in the sky.

116301029.content: I shall be kind to you and show you the true beauty of my crusade!

116311002.content: Zenki, show the traitors what we're made of!

116311003.content: Yes! Get a load of this!

116311004.content: Not again...! Wake up, you guys! The real enemy is behind you!

116311005.content: Thick black fog trails from Uld's axe. We have completely underestimated his strength in his true form.

116311006.content: As we fight, our companions find themselves once again falling victim to Uld's mind control. Skuld, having no combat experience, is helpless to erase their distorted memories...

116311007.content: Explosions of solar arrows and bullets rumble through the air, and visible cracks criss-cross Ver's shield.

116311008.content: None can escape the destiny that's been set for them. The time has come to meet the ending I've written for you.

116311010.content: Tantan, it's all right. You can let go.

116311012.content: She gently brushes away the arm I'd been using to protect her. Her cherry-colored hair fluttering the breeze, she walks calmly toward the unspeakable carnage happening around us.

116311014.content: It's fine. It's like I said—I won't let anything happen to you.

116311015.content: Suddenly, there's a whooshing sound by my ears and a gust of cold wind blows from behind me.

116311016.content: Maybe it's because the wind dissipates some of the black fog, but suddenly the world doesn't seem to be as dark as it was before. A ray of light pierces the darkness like the rising sun.

116311017.content: I can finally see Uld properly. He doesn't look like a teenage boy anymore.

116311018.content: A mix of black and a hellish deep purple, the enormous shell hangs ominously in the air. It's the perfect embodiment of death.

116311019.content: The light is coming from somewhere else, though. Its purity and holiness are in direct opposition to Uld's sinister black fog.

116311020.content: White and gold intertwine. As bright as the moon. As radiant as the sun.

116311021.content: That's so weird... Was I just brainwashed again?

116311022.content: What's that light? I can feel its warmth... My wounds don't seem to hurt anymore.

116311023.content: Even though your mind has forgotten everything, your body still instinctively knows how to use its power...

116311024.content: But without Access Keys to replenish your Divine Grace as you abuse your power, how much longer can you continue down this road of self-destruction?

116311026.content: I don't know what to say to Ver. All I know is that this new incarnation of Skuld makes me feel even more anxious than the arrival of Uld's armed reinforcements.

116311027.content: Black chains shoot out of the center of the glow and wrap themselves around Uld's hands.

116311028.content: The moth drawn to the flame? I never wrote such a thing into the script...

116312002.content: Uld is almost knocked off his feet by our concerted attack, and weariness has not blunted the power of Ver's attacks—as he stumbles, she leaps high into the air to deliver the final, crushing blow.

116312003.content: Her sword easily shatters the black fog Uld hastily throws up in defense, and comes slicing down to his indifferent, even gleeful, face.

116312004.content: Not bad, not bad... I almost let you guys win.

116312006.content: Just before the blade makes contact, Uld's body suddenly disappears with a flicker, leaving behind nothing but a cloud of black fog.

116312007.content: However, Ver's sword strikes something hard in the fog. She struggles against it, the two Divine Powers gradually draining in the ensuing vibrations.

116312009.content: A black gold sword stands where Uld once was. Although it took the full brunt of Ver's attack and was slammed into the ground, it does not appear to have sustained any damage.

116312011.content: Three giant light swords shoot toward Ver from the hangar entrance. She manages to parry all three of them, but the force of the impact pushes her back to where we're standing.

116312012.content: A ring of purple light surrounds the battlefield, and the black fog finally dissipates. Uld is standing a distance away, completely unharmed, but now there are two more figures by his side.

116312015.content: Even though we managed to overpower Uld with Skuld's help, he's still one step ahead of us...

116312016.content: I trust you no longer have any doubts about the dichotomy between us? And your friends have turned against you, too. How much longer do you think you can resist?

116312018.content: Tyr and Hodur obey Uld's order without any hesitation, each one charging forward to attack their target.

116312020.content: Already exhausted from the fighting so far, Ver is unable to withstand both Tyr and Hodur attacking her at the same time, and she blacks out.

116312021.content: I'm now the only one left on the battlefield who's still conscious...

116312022.content: I draw my pistol and point it at Uld, but he doesn't seem to care.

116312023.content: You were the commander in that little battle just now weren't you, human?

116312024.content: The black fog surges toward me like a tidal wave. Uld examines me with interest, a golden pattern forming in his right eye.

116312025.content: You have talent, at least better than those dregs in CORG. I think you'll serve me well.

116312026.content: Uld smirks as he points his scepter at me.

116312027.content: The black fog obscures my vision and begins entering my body, burying its black seeds deep inside me.

116312028.content: Then, as though commanded by some dark force, they awaken and grow into hundreds of ferocious little blades that begin burrowing toward my heart.

116312029.content: They gnaw at my nerves, slowly extinguish the light of my sanity, imprison my memories, and fling my sense of self into a bottomless pit...

116312030.content: Just as the last bit of my consciousness is about to be consumed by the darkness, it is penetrated by a blinding ray of light.

116312032.content: Pink light, cherry-colored like her hair, melts away the darkness like boiling water on snow.

116312034.content: My head is spinning, but I see someone who looks like Skuld standing in front of me.

116312035.content: Close by, Uld's movements seem a little stiff. He slowly drops his scepter and the golden light in his right eye goes out, as though he were... afraid?

116312036.content: I empty my gun in his direction, but all of my bullets are deflected by Tyr's sword.

116312037.content: He looks like he doesn't want to use his powers against you. And it's not just that they wouldn't work... It's like something terrible would happen if he did. That's why he's so scared...

116312039.content: You're amazing, Tantan. You understand after only seeing it once, but it took me all these times before I figured it out...

116312041.content: She turns back to look at me. Now she's back in her original form, I notice that her hair is now streaked with gray. Her angelic smile hasn't changed, though.

116312042.content: I wish I'd discovered it sooner, so that I could have spared you all of these horrible stories.

116312043.content: I'm the one who dragged you into this. You could have left at any time.

116312044.content: Skuld shakes her head. She's still smiling at me, but I can see tears shimmering in her eyes.

116312045.content: Don't talk like that. It's not over yet.

116312046.content: Even though we now know Uld's weakness, there's nothing we can do to change things...

116312047.content: I try to think of ways to foil his plans, but there's nothing we can do to reverse what has already been done. We've lost...

116312048.content: As my thoughts wash over me, a strange feeling begins to rise in my heart.

116312049.content: Why hasn't Uld attacked yet? It's been ages...

116312050.content: Time seems to have slowed down.

116312053.content: Skuld smiles at me, and then a sudden gust of wind begins blowing next to us.

116312054.content: That's it for now. I'll handle the rest

116312055.content: I'm really happy I was able to remember you all these times, Tantan, and that I could be by your side until the end...

116312057.content: I didn't. I stopped using them after you told me not to.

116312058.content: And I don't have enough memories left anyway.

116312060.content: Wait, you're not saying that this was all...

116312061.content: She doesn't answer me, and continues to ignore all the fighting around us.

116312062.content: She slowly closes her eyes. For an instant, it's like I'm in a trance—I can hear her saying a name, saying something familiar, but it's too far away to enter my consciousness.

116312063.content: And then time comes to a complete standstill.

116312064.content: The scene around me breaks apart into fragments, like a dropped jigsaw puzzle, revealing the pure white of this world behind it.

116312065.content: Skuld is walking toward the edge of the shattered world, toward the "real" future.

116312066.content: I will end all of this.

116312067.content: I'll cherish the past few days with you as my dearest treasure. I never thought I'd get to experience anything like that...

116312068.content: I've seen so many places, met so many people, and talked so much to you.

116312069.content: I won't let anything bad happen to you, Tantan. Nor to those you love.

116312070.content: Time has been stopped in the dream. A white tunnel forms, surrounded by floating cherry blossoms. It leads the way to an unknowable future.

116312071.content: Skuld walks in the opposite direction to the petals. She doesn't look back.

116312072.content: Dreams always start at places far, far away from our memories. If I can be there, then all the nightmares are just dreams that will never come true.

116312074.content: I just wish we'd have been able finish the promise before all the dreams fade out.

116312075.content: I just wish, we could ride the Ferris wheel, together.

116321001.content: ...And so, even though the squirrel wasn't able to buy a dream, she realized that she could make her own beautiful dreams.

116321002.content: That's it for the story today. Good night, Skuld.

116321004.content: Rata goes to leave the room. Before she closes the door, she takes another look back.

116321005.content: Rest up, Skuld. You seem worn out lately.

116321006.content: Worn out? But I've been sleeping well...

116321007.content: Still, thank you, Rata. You rest up too. I heard the teacher say recently that your vital signs haven't been so stable.

116321008.content: Ahaha, I'm fine. It's probably just all the extra training I've been getting assigned lately...

116321009.content: I'll be fine after a good night's sleep, so don't worry about me, Skuld. Good night again!

116321011.content: Rata waves, then gently closes the door.

116321012.content: When the catheter in the chamber enters her arm, a steady stream of Divine Grace is delivered to her body, suppressing the fatigue that had started to rise.

116321013.content: "Sleep" doesn't mean "rest"—it refers to lying down in the chamber like this and replenishing your Divine Grace after your body's been overburdened from Access Key use.

116321014.content: The teacher said that since we weren't originally able to use Access Keys, our bodies can't produce their own Divine Grace. So, we have no choice but to do this regularly.

116321015.content: Tomorrow I'll get to hear the rest of the story from Rata.

116321016.content: How did the squirrel get the ability to dream? The story jumps around so much that I just don't get it.

116321017.content: These thoughts pop into my head before the lights in the chamber go out.

116321018.content: The next day, Rata was dismantled.

116321019.content: I watch as the teacher lifts Rata's arm, which was removed from her body, and loudly demands an explanation from the students around her.

116321020.content: We examined her and even reset her parameters. This shouldn't have happened...

116321021.content: Maybe it had something to do with her Access Key? Our research into that power is still incomplete, so we might have overlooked something by only considering her android functionality...

116321022.content: I don't want to hear your excuses. I trust you know what will happen if Project Forgetower is exposed...

116321023.content: How did she escape this time? Didn't CCTV cameras see anything?

116321024.content: She must have used her Access Key, all the footage from that time is gone...

116321025.content: The teacher looks really angry. She slams Rata's hand hard into the table, breaking it to pieces. Does this mean Rata won't be able to tell me stories anymore?

116321026.content: 0705, you and 0703 were close, weren't you?

116321027.content: Yes, Rata would often tell me stories.

116321028.content: Then how does seeing her destroyed make you feel?

116321029.content: Feel... Why would I feel anything? The teacher never said that I have to feel something.

116321030.content: 0704... Do you have feelings then? About Rata?

116321031.content: And I thought you were different from the others...

116321032.content: 0704 turns away from me, seemingly not wanting to talk to me anymore. Speaking of which, this is the first time he's come up and talked to me.

116321033.content: 0704 always stays in his room being gloomy. He doesn't go out except for training and checkups, and he didn't talk to anyone other than Rata.

116321034.content: 0704 was the last person to see Rata before she left, so the teacher had him thoroughly examined.

116321035.content: Does 0704 wish he could hear more of Rata's stories too?

116321036.content: 0704's physiological analysis is complete. Next is 0705. Come on, chop-chop.

116321037.content: Check them thoroughly, we haven't confirmed whether 0703's anomaly is contagious. Subsequent oversights will NOT be tolerated!

116321039.content:
Rata: "The white rabbit told the squirrel about his vibrant dreams. This filled the squirrel with yearning. 'Why can't I dream?' she thought to herself."

Rata: "The squirrel went to ask the owl, and the owl said, 'I can dream, but I disdain dreaming. Only reality is worth pursuing. Dreams are utterly insignificant."

Rata: "The squirrel recoiled at the owl's cold response. Refusing to accept it, she left to find another animal to ask."

Rata: "The wizened old goat told the squirrel about his dreams. Speaking at a leisurely pace, he recounted his dreams of reverie of bounding between rainbows. Just when the squirrel was about to ask the goat how to dream, she discovered he was already fast asleep."

Rata: "She then went on to ask the fox. The fox said, 'Sure, you can dream, but it will cost you.' But the squirrel didn't have any money, and could only abandon that idea."

116321045.content: Rata was taken away once before. Even though she'd forgotten a lot of things when she came back, she was still Rata and quickly went back to being her old self.

116321046.content: But I really can't remember the things I've forgotten, like when I was awakened or why I exist. I always admired Rata for being able to remember those things.

116321047.content: But it seems like Rata won't be coming back this time.

116321048.content: Rata... I still wanted to ask you whether I understood yesterday's story correctly.

116321049.content: With a sway of her fingers, the fluorescent lamp's cool light changes, and lively rays of light swirl between her fingers.

116321050.content: I remember all the stories that Rata told me, but I don't understand most of them.

116321051.content: Are fairy tales really that hard to understand? They're more confusing than the teacher's orders...

116331001.content: Where did you go today, Skuld?

116331002.content: A tall building, and cats, many cats, all inside boxes, and lots of doors... The teacher wanted me to take something.

116331005.content: Looks like the teacher only does these things in your dreams so that nothing goes wrong.

116331006.content: Good, this way you'll get to go out again. As long as it's in a dream, you can do anything you want. Not like us...

116331007.content: Do you want to go out, Rata? The teacher said none of us can go out, me included.

116331008.content: But the teacher never said that you can't dream, right? If it happens in a dream, it doesn't count as disobeying the teacher.

116331010.content: You can go and see the world outside for me, Skuld. Even if it is only a dream.

116331011.content: You're not carrying out the teacher's orders, you're going outside as you wish, because you want to...

116331013.content: Pain receptor analysis complete. Data signature is normal. Should... Should I keep going?

116331014.content: Errr... probably better to run the test one more time. Commander Paracaesar said it herself after all: we have to make absolutely sure that we don't miss anything.

116331016.content: 0703's ability to "change perceptions" was always dangerous, I said so from the start, but nobody listens to me. It's no surprise the situation got out of hand.

116331017.content: But 0704's ability is even more dangerous. Just to be on the safe side, reset his parameters after we're finished here.

116331018.content: Okay. Looks like we're in for another late night...

116331019.content: Huh? You just tried to read my memories, didn't you! Who gave you permission to do that?!

116331021.content: 0705, your abilities are valuable, but their side effects are obvious.

116331022.content: That's why you must complete the mission as soon as I give it to you. Find the correct answer, then report everything that happens back to me.

116331023.content: You're the freest of us all, Skuld. The teacher limits what the rest of us can do, but you can do it all in your dreams.

116331024.content: So, will you go and see the world outside for me?

116331025.content: The lights go out, and everyone has returned to their rooms. As per the teacher's instructions, the catheters in the chambers are buried in their arms.

116331026.content: The teacher's orders are absolute—everyone's time is scheduled precisely and exactly, with not a single minute to be wasted.

116331027.content: —Unless it's in a dream. Even several days in a dream are simply a passing moment in reality.

116331028.content: If it's in a dream, then it doesn't count as disobeying the teacher's orders...?

116331029.content:
Rata: "The squirrel thought, perhaps the reason why she couldn't dream was that she hadn't seen enough things. All she needed to do was leave the house, and she would inevitably see concerning things that she would need to dream about."

Rata: "She once heard her parents say that if you went thirty feet north of their house, turned left, then climbed ten feet up, you'd find a treasure grotto."

Rata: "Everything you could ever need was in that grotto, but the squirrel's parents clearly didn't want her to know that. So, the rebellious squirrel decided to go looking for the grotto herself."

Skuld: "But if her parents found out, wouldn't they be angry?"

Rata: "The squirrel knew what the consequences would be. But she... she didn't want to stay home anymore. She wanted to take the treasure and fly far away."

Skuld: "Her parents... must not have treated her well."

116331035.content:
Rata: "They actually treated her fine. She just always felt like something was missing."

Skuld: "Missing what?"

Rata: "Well, it was missing, so naturally, the squirrel didn't know what it was."

Rata: "Later, the squirrel found the treasure grotto—but there was no treasure inside."

Rata: "—All that was there was a passageway, and at its other end was bright, shining sunlight."

Rata: "She crawled out through it, and the sunlight outside dazzled her eyes. The unfamiliar sights and gleaming view that stretched out before her left her stunned. When she eventually returned to her senses, she realized she was looking at the wide world."

Rata: "So, this is the treasure grotto.' the squirrel exclaimed. Then she scurried into the depths of the jungle."

116331042.content:
Rata: "And that's where our story ends."

Skuld: "What does 'the wide world' mean?"

Rata: "Oh? You haven't learned those words?"

Skuld: "I understand 'wide' and 'world,' but put together, I..."

Rata: "So, you haven't seen mountains or the ocean? If you'd seen those, you'd definitely understand."

Skuld: Mountains? The ocean...?"

116331048.content: Thank you, Rata. Did you find the treasure grotto too?

116331049.content: Thirty feet, ten feet... It really is here. But there doesn't seem to be any sunlight.

116331050.content: Moonlight shines on the steel cladding of the city's towering buildings, overlapping with the dazzling city lights to create a spectacle like I'd never seen before.

116331051.content: Is this... the treasure grotto that Rata told me about?

116341001.content: Well now! You can see just about everything in Ain Soph, but you don't see getups like that every day.

116341003.content: Rata wanted me to see the outside world for her, but I don't know where the mountains or the ocean are. I'll just have to go as far as I can and try to remember more things.

116341004.content: Before I know it, the sun is up, and there are more people around now. This is my first time talking to anyone outside the Institute.

116341005.content: With a pretty face like that, it'd be a waste not to have nice clothes to go with it! Tell you what, I'll take you someplace nice.

116341007.content: You betcha, they got loads of nice clothes there. I'm sure they'll have just the thing for you.

116341010.content: What is it? Can I not wear new clothes?

116341011.content: No, you just agreed so quickly. If you trust people that easily, you're gonna get duped sooner or later.

116341012.content: Duped...? Are you a crook then?

116341013.content: Do I look like a crook?

116341014.content: I don't know, I've never seen one before... But if you're not a bad person, then it's fine.

116341015.content: Hahaha, you're a funny young lady.

116341016.content: The man laughs, shaking his head. Without saying another word, he turns and takes me to an out-of-the-way shop.

116341017.content: Oh! I'm sorry, not finding what you're looking for?

116341018.content: No, it's just that there's no one here... Are you the manager?

116341019.content: Hardly, I'm just a humble clothing designer.

116341020.content: There isn't even anyone to keep an eye on the place. Aren't you worried about shoplifting...?

116341021.content: Uh... I barely get any customers in anyway. I couldn't afford to rent a space in a shopping center, so I've just had to make do here.

116341022.content: Over here, Miss! Haha, whaddya know—two customers at once! Business is booming today!

116341023.content: Is this... the nice place you were talking about?

116341024.content: The man seems shocked by what I said. Did I say something strange...?

116341025.content: Sir... It'll be easier for you if you just confess.

116341026.content: Miss! You can't just say the first thing that pops into your head!

116341027.content: Don't get the wrong idea now! I just saw that she had those weird clothes on, so I brought her here to get some new ones, that's all.

116341028.content: You don't look like you have any money on you, though...

116341029.content: Money...? As in currency? No, I don't have any.

116341030.content: Forget it... A girl like you would definitely run into problems dressed like that out there by yourself. Here, take this on the house. I'll consider it advertising for the shop.

116341032.content: Whaddya think? I think it suits you to a T!

116341034.content: No problem, no problem! Have you found what you're looking for?

116341035.content: Sorry, but I... don't seem to have any money on me?

116341036.content: (This must be Zenkibo's doing. I bet she lifted my credit card and cash as I was heading out the door...)

116341037.content: What! Who goes out shopping without any money?! Get outta here!

116341039.content: You remind me of my daughter when she was little.

116341041.content: That's all in the past now... If you like this one, you can have it.

116341042.content: Just remember to help spread the word about my shop when you can!

116341043.content: Seeing the shopkeeper wave goodbye to me, I do the same in return as I leave this building called a "clothes shop."

116341044.content: But where should I go next? Rata wanted me to see more of the outside world for her, but I don't know where to start...

116341045.content: After its initial novelty wears off, all the city leaves me with is an endless feeling of alienation.

116341046.content: I look past a giant wheel nearby with lots of little cabins hanging from it until my eyes land on the face of a clock tower.

116341047.content: 8:30... Time to monitor my vital signs.

116341048.content: ...But there's been no broadcast, and I don't see any monitoring rooms around here. Does this mean I don't have to do it?

116341049.content: I'm a little hungry... Is there no scheduled breakfast at 8 o'clock here either?

116341050.content: That house across the street... There's so much bread in there...

116341053.content: A big, four-wheeled steel device honks as it rolls past me. As I step back, my new shoes seem to catch on something, sending my body backward—

116341056.content: You're... the one without any money... at the clothes shop

116341058.content: Your hand's bleeding. It'll get infected if it's not taken care of.

116341059.content: The stranger takes alcohol wipes and band-aids out from a small bag.

116341060.content: Can you do it yourself...? Never mind. Here, give me your hand. I'll help you do it.

116341061.content: You took all this out with you, but no money...?

116341062.content: Enough about the money, okay! I have these with me because... because bumps and scrapes are par for the course in my line of work.

116341064.content: Is the band-aid on too tight?

116341065.content: I move my hand around and only feel a slight tugging sensation from my joints. I shake my head.

116341066.content: Great. Remember not to jaywalk next time, it's dangerous.

116341067.content: Is this your first time in Ain Soph? Where are you headed?

116341068.content: To... the wide world outside that Rata talked about.

116341069.content: The wide world... That's a poetic way of putting it. What advertising slogan is that from?

116341070.content: The stranger leans against the pole in a thoughtful manner.

116341072.content: Oh, so you want to see the ocean. We're near the west coast of Core City now, you can get to the beach on foot. Come on, I'll take you there.

116341073.content: ...I'll be able to see the ocean if I go with you?

116341074.content: Yep. It's a boundless sea along the coast of Ain Soph. Wanna go see it together?

116341076.content: (This drug that the Cryptics developed to suppress the "mark" should be effective for another three hours. That should be enough to get me there and back...)

116341079.content: (I can't exactly come out and say that I'm the Aether Gazer Administrator... What was that barbecue restaurant I went to with Ver yesterday called? "CharGrill" or something...? Let's see...)

116341082.content: Not Tantan, Tongtong... Ah, forget it. It's close enough.

116341083.content: Let's go, Tantan. To the beach.

116341084.content: Stop right there! You, get away from 0705!

116341086.content: Save it, the director told us to act as soon as we found the target!

116341088.content: I'll come find you again next time. Promise you'll take me to the beach then?

116341089.content:
The person named Tantan stares blankly at me.

Before the bullet reaches the nape of my neck, the dream world instantly compresses—

like a lotus flower bud bursting open into full bloom, its white petals obscuring my view.

116341091.content: It's still night in the room, and everyone's resting in their chambers. The lights are out and all is quiet in the Institute as always.

116341093.content: The teacher said that we aren't allowed to leave the Institute under any circumstances, and we must follow orders.

116341094.content: But Rata said that if it's in a dream, it doesn't count as disobeying the teacher.

116351001.content: Can you take me to see the beach?

116351002.content: Huh? Sorry, do I know you...?

116351004.content: Hey! Not only did you come into my store without any money, you're also gonna turn down a request from such a cute girl?

116351005.content: We have to hurry, or they'll catch us.

116351006.content: Who will? Don't look at me like that, sir. Fine, fine! I'll take you. We're not far from the beach anyway...

116351007.content:
Then, Tantan took me to the beach.

Rata, you told me that I would understand when I saw the mountains and the ocean. But how come I still don't get it...?

The waves noisily lap against the shore one after another. I want to use the water to wash the sand from between my toes, but just a few steps later they're covered in sand again, so I give up.

But there are so many people here...

Everyone's wearing all sorts of different outfits, and they seem happy just to be in the sun and watch the waves do the same thing over and over again.

I've never seen a pure emotion like this on the face of anyone in the Institute—not the people in white, not even the teacher. I didn't think... something like this existed.

116351013.content: So? Is Ain Soph's beach the way you imagined it?

116351014.content: Yes. The way the water shines like gold in the sunlight is very pretty. The breeze also feels nice. But... I still don't understand what the "wide world" is.

116351015.content: Why do you keep referring to it like that?

116351016.content: I had a good friend before who suddenly disappeared one day. She said that she hoped I would go see the wide world outside for her...

116351018.content: My guess is that your friend didn't want you to go somewhere in particular, she just hoped you could meet more people and get out of a sad situation as soon as possible.

116351020.content: That's right. Humans are social creatures. No matter how bountiful or vast a place is, if you're there all by yourself, you'll probably feel lonely.

116351021.content: Whereas if you have friends, you can share any troubles you have with them and go anywhere together.

116351022.content: I see... But I don't know how to meet more people.

116351023.content: We've met each other, haven't we? Oh, right... What's your name again?

116351027.content: (But I only just came up with this name...)

116351028.content: So, as long as I'm with you, Tantan, I can share any of my troubles with you and go wherever I want to go?

116351032.content: I don't know, I just suddenly felt like laughing. Am I not allowed to do that...?

116351033.content: If you didn't look like you were asking a question, I would have thought I did something to make you mad.

116351034.content: Of course you're allowed. You're free to laugh when you feel like it and to do whatever you feel like doing. You don't need anyone else's permission.

116351035.content: That's not what I learned before.

116351036.content: (Have you spent your whole life in a boarding school or something...?)

116351037.content: Alright, well, some friends and I have plans to go to the amusement park this afternoon. I'd better head back.

116351039.content: Yep. Why don't we exchange contact information?

116351040.content: Contact information...? I... don't have a personal communication device.

116351041.content: Stop right there! You, get away from 0705!

116351042.content: Save it, the director told us to act as soon as we found the target!

116351043.content: They found me... See you next time, Tantan.

116351044.content: Next time...? What do you mean?

116361001.content: Rata, I still don't understand what you meant. But I think I understand now why the squirrel wanted to be able to dream.

116361002.content: Before, I just followed the teacher's orders every day, trying to find the right future. And when there weren't any orders, I just followed the mission list, and trained, and trained...

116361003.content: This is the first time I've ever looked forward to "the future," or wanted to see my own future—

116361004.content: I want... to see Tantan again.

116361005.content: So? Is Ain Soph's beach the way you imagined it?

116361006.content: It's beautiful, thank you... Are you happy, Tantan?

116361007.content: I'm only here because of you, aren't I? But since you asked, work's been really busy lately, so it's actually nice to be at the beach for a change.

116361008.content: Are you usually very busy, Tantan?

116361009.content: Yep... How do I put this? I actually lost a big chunk of my memory, but fortunately, my friends took me in. They've been really good to me, so I always try to help them out whenever I can.

116361010.content: You lost your memory, huh...? You're a lot like me, Tantan. I forget things really easily too.

116361011.content: I see... In that case, why don't you try keeping a journal?

116361013.content: You said you often forget things, right? Then why don't you try writing them down first?

116361014.content: But I don't know how to write... Maybe I could before, but I don't remember how to anymore...

116361016.content: Tantan gets up and goes over to a small cart, then comes back holding some kind of red, square machine.

116361017.content: This is a camera. If you see anything you want to remember, just press this shutter button—

116361018.content: Here. This way, even if you forget something, you can remember it again when you see your photos!

116361019.content: (Good thing Aether Gazer invests in shops here. They just checked my information and put it on my tab...)

116361020.content: Since Tantan put this red camera in my hands, does that make it... a gift?

116361022.content: What are you taking a picture of me for?

116361023.content: I'm just doing what you told me to, Tantan—I'm taking a photo of something I don't want to forget.

116361024.content: You wouldn't forget me that quickly, would you...?

116361025.content: I'll try my best to remember you.

116361027.content: I reach out into the emptiness before me, as if lifting something. I press an invisible "shutter" button, as if I'd overcome the barrier of the dream and could still operate the camera that's no longer there.

116361028.content: What a shame... If I leave the vision, the camera and photos disappear too.

116361029.content: If only I could get a camera outside of the dreams, and go somewhere outside of the dreams... and meet Tantan in real life...

116361030.content: No, I can't—That's against the teacher's rules. I can't disobey the teacher's orders...

116361031.content: I sigh deeply, letting go of the sensation of emptiness coming from the corners of my memory. Then, I close my eyes again.

116361032.content: Then please... just let me have another good dream...

116361035.content: How many visions have I had altogether?

116361037.content: It's still quiet in the Institute. What's tomorrow morning's training program again...? I can't remember.

116361038.content: All I remember is that Tantan gave me a camera and said we could go out and do something together next time.

116361039.content: I want to go out and do something fun with Tantan... But I get caught as soon as I get to the beach, and the dream stops there...

116361040.content: Right, if I don't go to the beach, then I won't get caught... Tantan said that they would go to the amusement park with their friends that afternoon. I just have to go there and find them...

116361043.content: 0704... You're not resting in your chamber?

116361044.content: 0704 doesn't answer me. His resting room is next door to mine, so I can hear him moving, step by step... It sounds like he's in front of the lock on the door.

116361045.content: 0705, you used your ability just now, didn't you?

116361047.content: Just a guess... Even without using my ability directly, I can sense changes in someone's memory as long as I'm close enough to them.

116361048.content: You've changed too, 0704... You never used to talk to me before.

116361049.content: Heh, is that so? Maybe I figured out a few things, and now I'm more accepting as a result.

116361051.content: I was the last person Rata saw before she ran away.

116361052.content: She told me that my ability shouldn't be locked away in this place. She said I should get out and do what I'm meant to do.

116361053.content: Get out... But the teacher created us, and her word is law. We can't go out.

116361054.content: Her so-called "orders" are nothing more than a perception she planted in our bodies. Perceptions are memories, and memories can be changed.

116361055.content: That was Rata's final parting gift to me.

116361057.content: Heh, looks like Rata didn't choose you in the end. Then I guess there's nothing more for me to say to you.

116361058.content: 0704 doesn't speak to me again. He said he wants to go out and do what he wants to do. The truth is, I want to go out too. I want to go somewhere besides the beach with Tantan so we don't have to talk about the same things every time...

116361059.content: But the teacher's word is law, and the teacher said we can't... Hmm? The teacher said...

116361060.content: Why can't I remember what the teacher said...?

116371002.content: A child clutching a balloon runs past me, followed closely by two anxious adults. There are even more people here than there were at the beach, all gathered in groups at both the exit and entrance.

116371004.content: I got changed at that man's shop and asked him where the amusement park is. He said that this is the biggest amusement park nearby.

116371005.content: Based on how I was caught last time, the people from the Institute will find me in three hours. I have to find Tantan before then.

116371006.content: But... what if this isn't the amusement park Tantan's going to?

116371007.content: I look around, but all I see is a sea of identical dark-haired heads.

116371008.content: Hee-hee! Nah-nah nah nah-nah, you can't catch me!

116371009.content: As I'm lost in thought, a child—not watching where he's going—runs into my side, knocking me over.

116371012.content: I hear a familiar voice, and when I look up, I see the face from my memories.

116371013.content: You've hurt your hand. Just a sec—I have some band-aids with me, I'll get you fixed up.

116371015.content: I saw you just standing there and looking around. Are you by yourself? Did you get separated from your family?

116371017.content: I see... My friends are waiting for me, so how about I take you to the security office so you can find your family?

116371018.content: No, I can't go there, they'll find me...

116371019.content: They'll find you...? You mean, you ran away from home?

116371020.content: I want to try that one. Can you go with me?

116371021.content: Me? But we only just met, and my friends are still waiting for me...

116371022.content: Fine, fine, okay. Just don't give me that face.

116371023.content: (Looks like she snuck out without her family knowing. If it's just one ride, it should be fine. I'll just use my communicator to let Ver and the others know what's going on.)

116371024.content: Okay, but I'm letting you know now, I can only go on one ride with you. Then we're going to the security office to look for your family.

116371026.content:
I try the teacup ride with Tantan for the first time. The round chairs crisscross and spin in a multicolored, shifting halo of light. When we get off, Tantan holds on to me for support and dry-heaves for a while.

Tantan can't handle rides like that, but then why don't I feel anything? Oh well. I won't make Tantan ride that one next time.

The second time, we go to the guessing game booth. Tantan's luck is really bad, but I don't want to leave empty-handed. So, I use my vision ability to guess where the squirrel plushie is.

Tantan looks so happy at guessing right, saying that the luck has finally turned around. I probably shouldn't tell them the truth...

The music coming from the merry-go-round sounds so nice. Other than the bell ringing at the Institute, I haven't really heard any other music.

But Tantan looks bored—Tantan must get to hear all kinds of music all of the time. I don't know a lot about Tantan, I'll have to try and ask my questions next time.

116371032.content:
The drop tower is the ride we've done the most times, but I don't actually like it.

Dropping so fast like that reminds me of how my ability training feels, like dropping into a bottomless pit...

But of all the rides, the drop tower is Tantan's favorite. Tantan smiles and laughs as we fall. Do humans feel excited when they fall? I don't get it...

I'm willing to go on this ride that I don't like because Tantan likes it. Hmm...? Why is someone else's happiness more important to me than my own feelings?

Rata... Since leaving the Institute, I think I understand more things now. But now even more things don't make sense to me.

Still, right now, I feel happy in my dreams. Next time, I want to ride the Ferris wheel with Tantan...

Rata... Rata... Who... am I talking to...?

Who... is Rata?

116371039.content: A white light shines through, and I realize that I'm back where the marker is. I feel dizzy from the glare in my eyes.

116371040.content: Vital sign monitoring time! Come out and report in order!

116371042.content: Dream time is much shorter than real time, but if too many dreams are stacked on top of each other, it moves time forward faster.

116371043.content: How many dreams did I have last night...?

116371046.content: I'd get caught if I tried to use my ability in the daytime. I'll just have to wait until it's time to rest again. Why isn't it nighttime already...

116371047.content: I want... to see Tantan again.

116371049.content: After my training is finished, I return to my chamber in my room.

116371050.content: It's time to rest now, and all the lights in the hall should be going out soon, as usual—but even after waiting for a while, nothing happens outside.

116371051.content: Not only is it not dark yet, an even brighter light keeps shining in so intensely that I can feel it through my closed eyelids.

116371052.content: Then, the siren wails over and over again, and an awful burning smell makes it impossible for me to stay in my chamber any longer.

116371053.content: Attention everyone, test subject 0704 has attacked the researchers and escaped! The target broke free from Area 4—Ops team, gear up for immediate pursuit!

116371054.content: I repeat, 0704 has attacked staff and escaped! Ops team, ready your equipment for immediate pursuit!

116371056.content: I crack open the door and peek outside. Several fully-armored ops team members are rushing toward the elevator.

116371057.content: Hurry! We have to bring 0704 back before all hell breaks loose! Project Forgetower is as top-secret as it gets, and it's up to us to make sure it stays that way!

116371058.content: I push open the door. The hallway is lined with fallen bodies—they're the people in white that monitor our vital signs during the day.

116371059.content: Other than 0704's and my living quarters, all the other ones are shut tight. Even with all of the noise, everyone else is obediently staying in their chambers.

116371060.content: The Institute is in complete disarray—the place is littered with broken and overturned lab equipment, and bullet holes and scratches mottle the snow-white walls like ink splotches.

116371061.content: This isn't a vision, this is really happening...

116371062.content: A thought tugs me with a force like irresistible magic toward the dark tunnel I've run down countless times in my dreams.

116371063.content: Can I leave now? If I go now, I'll be able to see Tantan.

116371064.content: Everyone's looking for 0704 right now, no one will notice if I leave...

116371065.content: My body moves just like in those crystal-clear memories. I've walked down this path so many times before that I don't even need to think about what I'm doing.

116371066.content: I follow it until I reach that ground I've seen countless times in my dreams, only now I'm truly stepping on it for the first time—

116381001.content:
Rata: "And so, the girl finally awoke from the dreams that had once so transfixed her, and from there embarked on a journey in search of a friend."

Rata: "What troubled the girl, however, was that everything she had seen in her dreams had already faded into yesterday—the reality that awaited now was unknown to her."

Rata: "Where was her friend from her dreams? Where should she go to find them? Would the wicked Institute workers find her? What was the other escaped artificial lifeform planning...?"

Skuld: "Who are you..."

Rata: "Oh my... That's right, by now you will have already forgotten me."

Rata: "That's okay. I'm just someone who disappeared from the physical world and now only remains as a few fragmented thoughts in your cognition."

116381007.content:
Rata: "There's no need to be concerned with who I am, just think of me as a fairy who's come to help grant your wish. Do you still remember what you want to do, Skuld?"

Skuld: "I've... left the Institute, and now I want to see the real Tantan."

Rata: "No, no, no, that was a long time ago already. Think carefully—your visions shouldn't have eaten up your memories of everything you've experienced in this time."

Skuld: "A long time ago... I remember now, that's right... I've already seen Tantan."

Rata: "Yes, that's right."

116381012.content: But I made things really difficult for Tantan.

116381013.content: Tantan kept losing important friends. I tried to help every way I could, but nothing worked.

116381014.content: No matter how hard I try, Tantan always dies in the end.

116381015.content:
Rata: "Yes, very good. You're remembering now. Fate is a cruel thing, isn't it? No matter how many futures you imagine, you can't escape the clutches of what's to come."

Rata: "But fortunately, now you have a chance to stop it all from happening. Everything that you just remembered—none of it's happened yet, right?"

Skuld: "Yes, they were all dreams..."

Rata: "When you left the Institute, the path you walked was real. But the countless times you witnessed your friend die, you actually fell into a false dream. So then, where is the point connecting these two things?"

Skuld: "The point connecting them... Do you mean the marker?"

Rata: "That's right. You may have lost your memories, but the connecting point really exists. All you need to do is find that marker, and it will lead you to the future you seek."

Rata: "Try to think back, even if it's just fragmented images. Try to remember what happened after you left the Institute..."

116381022.content: After leaving the Institute... I... wanted to find Tantan. But there were people everywhere, and I didn't know where to look for them.

116381023.content: The street, the beach, the amusement park... That was all from yesterday. I went to the original spot and waited there, but we didn't end up meeting like we had on that day.

116381024.content: But... I still saw Tantan in the end.

116381025.content: What sort of circumstances did you meet under instead?

116381026.content: I... was attacked by someone, and I was hurt very badly.

116381027.content: Who was it that attacked you?

116381029.content: Ha... If it isn't Skuld. It's only been a few days, and here we meet again.

116381030.content: So? Change your mind since we last talked?

116381031.content: I don't know what you mean.

116381032.content: Come on, playing dumb? I'll just take that to mean that your answer hasn't changed then.

116381034.content: Uld raises his staff at me, and the sight frightens me at an instinctual level. I pick up a trash can from the curb and throw it at him, then run down an alleyway without looking back.

116381035.content: Think you can run away like last time?! I've already filled up on the Divine Power of other Modifiers, so I'll be writing the story from here.

116381037.content: Two gunshots ring out, and I feel a stabbing pain coming from my arm. I cover the wound on my limp right arm with my other hand, but the injury slows me down.

116381038.content: Hear my proclamation... and join me on the throne as my second-in-command, Skuld.

116381039.content: After I've corrected this world and delivered it from its flaws, I will rule over it.

116381040.content: As he slowly steps toward me, his right eye and the end of his staff glow with a dazzling golden light.

116381041.content: I worked so hard to get out of there, and I still haven't seen Tantan or said everything I have left to say to them...

116381042.content: I don't... want it all to end like this...

116381043.content: Just when I think I couldn't feel any more hopeless, he suddenly drops the staff.

116381044.content: The golden flame in his right eye is instantly snuffed out, and his right arm trembles violently, as if in tremendous pain.

116381045.content: Why are your memories all screwed up?! What did you use your ability to do, you freak?!

116381046.content: His voice is contorted and tinged with fear. He looks at me as if I'm a monster.

116381047.content: You there! You're the one who's been attacking our modifiers, aren't you?!

116381050.content: But it doesn't matter. In your present state, it's not long before you're "scrapped" anyway. After all, you don't have many "memories" left now, do you?

116381051.content: "Scrapped?" What does he mean by that?

116381052.content: The teacher said that humans die. Is that what being "scrapped" would mean for me?

116381053.content: I dimly hear the footfalls in the alley become that of three people, two of which abruptly appear before me. They don't sound like Uld...

116381054.content: But who else could it be at a time like this?

116381057.content: There's no malice in the voice asking the question, but my body tenses up all of a sudden. I raise my head in a daze and look up at the two people standing beside me.

116381058.content: The brightly shining moon illuminates two figures in the dark—one is a woman with silver hair dressed in black, and the other is...

116381059.content: Thank goodness... it's you... I... I finally found you...

116381061.content: I finally found you... I'm so glad...

116381062.content:
Rata: "And so, even though life hangs in the balance, this is cause for celebration—the girl was rescued at the last moment by her dear and cherished friend."

Skuld: "Then that wasn't the vision connecting point, was it, Rata?"

Rata: "Bingo. Looks like you remember now. Wait a minute, you can remember my name now too?"

Skuld: "No, it was just a guess. Uld mentioned you before."

Rata: "I see..."

Skuld: "But your voice is so gentle and familiar. We must have been good friends before, right?"

116381068.content:
Skuld: "I'm sorry... for forgetting you."

Rata: "..."

Rata: "That's right. We were very, very good friends."

Skuld: "Uld keeps talking about 'last time' because I was attacked by him once before, and then Tantan saved me."

Skuld: "It wasn't a side effect from my visions that made me forget that memory, it was my injuries. I remember all of it now..."

Skuld: "The first time I encountered Uld, I made a marker. I escaped the dead-end and got away from him until I was caught again the second time, and that's when I met Tantan."

116381074.content:
Skuld: "That marker was the connecting point between this reality and the dreams. It's also the last chance I have to save Tantan and their friends."

Rata: "But that Tantan hasn't met you yet. If you go back to that time, it would mean that in the true reality, Tantan hasn't even seen your face before."

Skuld: "Yes, I know."

Rata: "In that case, do you still want to go back there? There are still other markers, although some people probably won't be able to be saved..."

Skuld: "That's okay, Rata. I'm already content with the experiences I've had."

Skuld: "Besides, if our paths cross again, I'm afraid that things will turn bad all over again... After this time, I probably won't have any memories left."

116381080.content:
Rata: "It looks like you've made up your mind then. Do you still remember the way back?"

Skuld: "To be honest, it's been a long time since I last went back to such a far away marker."

Rata: "Don't worry, you've practiced this so many times, it's second nature to you now."

Rata: "Do you know how to make a paper airplane? It's like throwing a paper airplane, just throw your consciousness toward your destination—"

Skuld: "Tch... Hehe, it just so happens I do know how to do that."

Rata: "Cognitive modifications don't leave much data on your chip, so I won't be able to go with you. Will you be okay by yourself, Skuld?"

116381086.content:
Skuld: "Don't worry, Rata. I'll be fine."

Rata: "To be honest, it's my fault that Uld ended up this way. If he hadn't misunderstood what I said to him back then..."

Skuld: "Rata, I'm taking off now."

Rata: ""Oh... Heh, alright. Smooth travels."

Skuld: "Just like throwing a paper airplane. Hah—and then..."

Skuld: "I go and save Tantan."

116391001.content: Before the dream dissipates, I probe my pockets in search of something. In a seam in the fabric, I find it—the small charm from the barbecue restaurant that Tantan gave me.

116391002.content: When I return to the marker, tightly clutching what will inevitably disappear will only make it hurt that much more.

116391003.content: But for me as I am now, perhaps that pain will be another precious memory.

116391004.content: I lift up the charm and let it dangle in front of my eyes, feeling everything pass by around me—everything in existence, sounds, then the footprints along the way.

116391005.content: I'm so sleepy. Where... are you?

116391006.content: Exhaustion descends on my body. Is it because I've been away from my chamber for too long? The feeling makes it seem like every part of me is crying out.

116391007.content: After leaving the Institute and searching for Tantan for a few more days without any clues, I sit down at a dark street corner hidden away from the city lights' reach.

116391008.content: At night, I have to try my best to hide somewhere where the people from the Institute won't find me.

116391009.content: Through my hazy vision, I see a figure appear under a streetlamp in the near distance. Covering an arm with the other hand, their gait is unsteady, and shaky, muddled sounds erupt from their mouth in fits.

116391011.content: I'm about to run away when I see that he isn't carrying a weapon. Once he's closer, I finally see the long trail of blood stretching out from his feet.

116391012.content: I don't know whether he's spotted me here in the dark—his head just tilts and twists on his neck as hoarse sounds come out of his mouth. Then, a bloodstained, black rod pierces right through his chest.

116391013.content: His fresh, warm blood drips to the ground, making a heavy, viscous sound like raindrops on a muddy path.

116391014.content: Skuld? What are you doing here?

116391015.content: A disheveled young man enters my vision. His ill-fitting clothes are drenched in rain and blood.

116391016.content: Ha... Hahaha... I see, so you had the determination to leave the Institute as well! No wonder Rata took a liking to you—you and I are kindred spirits!

116391017.content: Come, Skuld. With your help, victory is certain.

116391020.content: Uld steps on the man's back and yanks the black rod out from his body.

116391021.content: He got in my way, so I killed him. Is that really so difficult to understand?

116391022.content: The teacher said we were made to fight the Visbanes and save the world. So, we were born to be the saviors of all life.

116391023.content: But the teacher's vision is too narrow, too limited. She didn't see that we'd already evolved into superior beings—she just kept pedantically insisting that we were unstable and imperfect.

116391024.content: It was Rata who made me understand that no one is qualified to define God—So, I left that place in order to fulfill my mission as a Modifier on my own terms.

116391025.content: What are you going to do...?

116391026.content: Heh, I think that would be too difficult for you to understand, no? In short, my first step will be to become the leader of all Modifiers—an easy achievement if we combine our abilities.

116391027.content: Your Divine Grace is just about exhausted, isn't it? Well, now you don't even need to return to the lab. Just draw the energy from other Modifiers' Access Keys, and you'll never have to worry about running out again.

116391028.content: Anyone who tries to get in the way of our mission—be it Visbanes, the Institute, the teacher, or even the world—all will submit to our power!

116391029.content: 0704, I don't understand what you're saying...

116391030.content: I didn't leave the lab for any of the things you're talking about, I just wanted to find someone...

116391032.content: Mechanically articulating his knuckles, the blood-soaked youth licks his lips and shakes his head in disappointment.

116391033.content: Then I really misunderstood. Here I was actually happy to think I'd found someone who understood me.

116391034.content: But no matter... minions have never submitted to God of their own free will.

116391035.content: 0704 makes no further attempt to conceal the murderous intent between his words. I intuitively break into a panicked run for the alleyway, and soon hear 0704 chasing behind me.

116391036.content: I remember now... This was also the place where I had that first vision.

116391037.content: Like a paper airplane landing at its destination, my consciousness comes together with the memories from my visions to form this moment called "reality."

116391038.content: I slowly open my eyes, then drive my body onwards—twenty steps forward, turn right, ten steps forward, then turn left.

116391039.content: The alleyway ends in a fork in the road. From my visions, I know that going right will allow me to lose 0704 and leave the alleyway safely.

116391040.content: Then two days later, 0704 will find me again and Tantan will save me, setting the following series of events into motion.

116391041.content: As for the path to the left, the first time I tried it in my vision, 0704 cornered me in a dead end.

116391042.content: But it was only in this vision that Tantan and his friends weren't hurt, and Uld plans to alter my memories...

116391043.content: The teacher saw us as unnecessary. To her, we're flawed weapons, destined to be abandoned one day.

116391044.content: Did you not understand that after Rata disappeared? What if the next person to vanish was you, or me?

116391045.content: So, why not let us become gods? Then we'll be the ones holding the pen—free to draw up the boundaries and determine the fates of all things as we see fit!

116391046.content: But Uld, becoming gods won't bring Rata back...

116391048.content: Looks like it's pointless to say anything else to you. That's fine, you'll just be reborn according to the script I've written for you.

116391049.content: An insignia of a cross within a circle appears in Uld's right eye. As he looks into my eyes, his gaze probes the depths of my memories.

116391050.content: I know what he's about to do, Rata had a similar power—composing memories and overlaying another's memories with them. But before this can be done, the subject's memories must be read and understood.

116391051.content: Otherwise, the fabricated memories won't fit together quite right—like how altering individual paragraphs in isolation can make an entire article untenable.

116391052.content: That's what Rata told me. And since he has to read my memories first, it's no surprise that Uld is hesitant to use his ability on me.

116391053.content: Because my memories have always been fragmented and disjointed...

116391054.content: You will become my second-in-command and follow me... Hold on, what's wrong with your memories?! What did you use your ability to do, you freak?!

116391055.content: —But in this moment, he doesn't know that yet.

116391056.content: But this isn't enough, I have to defeat him... I have to make my mess of memories even messier while he's reading them.

116391058.content: What are you doing? Do you really think you can use your visions to run away from this?!

116391059.content: I'm not trying to run away. I decided when I came here that I'm done running...

116391060.content: Don't tell me you're trying to—L-Let go of me! Get away from me, you freak!

116391061.content: Uld's head must really be hurting. After all, I've been adding and deleting memories from this mess the whole time that he's been attempting to read it.

116391062.content: This meaningless content has pushed him to his functions' limits. His eyes open wide, his face twists up, and cracks branch out over his staff.

116391063.content: But... these meaningless memories are also my most cherished possessions... because they're all I have left.

116391064.content: I've pretty much already forgotten everything from my true past. All that remains for the visions to swallow up are the parts from my dreams.

116391065.content: When I first left the Institute, a nice man gave me new clothes, and I met a penniless Tantan.

116391066.content: I went to the beach with Tantan 217 times. The sand was warm and soft under my feet, and Tantan complained about always being unlucky after being hit in the head by a child's volleyball.

116391067.content: We didn't go to the amusement park quite as much, only 109 times. Tantan liked other rides other than the Ferris wheel, so I never got to ride it.

116391068.content: When I thought Uld would kill me, the person I wanted to see most appeared before my eyes. But unfortunately, Tantan didn't remember me.

116391069.content: But we still had happy experiences together after that, so I got a little selfish and repeated our outing that day 80 times.

116391070.content: If only I could have kept those photos as well... Because photos can help forgetful people remember important things...

116391071.content: But later, Tantan also experienced many scary things because of me. I'm sorry, I didn't mean for any of that to happen...

116391072.content: It took me 186 times to escape from the amusement park. But I didn't want Tantan to worry, so I lied and said it only took me 40-something times.

116391073.content: Strange, Is it because my memories are being deleted one by one before my eyes? That's why I have to count everything just right...

116391075.content: I am the leader of the Modifiers, no one can define me! All... All will yield to me!

116391076.content: I am the savior of this world! Hahahahaha!!

116391077.content: The platinum-haired youth casts aside the shattered remains of the staff in his hands, then lurches down the alley, disappearing into the shadows.

116391078.content: The girl who has now forgotten everything stands up, steadying herself against the wall.

116391079.content: She looks up at the beautiful, gleaming moon, wondering who she is, what she's doing here, and where she should go.

116391080.content: A few images from past dreams flash through the empty space where her memories once were. She tries to reach out and grab them, but all she feels is the cold, still air of the night.

116401001.content: The streets are empty this late at night, and the dark alleyway—beyond the reach of the dim street lights—seems to harbor endless secrets and hidden dangers.

116401002.content: But when two figures turn the corner and slowly make their way into this old neighborhood, that fierce, churning darkness goes completely silent, crouching at the curb not daring to make a sound.

116401003.content: I know it's important to find that Modifier attacker, but we only just got back from Xu Heng. Shouldn't we drop by HQ first?

116401004.content: Guaranteeing your teammates' safety is more important than catching up with them. Two free Modifiers have already been attacked so far—we have to resolve this before it makes landfall on Aether Gazer's doorstep.

116401005.content: Let's save our happy, festive reunion for when everyone's safe and this has all blown over.

116401006.content: Alright, I guess you got a point. Damn attacker, show yourself already!

116401007.content: Odin leads Thor through the streets and alleys, then they turn at an intersection. There, the two see an emaciated figure sitting against a corner of a wall and staring blankly at a black iron rod in his hands.

116401011.content: Hearing their unapologetic comments, the person on the ground slowly looks up at them. His messy hair covers his cloudy eyes, and his young face looks as lifeless as rotten wood.

116401012.content: You're all Modifiers, aren't you? Hahahaha... Modifiers... submit to my rule...

116401013.content: Seemingly confirming their identities, the youth's deadened face suddenly springs to life, forming a crazed expression. He stands up, helping himself up with both hands against the wall, and opens his lusterless right eye wide as if blind.

116401014.content: I am the leader of the Modifiers. Heed the guidance of fate and yield to me!

116401015.content: With great difficulty, he lifts his iron rod and points it at Odin and Thor. But all that has changed is that his rigid features are now slightly more distorted.

116401016.content: Hey, kid. Who are you? Did you get hit on the head or something?

116401017.content: Me? Hehehe... I... I am Uld. Remember it well.

116401018.content: I am the King of the Modifiers... I am... the ruler of fate!!

116401019.content: Yikes, he really is sick in the head. Only an idiot would listen to someone acting like such a weirdo...

116401020.content: How dare you speak with such disrespect... You're blaspheming... your king...

116401021.content: Your king... will punish you... personally!!

116401022.content: He bursts into maniacal laughter, and a dark, winding fog envelops him while his stature slowly grows.

116401025.content: I know, I know. I haven't had a good workout in forever!

116401026.content: Dark wings unfurl from Uld's body, but neither Odin nor Thor budge an inch.

116402001.content: The hammer head crushes the massive black creature into the ground. Hollow whines escape from its broken body, but nothing that could be called language anymore.

116402002.content: Whew, this guy really made a mess of things. But no one can strong-arm me in a battle of brute force!

116402003.content: Lightning disperses the dark fog from around Uld. Just as Thor goes to inspect the youth's body, a black spear plunges into the deep pit left by their battle, disintegrating it.

116402004.content: Whoa... Odin, I didn't realize you were so ruthless.

116402005.content: Heh, not at all. Just a formality.

116402006.content: I didn't mean it like it's a bad thing. But after coming all the way back from Xu Heng, doesn't wrapping the mission up this quickly feel like kind of a letdown?

116402007.content: Odin's gaze shifts slightly, and the corners of her mouth curl. Her usual calm expression seems to reveal an unspoken pity.

116402008.content: She waves at Thor, then leaves unceremoniously for an alley.

116402010.content: I have a couple things to take care of.

116402011.content: Weren't you eager to go and see your dear teammates? Our work here is finished, you can clock out for the day.

116402012.content: Thor watches as Odin disappears into the depths of the alley. Feeling like something is off, she scratches her head, but doesn't say anything.

116402013.content: Oh... Alright, alright. I'll leave you to it then!

116402014.content: The cold moonlight only reaches as far as the narrow alley's entrance. Once through it, the silver-haired girl's golden pupils light up in the shadows like dazzling fireworks.

116411001.content: Why don't you try keeping a journal?

116411003.content: You said you often forget things, right? Then why don't you try writing them down first?

116411004.content: But I don't know how to write... Maybe I could before, but I don't remember how to anymore...

116411006.content: This is a camera. If you see anything you want to remember, just press this shutter button.

116411007.content: Maybe you'll be able to remember some things when you see the photos.

116411010.content: Don't be scared, this is a "photo..." Take it out and have a look.

116411011.content: Who was it that said these things...?

116411012.content: There's a magic show happening over there. Wanna go check it out?

116411013.content: Which hat has an apple under? Take a guess!

116411015.content: ...Right again. That makes it four times in a row now... maybe five... I think you've had enough.

116411017.content: Because you guessed right too many times.

116411018.content: But they were the correct answers. I thought everyone liked correct answers...

116411019.content: Are these... things I've experienced before?

116411020.content: Well... That doesn't count. You need to go when there's no one there to interrupt us.

116411023.content: I can't remember... But I have to ride the Ferris wheel... I made a promise... with someone...

116411024.content: Is this the way... to the amusement park...?

116411025.content: The swaying girl suddenly quickens her pace, seemingly mustering up all her strength to run to the end of the lane...

116411026.content: Yes, right, the Ferris wheel... We made plans... to go back there together...

116411027.content: As the girl runs forward with all her might, a faint light suddenly appears in her line of sight—the silhouette of the towering, rotating wheel grows clearer in the moonlight.

116411028.content: Gleaming with neon lights, the cylindrical pods rise to their apex one by one, then slowly descend back down.

116411029.content: She runs towards the rays of light with a smile on her face. But then, a figure comes around a corner and blocks her path.

116411030.content: The girl quickly collides with the slower figure, then falls to the ground with a yelp.

116421001.content: The night is glazed with a moonlit sheen. In a closed amusement park, a silver-haired woman looks listlessly at the quiet scene before her.

116421002.content: From her perspective, starlight stands in for the now-extinguished neon lights of the Ferris wheel, making it look like it's still slowly spinning.

116421003.content: Our security personnel went to the location you gave to carry out the salvage operation. They were indeed our two missing artificial lifeforms.

116421004.content: A white-haired woman in a researcher's uniform walks over from nearby, her voice interrupting Odin's distant thoughts.

116421006.content: Why meet at this place? Clearly there are more suitable alternatives.

116421007.content: No reason in particular, maybe I just suddenly felt like coming to the amusement park.

116421008.content: I'm astounded that you were able to resolve the situation so quickly. 0704's little outburst had our security personnel at their wits' end.

116421009.content: That's why I thought I'd better take the initiative and confess to you myself, so that I may ask you to sort out the situation before it got even more out of hand...

116421010.content: Odin looks up at the star-speckled sky, not responding to the researcher.

116421011.content: That reminds me, I only tasked you with retrieving 0704 for me. I hadn't even realized 0705 was also missing before you came to me. Surely you didn't find her by coincidence?

116421012.content: 0705's abilities weren't weaker than 0704's by any means. If she'd been left to run amok, the consequences would be unimaginable.

116421013.content: Visions aren't as incredible as you'd think. They have plenty of drawbacks as well.

116421014.content: Once activated, they swallow up dreams and long-term memory. Other than that, if you meet someone in your dreams with a similar ability, there's a chance you'll be detected.

116421015.content: While that person may not be able to retain the memories of the dream master, it would be enough to confirm that they're in fact in a dream.

116421016.content: Visions don't turn back time, nor can they truly predict the future—all that can be obtained from them is information on the outcome of choices.

116421017.content: So, that being the case, it's best not to give her any information at all.

116421018.content: Wait, are you telling me every time you sense you're in a dream, you would—

116421019.content: The researcher scrutinizes Odin's expression, but it doesn't stir in the slightest—leaving the researcher with no way to confirm her own worrying suspicions.
