120042069.content: Mengzhang looks at us one by one with a rather undecipherable smile on his face.

120042070.content: It doesn't look like a natural disaster to me. Someone's behind this.

120042071.content: What do you mean? Have you identified the culprit?

120042072.content: An unspeakable secret as it is... Alright, no, we haven't.

120042073.content: But it doesn't matter. If those Encroachers appear again, I'll make sure they disappear for good!

120042074.content: ... Please tell me you didn't just pick up some kind of "magic weapon" from the antique market again...

120042075.content: C'mon, I'm serious. Lives are at stake. I just can't tell you yet because... reasons.

120042076.content: Believe me. I really have to keep the secret weapon under wraps for now.

120042077.content: The smile on Mengzhang's face has grown even wider now. He walks over to the window, then looks down at the ground, as if he's found something.

120042078.content: What's this smell...? Oh, Linyu. Your pouch.

120042079.content: Mengzhang strides over to the bed, bends down, and fishes out a potpourri pouch. He's about to pick it up when he discovers a rip on it. Thankfully, Mengzhang's just quick enough to cover it before it spills.

120042080.content: Phew, glad I didn't spill the potpourri! We can still mend the pouch and sew it all back in.

120042082.content: Linyu hurriedly retrieves her pouch and places it on the table, flashing a quick smile at Mengzhang.

120042083.content: You know, it sure is odd that those mechas were able to evade your detection.

120042084.content: Hmm... Does the problem actually lie with the mechas... or is it this house...? Or could it be something inside the house...?

120042085.content: Mengzhang walks around the room with his hands behind his back, studying every piece of furniture and corner as he goes.

120042086.content: What is it? Just spit it out already.

120042087.content: Hey, easy. It's nothing... I'm just used to thinking out loud...

120042088.content: Any leads yet on that Heterocore you're looking for?

120042089.content: We've made some progress thanks to #{nickname}# and the Mimir system. But it'll be some time before we get an exact location.

120042090.content: We should have an answer by daybreak. Why don't we take a rest till then?

120042091.content: What are your plans now, Mengzhang? You can sleep here too if you have no other business to deal with.

120042092.content: Mengzhang casually sets himself down on a chair in the corner of the room and lets out a languid yawn.

120042093.content: Just what I was thinking. We're pretty much done with the case anyway, and CORG can take care of the rest.

120042095.content: Since I'm here, what about I come with you and help with the Heterocore?

120051001.content: Time's up. We hear a beeping sound from the Mimir device.

120051005.content: A holographic map is projected in front of us. There is a small red circle on the map, over two hundred kilometers away from us.

120051007.content: Mengzhang stares at the map for a while, then blurts out a name that none of us are familiar with.

120051009.content: "Mount Jingdu"...? I think I've heard that name before. A long time ago.

120051010.content: Xu Heng's full of majestic mountains and rivers. There're lots of wondrous places that few people know of.

120051011.content: If the Heterocore is at Mount Jingdu... Zhu must have a workshop there, and it won't be easy to find a way in.

120051012.content: Weren't you pals with her? And now you're saying it'd be hard to get up there?

120051013.content: Well, she might've known me, but her security systems don't. And I didn't learn enough from her to know how to bypass those systems.

120051014.content: No point worrying about that now. We still have #{nickname}# and the Mimir system. I'm sure we'll find a way when we get to it. Let's get moving.

120051015.content: Just as we're about to leave, Mengzhang pauses and turns to look at Linyu for a few seconds.

120051017.content: I left it inside. I haven't had the time to mend it, so I'll pick it up when I come back.

120051018.content: Linyu still looks a little under the weather. Although she was treated by Lingguang in time, the effect of Bane Energy on Modifiers cannot be understated.

120051019.content: Linyu, I think we should take you back to the Quad.

120051020.content: I'll be fine soon. I promise I can keep up with everyone.

120051021.content: Well, since she's already here, and she wants to be here, why not let her come along?

120051022.content: As it's a long way to the target location, walking is not an option. We call for an aircraft to take us there instead.

120051023.content: But just as the aircraft flies into the mountains, its systems start going down one by one: first the comms, then the navigation and radar...

120051027.content: I use the Mimir system to override the aircraft's control system and manage to make an emergency landing. Crisis averted.

120051029.content: One by one, we scramble out of the aircraft and start looking around us. We've landed among some hills at the foot of a towering peak.

120051030.content: A path clearly hewn by man, but long unused, snakes up the mountain. The air here is so clean and fresh, it's almost unreal.

120051031.content: We're encircled by an endless sea of clouds punctuated by the occasional peak.

120051033.content: I see several valuable herbs growing, and the energy field here is great. Wherever we are, it's no common place.

120051034.content: But something doesn't seem quite right here... Mengzhang?

120051035.content: Mengzhang walks over to the mountain path and raises his head to gaze at the sky above. Then, he holds out his hand, as if to catch something. A strange smile flashes momentarily across his face.

120051036.content: But the look of amusement quickly vanishes, replaced by that usual beaming smile of his.

120051037.content: How lucky. We're at Mount Jingdu, everyone. #{nickname}#, any changes in the signal?

120051038.content: It's pointing up there, at the peak. The signal's strong and hasn't moved at all.

120051040.content: Is that so? Then let's get up there now.

120051041.content: Hold on. Listen to me: You may not see it, but this whole place has been rigged with Zhu's security systems.

120051042.content: We didn't even see this place before we crashed, remember? That's because the mountain was hidden from view by a holographic camouflage system and electromagnetic interference. That's what broke the radar and comms systems.

120051043.content: Hiding an entire mountain from view? Is that even possible?

120051044.content: Like Zhiming, Zhu was highly erudite and she was particularly adept at manipulating space. The Astral Engine gravitational field, the warp tech used on the Photon Rail... We've got her to thank for those.

120051045.content: She's more than capable of hiding a dozen square kilometers of land from view. The space we're in right now is being controlled with an orbital loop and a coordinate backtracking program...

120051047.content: Ugh, I'm not sure how else to explain this to you. What I'm trying to say is, if we keep going up the mountain this way, we'll never reach the peak.

120051048.content: All we can do now is to get a bit closer and try to find a way in... I can take the lead first.

120051049.content: Mimir, record our travel route and find us the best way up the mountain.

120051050.content: Although I don't sense any danger, Mengzhang seems deadly serious. We all follow him without any further discussion.

120051051.content: Mengzhang is right: despite walking for some time towards the top of the mountain, we seem to be stuck at the same altitude.

120051052.content: It's hard to believe, but our crash landing site, which is still visible, proves useful as a marker of our relative position.

120051054.content: Weird... How much longer are we gonna walk, Mengzhang?

120051055.content: Have some patience. I already have a plan.

120051056.content: How's it going, #{nickname}#? Has our little kitty finished the math yet?

120051057.content: Looks like the entire space is being locked with a dynamic passcode. There seem to be some patterns here. Look.

120051058.content: I hand my mobile device to Mengzhang. On the screen are several rather complicated-looking visualizations.

120051059.content: Hmm... Looks like Zhu was working on a much bigger scale here, using the sky and the earth as her lock, the mountains and streams as her lock spring, and the living creatures here, her keyhole...

120051060.content: Not bad at all. That's really helpful.

120051061.content: Alright, everyone. It's time to open this giant lock.

120052002.content: With his great sword brimming with Divine Power, Mengzhang comes to a stone slab by the mountain path. Then, he forcefully drives the sword into the ground.

120052003.content: There's a great flash of light, then we see the hills emerge from what was formerly flat ground. The fog lifts, and it feels like our ears are suddenly free of a low tone that's been plaguing us since we arrived.

120052004.content: The sky now looks a little less picture-perfect but definitely a lot more real... It's like we've been ejected from a dreamland and plopped back into reality, and it takes us a moment to adjust.

120052006.content: I've only managed to turn off the coordinate backtracking program. But I guess that did the job, yes.

120052007.content: I'm sorry I wasn't of any help...

120052008.content: Don't be silly. You're hurt. I'd be totally clueless too if I hadn't seen drawings of a similar system before.

120052009.content: There may still be Visbanes around. We should head up there to get the core then leave this place as soon as possible.

120052010.content: Mengzhang shrugs and pulls his sword out of the ground.

120052011.content: Just as our party is about to head up the mountain, Mengzhang suddenly stops in his tracks, raises his sword, and rushes into the woods.

120052012.content: An Encroacher Type? I'll go after it!

120052013.content: Mengzhang moves so fast, we've lost sight of him by the time we realize what is going on.

120052014.content: I take a quick look at Mimir's monitor. No signs of Bane Energy detected.

120052015.content: ... Just what is he up to?!

120052016.content: There's an Encroacher Type Visbane? Why didn't I detect it, then?

120052017.content: I look at Lingguang and Linyu. They look just as puzzled as we are.

120052019.content: Mengzhang always knows what he's doing, so he must have discovered something. Let's wait for him a little while longer.

120052020.content: Alright, then. I'll take a look around here to see if there're any more hidden devices...

120052022.content: Please, just stay here. It's just a quick look-around. That, I can do.

120052023.content: Linyu seems to be trying to make up for not being of help earlier.

120052024.content: Around ten minutes later, both Linyu and Mengzhang make their separate returns to the group.

120052025.content: Linyu doesn't seem to have found anything. Mengzhang, on the other hand, is in a cheerful mood.

120052026.content: So, did we miss a Visbane earlier?

120052027.content: Just one Encroacher Type, and I've taken care of it. I didn't think I'd find leads there! Glad I came along.

120061001.content: We follow Mengzhang and continue making our way up the mountain. This time, we're no longer walking in circles.

120061002.content: "Every road takes me up to the mountain top..."

120061003.content: "Every creek leads the trout with flows nonstop..."

120061004.content: Tsk, stop singing. Look at all those forks ahead. Which path should we take?

120061005.content: All these paths lead to the top anyway. Let's take the widest path since there're so many of us.

120061006.content: Mengzhang speaks pretty confidently. Looks like he's already figured out every square inch of Mount Jingdu.

120061007.content: The mountain is green and lush, and the views breathtaking. However, given our recent Visbane encounter, no one is in the mood to admire.

120061008.content: You guys can relax a little. There's a defensive barrier around the mountain, so only a handful of Visbanes could make it in here.

120061009.content: Look at how beautiful it is! Come on, how often are you in a place like this?

120061010.content: I can't relax until I see the Heterocore for myself... I wonder what state it's in now...

120061011.content: What will come, will come. Besides, it's right up there on the mountain. What could possibly happen to it?

120061013.content: I've tried almost everything I can to restore Gengchen's power, and the Heterocore is my very last resort. I can't afford to have anything go wrong.

120061014.content: Mengzhang stares at Lingguang for a couple of seconds, then shrugs.

120061015.content: Stressing yourself out won't do you any good. There's risk in everything we do, so why burden yourself so much with the responsibilities?

120061016.content: Chief will understand even if you fail to cure her. She knows that her condition is no common disease.

120061018.content: Enough of what? Saying the truth? Or do you really believe that you can solve all the problems in the world?

120061019.content: I remember the first time Gengchen invited me to the Quad. It looked so forbidding to me with its high walls then, and I thought, maybe it's better to be a free agent.

120061020.content: But Gengchen said, "When the world is at peace, you will feel at ease even when you're worn out; but when the world is in chaos, you can hide out in the hills and still sleep in fear at night."

120061021.content: "I'm asking you to join the Quad not to take away your freedom, but in the hope that you'll become a model for all people of Xu Heng."

120061023.content: Not to mention our chief. Compared to her, I'm but a firefly looking at the moon.

120061024.content: What I do have, and what you all have, is the belief that we have a duty towards the world around us. I do what I can, and that allows me to sleep soundly at night.

120061025.content: As he says this, Mengzhang looks at Lingguang, whose eyes are lowered. She seems visibly moved, though she doesn't say a word.

120061026.content: That's why I say, as long as we do our best, it's good enough.

120061028.content: Jianbing kicks a small rock in Mengzhang's direction, and Mengzhang makes a cheeky side step, laughing. But all of a sudden, his smile freezes together with the movement.

120061031.content: A great fog suddenly rises in the woods, and pounces at us like huge waves from all directions.

120061032.content: The spot where Mengzhang is appears to be warped by some unseen power: he disappears into the fog, as if he's been covered by some curtain of invisibility.

120061033.content: There's something odd about this fog! Everyone, gather round!

120061034.content: We rush towards Lingguang, hoping to figure out what's happening before looking for Mengzhang.

120061035.content: But before we can do so, we sense rumbles coming from the mountain. Once again, the sky above us looks a little too picture-perfect.

120061036.content: Why... are we getting further and further away from each other?

120061038.content: We're running at each other, but the path seems to be stretched every which way, and we're being pulled apart faster than we can run.

120061039.content: Lingguang and Jianbing have disappeared from view. All I can see are the two distant figures of Ver and Linyu. I'm comforted by the thought that the two of them are together at least.

120061041.content: I manage to yell one last message to Ver before the fog swallows us all.

120061042.content: And that is also the last message Ver hears from me before we are split up.

120061044.content: There is one more great spasm from the earth, then everything stops. The fog seems to have become thinner, but everything around me has changed, and I don't see anyone.

120061045.content: Oh no. Where are we now...

120061046.content: I've got to find Admin, fast...

120061047.content: Ver scans the surroundings. Linyu, who is standing close by, frowns but doesn't say a single word. With her pursed lips, she also looks rather sorry.

120061049.content: I'm okay... We may have fallen into a trap, Ver.

120061051.content: There're warp triggers along the path that, once activated, would split us up by throwing us into random locations. I don't think this is a coincidence.

120061052.content: ... I think someone did this to us.

120061054.content: Oh, and the AGI Mechas that attacked you last night seemed to be controlled by someone, too. Looks like we've had eyes on us for a while now.

120061056.content: First the safehouse, and now, this. Whoever they are, they understand spatial tech and the systems here very well.

120061057.content: The only people I know who fit the bill are master Zhiming and... Mister Mengzhang...

120061058.content: Wait, you're not saying that... you think Mengzhang did this?

120061059.content: I mean, I don't get it. Why do this to your fellow Modifiers?

120061060.content: No, no... I'm just guessing. I really hope I'm wrong and all of this is just a great coincidence... but my master always tells me that we should plan for the worst.

120061061.content: If there's someone out there doing this... why? What do they want? Are they just trying to stall us, or do they want to pick us off one by one...?

120061062.content: Linyu picks up a pebble from the ground and throws it into the distance. The pebble vanishes, then the sound of it hitting the ground coms from behind the two girls.

120061063.content: Linyu grimaces. She fishes out a device and starts collecting spatial data from all around.

120061064.content: Is that a space passage... Hmm, everything seems connected. We must be even more careful now.

120061065.content: Don't worry, Linyu. I'll protect you.

120061066.content: Thanks. If we run into a Visbane, I'll let you handle it!

120062002.content: That is all I manage to get out of my mouth before my field of vision becomes a complete whiteout. There is a slight rumble at my feet, and I worry one false step might plunge me into an abyss.

120062003.content: All I see now are vague shapes in the fog which shift and change every so often, and there're soft, strange noises every now and then. I keep myself calm, draw my gun, and try to reach Ver on her comm.

120062004.content: ... Hmm, just as I thought. No signal.

120062005.content: I wonder how everyone's doing... Mengzhang's disappeared. Ver and Linyu are together. It seems Lingguang and Jianbing have gone in the same direction, too.

120062006.content: But maybe I should worry about myself. The others are all Modifiers, after all.

120062007.content: There's a shadow lurking in the mist. I take a deep breath—I know what it is.

120062008.content: The Visbanes just keep flocking to me, don't they...

120062009.content: Very well. I'll give you the fight of your life, then!

120062010.content: I quickly brace myself, switch my gun to hot particle beam mode, which seems to work better on Visbanes, then find cover behind a tree close by.

120062011.content: The noises in the fog subside... The predator is getting ready to strike.

120062014.content: I instinctively roll to the side just before the Visbane smashes into the tree trunk and breaks it in two, then start running while firing at its head. Seems that all my training has paid off.

120062015.content: The Visbane is swiftly taken out with a hot particle beam from my gun. But that's just the first one.

120062018.content: An antler slashes my arm, creating a deep gash. A warm spurt of blood issues forth, and soon my sleeve is soaked.

120062019.content: (It's too fast! I can't get away!)

120062020.content: There's no time to check the wound. I crouch to dodge a swiping attack by the Visbane, point my gun squarely where its neck and abdomen meet, then pull the trigger.

120062021.content: The Visbane disintegrates into a great many data bits. But I can hear more of them in the fog, and they're coming at me.

120062022.content: (My gun needs another five seconds to charge...)

120062023.content: Five seconds doesn't sound like a long time. But right now, it feels like an eternity.

120062025.content: A great flash lightens a part of the fog, turning it into a blazing fireball. I can feel the searing heat grow around me, and I instinctively dodge.

120062027.content: I can hear Visbanes in every direction. There's at least ten of them.

120062029.content: I grit my teeth and make for a stiller spot in the fog. I have to find the others...

120062030.content: Even though I've undergone physical and battle training meant for Modifiers, I'm still human after all. Dealing with the Visbanes all by myself is still a stretch for me...

120062031.content: ... Yes, I'm human after all. The limited vision alone is enough to doom me.

120062034.content: A great wind slams into me and sends me flying, and I crash to the ground on my back. A salty and metallic taste is rising from my throat, and my limbs are numb.

120062035.content: I get to my feet with my hand to my head then quickly shift into a firing posture with my right hand up towards the enemy. But my hand is empty.

120062037.content: I see my gun on the ground not far from me. I reach for it, but before I can get it, a hoof appears from the fog and smashes it to pieces.

120062039.content: Even without my weapon, I feel zero fear while facing the Visbanes. Why am I so calm?

120062042.content: I definitely wasn't expecting someone in the fog to echo my bit of irony. I look quizzically at the Visbane in front of me, but it's also turned around.

120062043.content: A jade-green sword appears in the fog, piercing the crown of the Visbane's head and pinning it to the ground with its final blow.

120062045.content: There's a man standing there, tall and imposing. He raises his hand, and with a musical hum the sword frees itself and flies back into his hand.

120071001.content: While I'm on my knees at this point, Mengzhang strides into view like a man on a leisurely stroll. He cheerfully walks over to me and helps me up.

120071002.content: Oof, looks like I got here just in time.

120071004.content: Don't worry about it. I wouldn't have watched you die, would I?

120071006.content: I nod and pull up my sleeve to reveal the wound, which has more or less healed by now. There's zero trace of Bane Energy left.

120071007.content: Mengzhang lifts up my arm and studies it with some puzzlement. After all, there's a great amount of blood on my sleeve but what remains of my wound is minuscule.

120071008.content: That's a lot of blood for such a small wound.

120071009.content: Long story. My body heals fast.

120071010.content: That looks like a gash to me... Don't tell me that was from a Visbane?

120071011.content: I don't remember. I couldn't see in the fog and was busy trying to stay alive.

120071012.content: ... Hey, enough with the chit chat. There's more of those Visbanes.

120071014.content: I raise my arm, ready to point at one, but stop mid-motion. The Visbanes that were after me have all disappeared now. Hmm, things are getting even more fishier.

120071015.content: Relax. I may be a third-rate swordsman but I'm still capable of dealing with those critters. If we run into more Visbanes, I'll handle them.

120071016.content: Mengzhang reaches into his sleeve and takes out a little square box. He gives the box a shake, and it transforms into something that looks like an electromagnetic rifle.

120071017.content: He shoves the weapon into my hands. It doesn't feel heavy at all. In fact, with its seemingly simple mechanical structure, it almost looks like a toy.

120071019.content: Remember I said that I have a secret weapon against the Encroachers? This is it.

120071020.content: And this gun is called... um... Delusion Buster. I built it myself. You can have it for the time being.

120071021.content: One shot to make a real hole in the Visbane... and two will finish it off entirely.

120071022.content: Hey, hey, be careful there. Don't you point it at me, and not at the plants either... Make sure you have the Visbane in your sight before firing.

120071023.content: I wrap my finger around the trigger, and slowly squeeze it... A thin line quickly lights up inside the barrel, generating an energy I'm all too familiar with.

120071025.content: A poor imitation of the real thing.

120071026.content: This thing isn't cheap, by the way. The materials used are hard to come by. It's the only one I made, so be careful with it.

120071027.content: ... Why didn't you tell us you have something so powerful?

120071028.content:
It's precisely because it's so powerful that I can't mention it.
... Come on, you must have noticed it by now.

120071030.content: Mengzhang's smile slowly wanes, and he sidles to me conspiratorially.

120071031.content: That path I chose? Totally random. Even I couldn't react in time when that warp device was triggered.

120071032.content: Besides, it's too much of a coincidence that we got separated by it.

120071033.content: ... Are you saying that someone's controlling the devices on this mountain?

120071034.content: Maybe not controlling. But they definitely know how to use them.

120071035.content: The technical knowledge aside... If such a person really does exist, they know our movements very well. Who knows, they could even be watching us now.

120071037.content: Please tell me you're not the sort of "friend" who would shoot me in the back...?

120071038.content: I gaze steadily at him, and his sword. My body tenses up muscle by muscle as I brace myself for trouble.

120071039.content: We stare at each other like this for five seconds or so, and then Mengzhang bursts out laughing. He cocks his head to one side and raises his hand in mock surrender.

120071040.content: Okay, okay, I was just joking! I mean, you just came from Ain Soph! There's no way you could've planned all this so quickly.

120071041.content: Besides, whoever plotted against so many Modifiers at once must be pretty skilled themselves. Who knows, they may even be stronger than me, like Jianbing...

120071043.content: Please, forgive me for being so suspicious. As you know, the Encroacher Type can attach itself to a human body, so I couldn't help myself.

120071044.content: Always walking the tightrope there with your jokes, you.

120071045.content: Can't help it. Aren't too many honest folks around. And I happen to be the distrustful type.

120071046.content: To find out how a person truly thinks, you have to push them to the very edge. It sounds mean, but it sure beats being wrong about someone and paying the price for it.

120071047.content: Mengzhang pushes the Delusion Buster over to me and pats me on the shoulder.

120071048.content: Remember, be careful with this gun, especially around your friends. Even Modifiers can take quite the nasty hit from it.

120071049.content: There's no way I'd use any weapon on my friends...

120071050.content: Do you know where the others are? We have to get everyone together fast if someone's really got their eyes on us.

120071051.content: Hmm. It's not hard to deal with Zhu's devices, but there's no rush to find everyone, perhaps.

120071053.content: I've been thinking: these warp devices, though annoying, aren't that dangerous. Whoever did this doesn't mean to kill us.

120071054.content: Out here in the wild, the Heterocore is the only thing they could be seeking... They're probably trying to buy themselves some time.

120071055.content: So, our best course of action is to head up the mountain first, get the Heterocore, then come back for the others.

120071056.content: What you're saying makes sense, but...

120071057.content: Are you worried about that young lady you came with?

120071058.content: Come on, she'll be fine! She looks tough enough to me.

120071059.content: We've wasted enough time. We should go.

120071060.content: And like I said, if we run into more Visbanes, I'll deal with them.

120071061.content: We can discuss the rest along the way.

120072003.content: Ugh... This is a tough one...

120072006.content: Ver yanks a stunned Linyu aside and shields her with her body as the Visbane barely misses the two of them. A thick poisonous gas emanates from the Visbane's body, forcing them to retreat.

120072007.content: Why is there a Visbane here...

120072008.content: Linyu, do you still have that mini-bomb you used against the AGI Mechas?

120072009.content: The mini-bomb...? No, I don't think so...

120072013.content: The force transmitted through the shield is massive, so much so that it's hurting Ver's left arm. She cuts off a branch with her sword and takes Linyu aside.

120072015.content: Let's take cover over there, Ver.

120072016.content: Ver looks in the direction Linyu is pointing. All she sees is a rather exposed slope.

120072017.content: Huh? I don't see any cover there!

120072018.content: There's an optical camouflage generator there... Just follow me.

120072019.content: Ver follows Linyu rather skeptically to the slope, where Linyu activates something with the help of her device.

120072021.content: It... really can't see us... You're amazing, Linyu.

120072023.content: Let's go. We have to get to the peak.

120072024.content: Right! But... What about the others? What if Admin runs into a Visbane, too...

120072025.content: Don't worry too much. I guess they're fine and looking for us, too.

120072026.content: But if there's really someone behind all this...

120072027.content: What if they're after the Heterocore too? To keep us from saving Miss Gengchen?

120072028.content: ... But why would anyone want to do that?

120072029.content: Okay, maybe not a human. But what about a Visbane?

120072030.content: I once encountered a Cognizant Visbane. They're real cunning and can think like human. One of them could be behind this.

120072032.content: Let's just hope it's not that... We should get up there and get the Heterocore first, Linyu.

120072033.content: The unfamiliar name seems to have puzzled Linyu, and her face takes on an odd expression when Ver proposes they move along—a little confused, yet also alert.

120072034.content: Ver doesn't seem to have noticed this. Instead, she continues speaking to Linyu with utmost determination.

120072035.content: We must get to the Heterocore first. I'm sure Admin would do the same in our shoes!

120072036.content: Linyu is about to say something when her expression suddenly changes. She pulls Ver behind a tree to hide.

120072039.content: The two peek out from behind the tree. They don't see any Visbanes—just a fire-red figure shooting up the hillside.

120072043.content: Linyu? Ver? What are you girls doing behind the tree?

120072044.content: We, er... thought you were a Visbane.

120072045.content: Is it just the two of you? Where are Mengzhang and #{nickname}#?

120072047.content: Linyu looks about. There's no sign of anyone else but Lingguang.

120072048.content: Hang on. Lingguang, you and Jianbing were together...

120081001.content: I fire a shot at a Visbane that is sneaking up on me, and the resulting blast of Divine Power smashes the creature to smithereens. That is the last one.

120081002.content: See? What did I tell you? The Delusion Buster's a smooth gun with real power. To borrow a marketing phrase: Betcha Can't Beat Just One!

120081003.content: Took me three days with all the weapon knowledge I could muster and all the tricks I knew to... Sorry, I meant expertise. It's THE weapon, I tell you.

120081004.content: Even though Mengzhang's gleeful boasting is all true, I just get the sense that something's not quite right.

120081005.content: But is something still bothering you? You've had this magic weapon in your hands, and you've only fired a single shot!

120081006.content: You kept darting around, so I couldn't get a clear shot at the Visbanes.

120081008.content: Mmm, I'm used to fighting on my own. Working with a shooter is new to me, too.

120081009.content: ... You don't have to worry about me too much, really. I'll focus on taking care of myself.

120081010.content: The two of us continue up the mountain, and Mengzhang avoids the warp traps along the way without too much trouble.

120081011.content: Had it not been for the Visbanes, we might have passed all these defenses a lot sooner.

120081012.content: Hmm, we're halfway up and this is where the paths converge. Surely we should be done with those devices from this point on...

120081013.content: #{nickname}#, is the Heterocore at the top?

120081015.content: Great. Let's go get it and then find the oth—

120081017.content: I turn around briskly as I hear Ver excitedly calling my name. I see Ver, Linyu, and Lingguang walking over to us.

120081020.content: Hmm? Oh, I'm just a little surprised. I thought it'd take a little more time for everyone to find their way up. Anyways, glad to see you all in one piece.

120081022.content: Relax, Ver. It's all healed now. You know me.

120081023.content: I swing my arm back and forth a little to show Ver I'm alright.

120081024.content: I did run into some Visbanes, but thankfully Mengzhang arrived just in time to save me.

120081025.content: When we were parted, I noticed you were alone... and it's exactly those kinds of situations that worry me.

120081026.content: I-I'm sorry... My bad. You wouldn't have gotten hurt if I was there with you...

120081028.content: I pat Ver's head, but she still looks a little upset. I gently cup her face in my hands and shape her lips into a smile.

120081029.content: Ver, you're becoming a Modifier capable of holding your own. But you must have trust in your companions, too.

120081030.content: I've been training hard, you know. How about a vote of confidence for me?

120081031.content: But I remember seeing you skip sets during training...

120081033.content: How did you and Linyu find Lingguang? Weren't there Visbanes and warp devices?

120081034.content: There were some warp devices early on, but luckily I had Linyu. She got me out, then we ran into Lingguang. We didn't see any Visbanes though...

120081035.content: I was the lucky one to have you looking after me, Ver.

120081036.content: That's good. I was worried you might run into something you couldn't handle.

120081037.content: How remarkable. #{nickname}#, seems like the Visbanes all came for us two.

120081038.content: Linyu, Ver, do you have some kind of trick for making Visbanes avoid you? Care to share?

120081039.content: Huh? I don't think we have anything like that. Do we, Linyu?

120081040.content: Haha, I think Mengzhang is just being sulky about his "privilege" to meet the Visbanes.

120081041.content: As if. I don't sulk easily. I'm just glad that nobody got hurt.

120081042.content: Almost everyone's here. We're only missing Jianbing.

120081043.content: Lingguang, you've been quiet. You and Jianbing were together, weren't you? Where did he go?

120081045.content: Everyone looks to Lingguang. Yet her silence makes everyone nervous.

120081046.content: A look of worry flashes across Lingguang's face. She turns her gaze to Mengzhang and opens her mouth as if about to say something, but nothing comes out.

120081047.content: What is it? Anything happened when we were not around?

120081048.content: Be honest with me, Mengzhang. The Visbanes. The space warps. Do you have anything to do with them?

120081050.content: I mean, we're all in this now. We all have something to do with them, don't you agree?

120081052.content: What are you trying to say exactly? And where is Jianbing?

120081053.content: Jianbing and I fell into a space warp and found ourselves in this really strange space. It was brimming with Bane Energy and there were countless Visbanes everywhere.

120081054.content: Jianbing tried all he could to port me out of there, but he was stranded inside... We have to go back and find him ASAP after we get the Heterocore.

120081055.content: Come on... We all know how skilled Jianbing is. You're telling me he's got caught by a little trap? What a joke.

120081056.content: That's the truth. I don't have any reason to lie...

120081057.content: And you, Mengzhang. Jianbing's been saying all this time just how oddly you've been acting.

120081058.content: When you ran up the mountain alone... what exactly were you doing then?

120081059.content: I wanted to turn off the warp devices, of course, so we wouldn't get separated. But I was too slow... I got warped to another place as well.

120081060.content: So, I was the one who led the way, and Jianbing thinks that's a scheme of mine? That's quite some imagination there.

120081061.content: All these traps were set up by Zhu, and you knew her well. You can't blame Jianbing for being suspicious after all that's happened.

120081062.content: Mengzhang does a double take and points at himself. Seeing that Lingguang doesn't seem to be joking, he laughs, as if she is being ridiculous.

120081063.content: Hang on. Surely you don't really think that I'm the one behind it all?

120081064.content: Now don't blame me for what I'm gonna say next, Lingguang. If Jianbing had the power to port you out, why is he still in there by himself?

120081065.content: I still haven't figured out where that space came from.

120081066.content: It all happened too fast. If Jianbing's still stuck there after we get the Heterocore, we'll have to break in. You'll see what I mean then.

120081067.content: Did it really happen too fast for you to retell, or are you trying to hide something...?

120081068.content: Mengzhang's smile gradually fades as he rubs the hilt of his sword and glances at Lingguang's fans. Lingguang ignores the implication and scans around everyone else, her expression grave.

120081070.content: Stop it with the baseless speculations. We should head up the mountain now.

120081071.content: Let's get the Heterocore first, then we can talk. That's what Jianbing wanted me to do, too...

120081072.content: Since there is now only one way up the mountain, the group starts moving again without further discussion or argument.

120081073.content: There aren't any more traps on this stretch, and we're getting closer to the top. Through the trees, we can already see some kind of structure...

120081075.content: Mengzhang is at the head of our group, and we immediately come to a halt when he calls out.

120081076.content: Just ahead of us is a beat-up AGI Mecha designed to look like an animal, lying on its side by the path. It looks rusted all over.

120081077.content: I'll go take a look. Something's strange about this mecha. Stay here, don't move, and keep together.

120081078.content: He walks over and squats down by the machine, lifts its maintenance cover, and starts poking around in there. After a while, he taps on the chassis quite disappointedly, rises to his feet, and beckons us over.

120081079.content: Too bad. It's not much use now. Been lying out here for too long.

120081080.content: I thought it might've been dangerous. We can keep moving now.

120081081.content: But Mengzhang was not the only one who rose to his feet...

120081084.content: The core in the mecha's torso lights up. It lifts its head to spit a tongue of fire at Mengzhang.

120081085.content: Mengzhang turns around just in time and swiftly creates a Divine Power barrier with his sword. However, the barrier's being pushed back inch by inch by the fire. Beads of sweat appear on his forehead.

120081086.content: Shoot. Didn't think this tin can could still move...

120091002.content: With our joint efforts, the AGI Mecha is eventually reduced to a pile of scrap metal.

120091003.content: Look out! It may blow itself up. Let me handle this...

120091004.content: Although there are no signs that the AGI Mecha is about to blow up, we step away from it anyway.

120091005.content: Mengzhang leaps into the air and aims at the mecha's core. However, he seems to miss his mark, and his sword lands on the mecha's chassis instead, sending it flying my way.

120091008.content: The mecha has already lost its ability to attack. I fire off a single shot at it, shattering its core into pieces. It falls to the ground in front of me.

120091009.content: I take a quick look at its core, not expecting to find something inside.

120091010.content: Is this... a key? There's an inscription on it, too.

120091011.content: "Treasure... Storage"? What in the world is this?

120091012.content: I collapse the Delusion Buster back into the box form, tuck it into my waistband, then reach out my hand to grab the key. But before I can touch it, it suddenly transforms into a stream of data and flows into my palm.

120091014.content: I quickly retract my right hand. Ver, who is also shocked by what's happening, rushes to my side and holds up my hand. But there's nothing there, not even a scratch.

120091015.content: Did I see that right, Admin...? Like, did something just... burrow into your hand?

120091016.content: I don't know what happened either...

120091017.content: Mengzhang, do you know what it is...? Mengzhang?

120091018.content: Mengzhang is the second person who rushes over to me. However, he's not responding, and his eyes are firmly fixed on the shattered core of the AGI Mecha instead.

120091019.content: Did you discover something, Mister Mengzhang? Please say something...

120091020.content: Did you just take the key to the Storage?

120091021.content: Are you talking about that data stream...?

120091024.content: I've made myself clear enough. Give it to me.

120091025.content: Mengzhang looks serious enough, and I'm sure I heard him right. But none of this makes sense.

120091026.content: Hold on... Let's try to figure out what happened first.

120091027.content: Tell me what this "key" is all about. If it's something really important, you could share your information with us.

120091028.content: And even if you can't tell us, I have no idea how to get it out of me anyway...

120091029.content: What is it, Mister Mengzhang? Why do you look so... serious?

120091030.content: Mengzhang walks over to me, his eyebrows tightly knit together. He glances at my right hand.

120091037.content: As the man in front of me reaches for his sword, the young girl behind me quickly steps between us to block him.

120091038.content: This unexpected attack causes everyone to fall silent. Even Ver, who's just stepped up to save me out of sheer instinct, looks lost.

120091039.content: Mengzhang... What do you think you're doing?

120091040.content: If I tell you that I'm helping you, would you still try to stop me?

120091041.content: You are trying to hurt someone, and I'm not gonna let that happen. How would hurting an innocent person help me?

120091043.content: As the saying goes, "A person's crime often lies in his possessions." And our friend here... has the key to the Heterocore.

120091044.content: I must have the Heterocore no matter what. I can't let you have it, especially not you, Lingguang.

120091045.content: You know that I must have it, too... Just what do you want? What can be more important than saving our chief's life?

120091046.content: I'm also doing this for everybody in Xu Heng... And that's all I'm gonna say.

120091047.content: You'll have to say more to convince me.

120091048.content: I'm still not sure who's behind this yet, so I won't say more. I don't see the need to, either.

120091049.content: If you don't trust me, do whatever you want. That is, if you think you can stop me.

120091050.content: Besides, Lingguang... How would I know if you're really planning to save Gengchen with the Heterocore?

120092002.content: Mengzhang, his expression cold and unrelenting, is going all out in this fight, and soon, both him and Lingguang are wounded.

120092003.content: We can't let this continue... Lingguang's pulling her punches. I think it's time we step in.

120092004.content: Ver, go give Lingguang a hand. Just make Mengzhang stop.

120092006.content: Ver, who's been raring to go all this time, dashes towards Mengzhang.

120092007.content: Hah! You want to play now, too?

120092008.content: Mengzhang lets out a cold laugh, then suddenly takes a step back.

120092009.content: He is swallowed into a space warp and disappears from view. I suddenly get goosebumps all over and quickly move back.

120092010.content: And all of a sudden, and most inexplicably, Mengzhang is standing right in front of me, and I feel a massive force on my chest.

120092011.content: Everything around me starts spinning fast. I fall heavily on my back, and my vision becomes blurred.

120092014.content: Excruciating pain encompasses my whole being. I grit my teeth to keep myself from passing out and struggle to sit upright.

120092015.content: But just as I do so, I feel something cold at the back of my neck. The piercing pain that comes with it immediately jolts me back to reality.

120092018.content: You...! Let go of the Admin!!!

120092019.content: I'm sorry, young lady. I'm gonna have to keep your Admin with me today.

120092020.content: You planned all this, didn't you? Pretend to check the AGI Mecha, set up the warp device, then wait for Ver to leave #{nickname}#'s side...

120092021.content: I don't expect you to understand. One can never be too ready.

120092022.content: I can only blame myself for not being a good enough planner... I didn't think you folks would make your way out of the warps so fast.

120092023.content: Are you really the one behind all this?

120092024.content: Yes if you're talking about following you and using the warp devices to separate the group.

120092025.content: But as to laying those traps and sending the Visbanes after us... Do you really think I'm capable of that?

120092026.content: Like I said, the enemy's still out there. I can't trust any of you at this moment.

120092027.content: Mengzhang... I know we're not close friends, but we've both worked for the Quad for years. I know you must have good reason to do this.

120092028.content: But to protect the people of Xu Heng, we must save Gengchen and the Astral Engine.

120092030.content: You're just like the rest of them...

120092031.content: Do you really think you can cure her, Lingguang? By amplifying your Divine Power? Do you really think that'd work?

120092032.content: You're obsessed with the idea of saving lives, and it blinds you!

120092033.content: ... You may be right. I know little about the Prime Power. That kind of knowledge is beyond my limits.

120092034.content: But I must try whatever means I have to stop people from dying for nothing...

120092036.content: I see that all these years of peace have turned you soft and gullible, Lingguang.

120092037.content: "Balance" is the fundamental rule of this world, and when you save someone, there's always a price to pay, more or less.

120092038.content: If it comes to that, I'll accept the fact that not all lives can be saved at all times. And I'm ready to pay my price for this decision.

120092039.content: Whatever. You make the choice: you either leave now, or I'll kill #{nickname}# and no one's gonna have the Heterocore.

120092040.content: H-How... How could you say that?! You're a Modifier!

120092041.content: I'm doing this precisely because I'm a Modifier...

120092042.content: You've spent all this time with this "Administrator," so you must've noticed by now. Inside that human body is something that shouldn't be there.

120092043.content: Mengzhang takes a glance at me and slowly moves the tip of his sword towards my heart.

120092044.content: We have to pick the lesser of two evils. If push comes to shove, I'll gladly take a life in Xu Heng's name.

120092045.content: Looks like there isn't any room left for negotiation.

120092046.content: The struggle on Lingguang's face is plain to see, but I don't blame her. It's my life against Gengchen's... While Lingguang certainly wouldn't let me die, objectively speaking, Gengchen is far more important.

120092047.content: It's alright, Lingguang. You must save your chief no matter what.

120092048.content: Lingguang bites her lower lip and doesn't say a word. Seeing this, Ver hurriedly takes a couple of steps forward, trying to stop Mengzhang from saying more.

120092050.content: I shake my head at Ver, lay down on the ground, and cast a final glance at Mengzhang.

120092051.content: "To protect the people of Xu Heng"... I hope you mean that.

120092052.content: How noble of you. Too bad things have to end this way for you.

120092053.content: I ignore him and close my eyes with an air of equanimity.

120092055.content: The Mimir device starts vibrating with a red light. What excellent timing. I reach out to turn it off, as if I no longer care about the Heterocore.

120092056.content: "Signal source moving"? What does that mean? Is someone making off with the core?!

120092057.content: How would I know? You can look if you want.

120092058.content: The piercing pressure on my chest is getting unbearable. I realize that I've broken out into a cold sweat.

120092059.content: Don't even think of trying anything funny, now. I may be hurt, but I'm still fully capable of killing you.

120092060.content: Mengzhang moves his sword down my body, reaches the string of the Mimir device with the sword, then flicks the blade upward.

120092061.content: The blade leaves my body for a second. This is the chance I've been waiting for.

120092062.content: I grab the little square box on the other side of my waist, and the Delusion Buster appears almost instantly. At a distance of less than a meter, there is no need for me to aim.

120092065.content: The shock of the close-range blast has left me a little dizzy. I vaguely see a man being thrown backwards...

120092066.content: Falling on the ground like a rag doll...

120092067.content: Then laying still, like a corpse.

120101002.content: Mengzhang is lying on the ground, motionless. I take huge gulps of air, feeling mentally drained out.

120101003.content: I can hardly feel the weight of the murder weapon in my hand at all, until a pair of warm hands gently comes along to lower my still-raised arm.

120101006.content: He was determined to win that fight. I don't know what came over him.

120101007.content: But he's a Modifier after all. I... I fired at a Modifier...

120101008.content: The two of you are here because of me. I'll bear all responsibility for what's happened here.

120101009.content: I'll explain everything to the chief when she returns. I promise neither of you will get into trouble.

120101010.content: Lingguang helps me up from the ground, but she's not in good shape, either. It looks like she's sustained some internal injuries from her fight with Mengzhang.

120101011.content: Are you hurt? Is it bad?

120101012.content: I'm alright... I just need a few moments to recover from the Divine Power.

120101013.content: #{nickname}#, is the Heterocore no longer on the mountaintop?

120101014.content: It's still there. I just entered a command for the device to read out to distract Mengzhang...

120101015.content: Oh, I see. Thank goodness you managed to do that...

120101016.content: Since the thing is still up there, the three of you should go look for it now.

120101018.content: I'll catch up with you later. I don't want to leave Mengzhang lying around in the open like this...

120101019.content: No matter what he did, or what he had in mind, it's all over now. He deserves a proper burial.

120101020.content: I understand. All individuals deserve to have their final moments treated with dignity.

120101022.content: I don't even know if Mengzhang was telling truth about this "key"... But even if we can't get the Heterocore, we must make sure that it's safe.

120101023.content: You'd better go now. I'm going to nurse my injuries first.

120101024.content: Despite the unexpected turns of events so far, our mission continues, and Ver, Linyu, and I continue up the mountain. The deafening silence, however, makes every step seem heavier.

120101025.content: I look towards Ver and Linyu. Linyu seems to be struggling to keep up with all the twists and turns. I'm unsure what to tell them.

120101027.content: Ver's being incredibly quiet, as if she doesn't want to trouble us with her emotions.

120101028.content: But the poor girl's eyes never lie. All that frustration, sadness, guilt...

120101029.content: Hey, where's the Ver who always cheers me up?

120101030.content: ... Admin, I'm sorry! Once again, I... Ow!

120101031.content: I gently flick her forehead. She stares at me with her hand on the spot, looking bewildered.

120101032.content: Ver. Why do you think I train with you every day? I'm just hoping that I can be of help to you one day and fight alongside. I want to be a human the Modifiers can trust and rely on.

120101033.content: I'm a member of Aether Gazer Division Nine, too. I might be human, but I'm the last one to need protection. You're an outstanding Modifier, Ver, and I believe you understand what's the right thing to do...

120101034.content: So, promise me that you won't blame yourself for what happens to me from here out...

120101036.content: We continue to walk along the path, and we're getting closer and closer to that structure at the top. There's more and more AGI Mechas strewn along the path. Looks like something happened here.

120101037.content: I wonder how Mengzhang managed to turn on that mecha... Let's be careful and try not to touch them.

120101039.content: You know, I was thinking... Maybe that AGI Mecha wasn't broken after all. Maybe Mengzhang switched it on and turned it on us.

120101041.content: It just feels like too much of a coincidence. That he'd make such a simple mistake, and that you get the key to the Heterocore, all of that...

120101042.content: There's no point dwelling on it now, though. Just forget it.

120101043.content: That reminds me, Admin. That thing that got into your body... Can you feel anything right now?

120101045.content: I describe the key-like thing that was inside the core of the AGI Mecha to Ver and Linyu.

120101046.content: Sounds like it's some kind of credential to open something.

120101047.content: Would it affect Admin in any way though?

120101048.content: Don't worry. All it does is write #{nickname}#'s biometric information into some kind of access credential. It shouldn't have any effect on the body.

120101051.content: Sudden noises. Uh-oh. The three of us stop dead in our tracks.

120101052.content: Why are they activated?! We didn't touch any of them!

120101053.content: ... My, my, my. The surprises Xu Heng can throw at you.

120101054.content: As I mutter to myself, I raise the Delusion Buster again in the enemy's direction.

120102002.content: The fire around Lingguang's body disappears into her skin, and all of the wounds on her body are gradually healed. She opens her eyes slowly and glances at the path leading up the mountain.

120102003.content: Looks like they're far away enough...

120102004.content: She stands up, gently brushes away the dust on her clothes, then takes out her Access Key and looks at Mengzhang's seemingly lifeless body.

120102005.content: A pair of fans opens up, with flames surging forth from the frames. The ensuing sparks transform into scarlet feathers that scatter and disappear around Lingguang.

120102006.content: ... Did you really think I can't see through your little tricks?

120102007.content: She slowly walks toward Mengzhang, her stiletto heels click-clacking on the stone slabs, like acupuncture needles penetrating the depths of fear.

120102008.content: From ten steps away, Lingguang raises her fans, and two giant wings of flame appear on her both sides. The fire swallows up Mengzhang in an instant...

120111002.content: Oof. Looks like the AGI Mechas were guarding this place.

120111003.content: We've come to a rather expansive workshop well-hidden among the woods, the full size of which can only be seen at the entrance.

120111004.content: Its owner seems to have left in a hurry: the front door is ajar, and there's a faint light coming from the gap. I carefully push the door open, stirring up some dust.

120111007.content: A lamp hanging from the ceiling automatically lights up as we walk in. We can more or less see all of the room now.

120111009.content: There's a skylight in the center of the room, and below it, a colossal spherical device is hovering over a platform.

120111010.content: The signal is coming from that object in the center... If I'm guessing right, that's the Heterocore.

120111011.content: It's a gray polyhedron that seems to be some kind of liquid metal. From time to time, arcs that look like solar prominences appear on its surface before being quickly absorbed again.

120111012.content: Could this be a trap? I mean, who'd put this right out here in the open...?

120111013.content: Ver cautiously raises her sword and starts approaching the sphere.

120111014.content: However, before her sword reaches the device, a dark pattern suddenly appears on the platform below. The device sends out ripples of energy, forcing Ver back.

120111016.content: Surely something so important is under protection. Let's see if I can break the device...

120111017.content: Hold on, Linyu... While I know nothing of Xu Heng's science, this looks like some kind of safe to me. What if it has a self-destruct mechanism?

120111018.content: Remember Mengzhang said that I have a "key" in me? Let's try that first.

120111019.content: Um... Alright, then. I don't know if we can believe Mengzhang though. What if...

120111020.content: He was willing to fight everyone for this, so it must not be just some explosive, or anything like that.

120111021.content: I think this is a risk worth taking.

120111022.content: Well, Admin, if that thing sends you flying, I'll be here to catch you!

120111023.content: I pat Ver on the head, a nervous laugh stuck in my throat, and take a deep breath. I then walk over to the Heterocore and slowly point my hand toward the sphere.

120111024.content: At first, it feels like my fingers have encountered an invisible barrier, and the platform beneath me starts glowing. However, the light it gives off is much gentler than when Ver was pushed back.

120111026.content: I gesture at Ver to relax. A square holographic light curtain suddenly rises around me and scans me from head to toe.

120111027.content: I feel the invisible barrier vanish. I stand there, mouth agape for a few seconds before directing my hand toward the Heterocore again. There's nothing in the way this time.

120111029.content: That was surprisingly easy. But I'm not gonna grab the core just yet. Better to wait for Lingguang and talk to her about how to best transport it.

120111032.content: Thanks for your hard work, visitor.

120111033.content: I turn around to face the strange voice, but all I see is a dim red light flying at me, and Ver chasing after it.

120111034.content: I turn to the side out of sheer instinct, but that ominous glimmer still manages to brush across my lower abdomen, and I feel a sudden searing pain.

120111035.content: Ver grabs me with both arms and pulls me away to a pillar. I can hear a series of clanging noises on her shield. She stands right in front of me, on guard and staring at a stone-faced Linyu.

120111037.content: Is this... Bane Energy? You don't have to worry, then...

120111038.content: Hmm? The wound's healed? No signs of Bane corruption, either. Incredible...

120111039.content: What a strange body you have. But you're human after all. Now get out of my way.

120112001.content: A swarm of Visbanes have come out from behind Linyu, and they pounce toward Ver and I.

120112002.content: While the two of us are pinned in a corner, Linyu glances casually at us and walks slowly toward the Heterocore.

120112003.content: #{nickname}#, humans, Modifiers... all caught up in the illusions.

120112004.content: You're not Linyu... Who... are you...?

120112005.content: Is the answer that important to you?

120112006.content: Not really, since I know you're a Cognizant Visbane.

120112007.content: It's the only kind of Visbane I know that can command other Visbanes.

120112008.content: ... That name you people have come up with. Not quite to my taste.

120112009.content: You can stop trying to distract me with all that talk. To me, you're nothing.

120112011.content: Ver, do you think you can go stop her?

120112012.content: What? I can't leave you here with all these Visbanes!

120112013.content: The mission's our first priority. There's not much time left!

120112015.content: "Linyu" reaches for the Heterocore. There's so much Bane Energy coming off her, it makes me shiver.

120112016.content: Have you people ever considered that it might be a mistake to use Heterocore to save Gengchen?

120112017.content: Xu Heng was already a lost cause when it was created. But Gengchen chose to neglect the massive flaw in Gaea, and the Quad continued with this great mistake.

120112018.content: Covering mistakes and deaths by creating new ones. That's what they've been doing.

120112019.content: ... Gengchen's dying, and it's Xu Heng that's killing her.

120112020.content: The voice of "Linyu" has become hollow and faraway, as if she's speaking not to us but to the vast cosmos. I find it hard to relate the one before me with the bubbly girl I met not so long ago.

120112021.content: I have no idea what she's talking about, but I no longer have enough left in me to rebut her. All I can do is raise the Delusion Buster and fire.

120112023.content: But the shot is taken by a Visbane that suddenly leaps in the way. The girl's grip on the core doesn't even loosen an iota.

120112027.content: A circle of golden script suddenly lights up along the inner wall of the spherical device. The writing then quickly shrinks and tightens like a chain around Linyu's arm, the one holding the Heterocore.

120112028.content: The writing sinks into her arm and quickly vanishes, and the Bane Energy emanating from her body immediately decreases.

120112031.content: Ahahaha! All my effort was worth it!

120112032.content: The door of the workshop is slammed open, and we see a figure standing there, looking pleased as punch.

120112033.content: A jade-green sword in hand, the newcomer grins at Linyu.

120112036.content: Aren't you happy to see me?

120112037.content: Sorry, #{nickname}#. Sorry, Verthandi. I had to do what I did.

120112039.content: It only worked because you folks were in such a hurry. I should thank you all for that, really.

120112040.content: And our very patient opponent over here, too.

120112041.content: Heh, have it all figured out already? Thanks for playing along, then!

120112042.content: If you had exposed me back there, our very patient opponent over here wouldn't have slipped up.

120112043.content: I heave a huge sigh of relief when I see Mengzhang...

120112044.content: ... because he isn't dead after all, and because the picture has become clearer.

120112046.content: The Visbane attack eases off and Lingguang turns up, from who knows where, at my side. Ver gives a sigh of relief but remains on high alert.

120112048.content: Just as Mengzhang said... I'm sorry you had to go through that.

120112049.content: I'll give Mengzhang a good talking-to when this is over. He put you at so much risk with that scheme of his.

120112050.content: But Mengzhang doesn't appear to have heard Lingguang's complaint. Instead, with his sword in hand, he walks over to the rather weak-looking "Linyu."

120112051.content: Oof. This case has been a real bear. But look, I've finally found you.

120112053.content: Did you really think I wouldn't notice?

120112054.content: I mean, I wasn't 100% certain until you used your Bane Energy, but... I suppose you were the one who made those Encroacher Types attack the people in Yu Jing?

120112055.content: And you can attach yourself to a human mind, too. All those people who lost their memories... that's what you did to them. Like with Linyu now.

120112056.content: As to why you didn't kill them... you're after their memories for intel, I'm guessing?

120112058.content: Hmm? Looks like I guessed right.

120112059.content: You know, you're good. I might not have found you since you're capable of attaching yourself to Modifiers' minds.

120112061.content: Not much. Just made a custom-made lock for your Bane Energy, that's all.

120112062.content: Don't you feel all lethargic right now? Like you can't quite summon your Bane Energy?

120112063.content: ... This was a trap. You got here before me.

120112064.content: Well, yeah, just a little bit before.

120112065.content: I wouldn't have prepared this little gift for you if you hadn't sent the Visbanes after us, and triggered the space warps.

120112066.content: What I'm curious about is the space that Lingguang and Jianbing fell into. How did you manage to set that up all by yourself?

120112068.content: Not willing to share? That's fine. The chit-chat's over anyway.

120112069.content: Seeing that Ver and I are almost fully healed, Mengzhang drew an invisible image of the Seven Lunar Mansions with his steps in the center of the workshop, and goes into ready stance, his sword pointed at "Linyu."

120112070.content: A Cognizant Visbane, huh...? Well, get out of Linyu now and I'll give you a quick end.

120121001.content: The day before. Morning, in Yu Jing.

120121002.content: Every city has its own secrets, for there are a million and one places to hide them. The bustling Yu Jing is no exception.

120121003.content: But secrets will always be revealed one day, in one way or another.

120121004.content: So, Captain Khnum, the Quad will take over from here.

120121005.content: ... All the Encroacher Types are eliminated. What else are you after?

120121006.content: That special Bane Energy wave, of course. For some reason I feel like the Visbanes that hurt but don't kill people are the most dangerous ones of all.

120121007.content: We've already closed the case on our end. That isn't enough for us to keep investigating.

120121008.content: And that's the rule of CORG. We at the Quad have our own rules to follow.

120121009.content: I won't keep you then, Captain Khnum. I know there's lots to do for the evacuation of Xu Heng.

120121010.content: ... I do not wish to hear any discussion of this subject in public.

120121012.content: Bye, Captain Khnum! It was nice seeing you! Come again!

120121013.content: As Mengzhang watches Khnum, the Modifier from CORG, leave with his subordinates, the smile on his face vanishes, and he starts to read a brief.

120121014.content: Hmm, so the two folks Aether Gazer sent will be at Pingkang Street today at noon... And they are here to help Lingguang find the Heterocore at her request.

120121015.content: Mengzhang gazes down the alley as he contemplates the matter.

120121016.content: Both the Heterocore and the Aether Gazer folks would make great targets.

120121017.content: There're so many things to watch out for in this mission...

120121018.content: Soon, Mengzhang is heading out the door. He's already planned a "chance encounter."

120121019.content: First, find a way to join the group. Second, trigger the warp devices on Mount Jingdu. And last, give the Aether Gazer Administrator a little test...

120121020.content:
With the little complications along the way, he becomes convinced that someone is watching them.
So he decides to pull a trick Mengzhang-style.

120121021.content: The loss of blood as well as the breathing technique Mengzhang is using to fake his death has dragged him into a coma. However, he is roused by the suddenly rising temperature around him.

120121022.content: (What's going on?! Don't tell me Lingguang was the one who harmed Jianbing!)

120121023.content: But the flames stop just short of his body.

120121024.content: Just how much longer are you going to lie there?

120121025.content: Get up now, or I'll have to bury your ashes on this mountain.

120121027.content: You win, you win. Now put those fans away, please.

120121028.content: Come by the Vermilion Wellness when you have the time. I'll teach you more advanced techniques to fake your death.

120121029.content: But I still won't be able to fool you, right?

120121030.content: Are you saying you want to try fooling me again...?

120121032.content: Why did you tell them to go get the Heterocore without you? I thought you'd prefer to get it yourself.

120121033.content: I had to check on you first. Who knows what you're hatching.

120121034.content: Lingguang lets out a gentle sigh, and puts away her fans. As the sparks in the air vanish, she takes out a small jade bottle and shakes a little green pill out of it, then pushes the pill into Mengzhang's mouth.

120121036.content: Medicine. It'll help heal your bones and boost your blood circulation. That blood may be fake, but I'm guessing your ribs are broken from the shots #{nickname}# fired at you?

120121037.content: ... How do I know this is medicine and not poison?

120121038.content: Ha, but that'd be out of character for Lingguang, wouldn't it?

120121039.content: You aren't the one plotting against us. I wasn't thinking right.

120121040.content: Plotting... I guess to you no one's free from suspicion, huh?

120121042.content: But you'll continue to be wary anyway. Just like how Jianbing thinks there's something fishy about you.

120121043.content: The two of them look at the weapons in each other's hands, and both let out a chuckle.

120121044.content: Trust and suspicion are not mutually exclusive. One can have both at the same time.

120121045.content: Well, since we can't let our guards down at this moment, let's make our way up together.

120121046.content: Shall we try to catch up with Linyu and everyone?

120121047.content: No, we have to get to the Heterocore before they do.

120121048.content: I'm the one who's been watching you and separated the group earlier... but I've got nothing to do with those Visbanes.

120121049.content: I know there's something else out there. We're lucky that the Heterocore wasn't taken when we were all stuck.

120121050.content: Whatever it is, we must force it to reveal itself... even if it's watching us right now.

120122001.content: Lingguang and Mengzhang opt to abandon the meandering path up for a more direct route instead, and they soon locate the Heterocore.

120122003.content: Lingguang points to the giant spherical device in the center of the room, and the silver-gray liquid metal suspended in the center of it.

120122004.content: Mengzhang, who's busy digging around in the corners, lifts his head to look at the Heterocore and the giant device.

120122005.content: That... is the Heterocore. But... what's it doing inside the Observation Nexus?

120122007.content: It's a device used for analysis...

120122008.content: Mengzhang quickly walks over to the Observation Nexus. Instead of reaching for the core, he walks to the side and opens up a hidden control console by the platform.

120122009.content: ... Is this really your first time here?

120122010.content: Don't look so surprised. Every engineer has their own habits, and you'll know where to look once you know them well enough.

120122011.content: Hmm, the research log? Alright, let's make a copy... Okay, now the security system. Only the most basic stabilization field is in place, just as I thought.

120122012.content: Mengzhang inserts a small storage device into the control console. The data transfer bar on the screen starts to show gradual progress.

120122013.content: (What happened to Zhu back then...? Why did she start studying the Heterocore again? And why did she abandon it here without completing the regular suspension procedure...?)

120122014.content: We can take the core with us anytime now... What's your plan, Mengzhang?

120122015.content: There's the safe option that'd buy us peace for now, and there's the riskier one that'd buy us peace for good. You know which one I prefer.

120122016.content: ... Yes. You've solved many similar problems for Gengchen, after all.

120122017.content: Unfortunately, I haven't had any experience in dealing with Cognizant Visbanes.

120122018.content: Cognizant Visbanes? The ones Aether Gazer has dealt with on a few occasions...?

120122019.content: "The Cognizant Visbane, which has the intelligence of a human being, typically moves among mankind. Nearly undistinguishable. Not only is it extremely powerful, it is also able to apply its will to regular Visbanes and Visbanic AGI Mechas."

120122020.content: That's from the intel Aether Gazer sent us.

120122021.content: A Cognizant Visbane would perfectly explain the trouble we've been having along the way.

120122022.content: So this is why you went through all that trouble to fake your death?

120122023.content: It's not that I didn't want to explain myself. I couldn't...

120122024.content: The data transfer is complete. Mengzhang retrieves the storage device without a word and turns off the stabilization field of the Observation Nexus.

120122025.content: A pale blue energy ripple emanates from the device, and the invisible barrier dissipates. The Heterocore somehow looks a little more real now.

120122026.content: I have one last trick up my sleeve with #{nickname}#. But I'll let you decide if you want to use this trump card.

120122027.content: After all, I have no real proof to show you at this time.

120122028.content: I won't stop you if you want to take the Heterocore now. Any fight between the two of us will likely end in a hollow victory anyway.

120122029.content: ... What do you propose we do if I don't take it now?

120122030.content: Reconstitute the defense for the Heterocore using the credential I gave #{nickname}#, then set up a program in the Observation Nexus to suppress Bane Energy.

120122031.content: Then, we just wait for the fish to bite.

120122032.content: Are you saying you want to gamble with #{nickname}#'s life?

120122033.content: Oh, don't worry, #{nickname}#'s got a pretty special body and shouldn't be at risk from Visbanes... Well, I guess I can't be 100% sure of that.

120122034.content: But that's what I'd do. Remember what I said? While I decide whom to sacrifice if I have to, I'll also be responsible for my choices.

120122035.content: ... I'll still stop you if you take things too far.

120122036.content: Focus on the big picture. If what you said happened to you and Jianbing is true, our opponent may be even harder to deal with than I imagined.

120122037.content: Could you tell me more about what happened to the two of you?

120131001.content: ... Let's drop the topic of Mengzhang for now. We've been working together at the Quad for so long, and there's no solid proof against him yet.

120131002.content: As to whether someone else is after the Heterocore... no matter what, we must get our hands on it as soon as possible.

120131004.content: You and I should have no problems dealing with the Visbanes together. I worry about the others, though.

120131005.content: We can worry about that later, after we get out of here.

120131006.content: What do you think? Should we try my suggestion?

120131007.content: Blast the mountain...? I'm just worried that could affect the Heterocore... We still don't know where it is, after all.

120131008.content: If anything were to happen to Linyu or the rest during this time, surely you wouldn't forgive yourself, either?

120131010.content: Alright, then. Since I'm also responsible for everyone's safety.

120131011.content: Jianbing nods and starts gathering Divine Power with his fists.

120131012.content: A great wind forms around his body and starts to move outwards. The low roar of a fearsome tiger can be heard in the wind.

120131014.content: Jianbing kneels down on one knee and smashes his fist into the ground, creating a web-like crack over a hundred meters long.

120131015.content: He then stands up and hurls a rock in front of him. The rock travels for a few dozen meters, then falls in a natural-looking trajectory onto the ground.

120131016.content: Alright, the devices in the ground around us should be deactivated now...

120131018.content: The two of them let out a sigh of relief and are about to head up the mountain when the crack in the ground suddenly yawns open. Strong Bane Energy is escaping from the crevasse.

120131020.content: Then all of a sudden, the path beneath them collapses and the two of them start falling.

120131021.content: However, they never quite get the crash landing they've braced themselves for...

120132001.content: Jianbing takes a deep breath with no regard for the Bane Energy in the air, then starts focusing.

120132003.content: Making an exit from this blasted place, of course...

120132004.content: Though there's countless data spaces in this world, none of those are completely isolated from Gaea.

120132005.content: If you can't find an exit, you must be enclosed by walls. But there's always something behind the walls...

120132006.content: Lingguang, ever heard the saying "one strong man can beat ten skilled ones"...?

120132007.content: Jianbing flashes a grin at Lingguang. For a second, he doesn't look like a deputy of the Quad, but a legendary fighter from the streets who smiles with sheer confidence.

120132008.content: Since we came from Mount Jingdu, there must be a way—

120132010.content: Jianbing lets fly a monumental punch, and cracks begin to appear all over the space, as if he's just punched a mirror. Time seems to have slowed as well.

120132011.content: By the instant his arm is fully extended, the space is plunged into a momentary silence. Then, there's a growing white flash, and the world around them is torn apart.

120132012.content: I was right... (Coughs)... But it's patching up real fast... You go first!!!

120132014.content: Lingguang is blinded by the flash, and all she feels is a steady but gentle force pushing her from behind as Jianbing's voice grows fainter and fainter...

120132015.content: Go find the others and protect the core! I'll be—

120132017.content: The next thing she knows, she's standing on the mountain path. There is neither a fog nor a swarm of Visbanes around, and Lingguang can see all the way to the top.

120132018.content: There is a deep pit behind her, as well as a transparent space rift that is starting to slowly close.

120132019.content: Lingguang takes a hesitant step toward the pit, but finally decides against her will of going back for Jianbing.

120132021.content: She chants the name like a mantra twice, as if to convince herself, then heads briskly up the mountain.

120141001.content: A Cognizant Visbane, huh...? Well, get out of Linyu now and I'll give you a quick end.

120141002.content: ... And if anything has happened to Jianbing, I'll make sure you pay for it.

120141003.content: "Linyu" is still holding the Heterocore, eyeing Mengzhang and Lingguang coldly. She doesn't seem too fussed by the threat.

120141004.content: I try to push myself back to my feet, but I'm instantly stopped by Lingguang's hand on me.

120141005.content: Take it easy. You're hurt, and so's Ver. Mengzhang and I can handle this.

120141006.content: Just to remind you: I can destroy the core any moment now if you come near me.

120141007.content: Please. Do you think I really don't know anything about my bait? Lingguang!

120141008.content: Without hesitation, Mengzhang directs his sword at "Linyu's" neck. The sword, energized with the might of a dragon, flies swiftly at its target.
