120141009.content: At the same moment, Lingguang's flames pour down on "Linyu," burning away the layer of Bane Energy protecting her in a split second.

120141011.content: The force of the flames send "Linyu" hurtling backwards. Just as she tries to seize this chance to escape, from another direction comes the sword of Mengzhang.

120141013.content: A flustered "Linyu" blocks the attack with the Heterocore, which, despite its delicate appearance, makes clanks loudly upon contact with the sword.

120141014.content: At the same time, a bunch of fiery feathers spread behind "Linyu" as Lingguang raises her fans high, ready to strike.

120141015.content: "Linyu" does not intend to fight back; she has no energy left. She only turns her head back and looks at Lingguang with a blank expression.

120141016.content: Are you really going to kill your friend?

120141017.content: You claim that you won't "let anyone die in vain." Are you going to sacrifice your friend's life for the sake of the cause?

120141019.content: A puddle of bright red blood begins to spread on the floor, seeping into the fine crevices that have grown over the years.

120141020.content: The folding fans stop less than an inch away from "Linyu," who has sent a sharp blade condensed from Bane Energy right into Lingguang's side.

120141022.content: Lingguang, who's just coughed up some blood, shakes her head at Mengzhang, and reaches for one of "Linyu's" arms.

120141023.content: But "Linyu" cares nothing for this meaningless struggle. She looks up at Lingguang's face with only puzzlement and pity in her eyes.

120141024.content: So that's how you are. So self-centered.

120141025.content: Obsessed with the idea of spreading love and hope... Tell me, how much satisfaction can you gain from such hypocrisy?

120141026.content: You really are a selfish one, aren't you?

120141029.content: I'm not as perceptive as Mengzhang, nor do I understand the philosophy in everything as well as him.

120141030.content: Maybe he's right. Maybe I am soft and gullible.. and maybe there's always a price to pay.

120141032.content: I'm not trying to save the world here.

120141033.content: I'm just a doctor who's trying to save every life I can.

120141034.content: I just... don't want to bare witness to sacrifice.

120141035.content: A drop of blood radiates on the floor, like a spark falling onto firewood.

120141037.content: A little flame flickers on the fans and disappears. Then, a huge stream of fire gushes forth from the void, enveloping both "Linyu" and Lingguang in the brightness.

120141038.content: As the orange-red flames shield Lingguang, they spread along the Bane Energy blade into "Linyu's" body, all over her skin and into every pore.

120141039.content: Lingguang has managed to get close enough to "Linyu," but at the price of great injury. "Linyu" tries to back away from the flames, but it's too late.

120141041.content: It doesn't feel good to have a heated-up mind, does it? Leave Linyu's body right now.

120141042.content: Lingguang points her fans at Linyu from a distance, and the flames around her flow continuously into the fan, forming a petal-shaped fiery mark on it.

120141043.content: At the same time, a faint outline of an identical mark of vermilion color appears on Linyu's forehead.

120141045.content: Bane Energy is forced out of Linyu's body like great clouds of vapor from a boiling cauldron.

120141046.content: "Linyu" raises one hand with difficulty and generates another Bane Energy blade. She points it at Lingguang, but suddenly stops mid-motion.

120141047.content: I won't... allow you... to... harm... the others!

120141051.content: In the split second that Linyu regains control of her body, Lingguang's fiery mark finally takes shape on her.

120141052.content: She swings her fans, launching the fiery mark into the air. The mark turns into a thin curtain of flame that propels a figure from Linyu's body.

120141053.content: The trio's clash doesn't last long. Ver, who's recovered a little, helps me up, just in time to see the fire curtain vanish into thin air.

120141055.content: I know who she is. Didn't we just see her yesterday?

120141056.content: Looks like I underestimated the both of you. Lingguang. Linyu.

120141057.content: The beguiling and mysterious woman dressed in a red and black gown looks at us calmly with a gentle gaze. There's no Bane Energy around her at all, though she doesn't seem to be hurt, either.

120141058.content: Linyu has fallen unconscious, and Lingguang has quickly placed herself between the girl and Gremory.

120141060.content: A successful businesswoman like you is actually a Cognizant Visbane... Ha. How long have you being hiding in plain sight at Tian Lu Traders?

120141062.content: I've existed alongside humans all this time, playing this game we call "life."

120141063.content: Humans have treated me like one of their own, regarding me with trust, respect, curiosity, desire... the same way they treat you.

120141064.content: Are you saying that you Modifiers have been "hiding" among mankind, too?

120141065.content: Humans do not wantonly kill their own kind.

120141067.content: Everyone's just an empty shell after the Reboots anyway. So what's the big deal here?

120141068.content: "Reboots"? What in the world are you talking about...?

120141069.content: It's understandable that the ones from Ain Soph don't get it. But those of you from Xu Heng, don't you see what's going on, either?

120141070.content: ... Oh, that's right, you haven't seen one before. It'll look the same in the end as it did in the beginning.

120141071.content: Well, guess I'm asking for too much. After all, humans don't even understand each other.

120141072.content: I don't think we're gonna get more information from it, Mengzhang.

120141073.content: Lingguang shakes her head at Mengzhang as she tries to suppress the Bane Energy that's eating away at her wound.

120141074.content: And I'm studying Gremory from a distance, trying to figure out how she might make her escape.

120141077.content: There is a great shudder in the workshop. It feels like something massive has just rammed into us, and a large hole has appeared in the front door.

120141079.content: This... this is... the thing Linyu and I ran into...

120141080.content: The Visbane enters, surrounded by a fog that quickly corrodes the wooden floor, and it's followed by a number of regular Visbanes which pour into the workshop through every available point of entry.

120141081.content: Oh crap. This fog... Don't breathe it in! It's poison!

120141082.content: The poisonous fog quickly spreads throughout the workshop. Mengzhang, who is standing closest to the door, is swarmed by Visbanes in an instant.

120141083.content: Lingguang pulls Linyu over to where I'm standing and casts a flame shield around us to keep out the fog.

120141084.content: One is wounded, one is unconscious, and one is human.

120141086.content: The workshop has turned into a battlefield. Gremory walks slowly through it holding an umbrella, calmly past Mengzhang who is busy fighting the poison Visbane, and heads out the door.

120141087.content: Lingguang, Mengzhang, we can take care of ourselves. Go after Gremory!

120141088.content: No! Neither you nor Linyu can withstand this poison for long!

120141089.content: Mengzhang, I can handle it here. Go get the Heterocore back!

120141090.content: Quick, there's no time. Stop her before your seal loses its effect. I'll catch up in no time.

120141091.content: Alright alright, I've played the bad guy once already...

120141092.content: Mengzhang lets out a long, dramatic sigh, knocks back the Visbanes in front of him with one mighty slash, then dashes out of the workshop.

120141093.content: After a brief pause, the Visbanes at the door start coming at us again, like a torrent gushing out of a recently breached dam.

120141094.content: Stay close to me... I'll take care of this.

120151001.content: A winding mountain path. Gremory is coming down in what looks like the most graceful of exits.

120151002.content: However, this picture of poise is soon shattered by a sword that seems to have come flying out of nowhere. Mengzhang has caught up with her, a hint of anger discernible on his blade.

120151004.content: You've left your injured friends behind.

120151005.content: Well, they think the Heterocore's more important. I can't disappoint them now, can I?

120151008.content: Gremory sighs softly and takes a step back. However, this one step takes her dozens of meters away in an instant.

120151010.content: (I thought I sealed off her Bane Energy?!)

120151011.content: Mengzhang starts to chase after her. However, he soon sees a wave of Bane Energy coming from Gremory, then a passage connecting to the Source Layer slowly appears behind her.

120151013.content: Mengzhang releases his Access Key with a deft flick of his hand, sending the sword flying in a long arc. He catches up with Gremory in a flash.

120151014.content: But he's too late. Though the Access Key does reach the rift, it doesn't strike its target. He has no choice but to follow the woman into the Source Layer.

120151015.content: There are plots of land topsy-turvy and broken buildings everywhere in Xu Heng's Source Layer, like a mirrored space which has kept the strange gravity parameters of Cloudsong Ore.

120151016.content: It's like the inside of a giant workshop. Here, countless giant frames surrounding a path rise and fall like piano keys and slowly rotate in space without any sort of discernible direction.

120151017.content: Mengzhang feels like he's inside an ink scroll, one with a sense of infinite expansiveness and awful containment all at once.

120151018.content: But the young man is in no mood to gawk at the incredible sights around him. He starts looking for Gremory as soon as he's in the Source Layer, having braced himself for the worst...

120151020.content: While Mengzhang is still trying to orient himself, he feels a strong gust of wind coming at him. Instinctively, he stops walking to steady himself and squints in the direction of the gust.

120151023.content: The two companions reunite... in a rather unusual way. One clenches his fists in ready position, while the other grips the hilt of his sword tightly.

120151024.content: They eye each other warily. However, most of their attention is taken up by the woman between them, who is clutching her chest as if she's been hit hard.

120151026.content: Gremory. She's a Visbane, a Cognizant Visbane.

120151027.content: Listen, Jianbing. Lingguang tells me you thought I was acting fishy. Get your head screwed on, now.

120151028.content: I'm not that stupid. I can tell who the enemy is here.

120151029.content: So you're the one who created that trap, Gremory?

120151030.content: Impressive. You actually made it to the Source Layer from there.

120151031.content: It's all thanks to you, really. Take that punch as an expression of my gratitude.

120151033.content: ... Nice one, Mengzhang, letting the Heterocore fall into the hands of a Visbane.

120151034.content: Where's Lingguang and the rest of them?

120151035.content: Mengzhang finally comes to notice the Heterocore hovering in Jianbing's palm, and he heaves a deep sigh of relief. Seconds later, however, his expression changes to one of vigilance.

120151036.content: Lingguang's alright... What do you plan to do with the Heterocore?

120151037.content: Huh? Give it to Lingguang so that she can heal the chief, of course. Don't tell me you're still thinking of snatching it...

120151038.content: No, no, I... Ugh. Forget it.

120151039.content: Alright, enough with the second-guessing. What do we do with her now?

120151040.content: Jianbing glances at Gremory. She seems to know there's no way she can beat the two of them, and she makes no attempt to escape, nor does she try to grab the Heterocore, either.

120151041.content: Get rid of her once and for all, of course.

120151042.content: (I only applied a temporary sealing program after all. It may be difficult to kill her once the seal expires.)

120151043.content: (The ability of possession is just too terrifying. No matter how much info she has, we can't let what she's done to Linyu happen again...)

120151044.content: Too bad. I was so close.

120151045.content: Mengzhang's heart skips a beat when he hears Gremory mumbling to herself, and he reflexively slashes at her head.

120151047.content: Bane Energy explodes from Gremory on a scale far greater than before. She stops Mengzhang's sword with her umbrella easily, without breaking a sweat.

120151048.content: (The seal has expired?! No way! It's too soon!)

120151050.content: Jianbing is about to step in when an energy vortex suddenly appears behind Gremory, which forces both Jianbing and Mengzhang several steps back.

120151052.content: It is some time before the two of them manage to get back on steady footing and get a good look at the vortex.

120151053.content: It seems fairly stable. The space vortex has a core so dark, it's impossible to see what is on the other end.

120151054.content: Around the edges of the vortex is a cloud of Bane Energy, circling and twisting like it's a living thing. This looks nothing like a regular space-time passage.

120151055.content: Mengzhang and Jianbing look at each other, their expressions grave. But now that the Heterocore is in their hands, there's no reason for them to approach the vortex.

120151056.content: So, is this how it is... Life is about the destination, not the journey.

120151057.content: You have never seen the end, that's why you believe in hope, in the value of struggle... But what's the point of that?

120151058.content: Is there really a need for a world that can exist only with constant intervention? How long can this go on for? Five years? Ten? A century?

120151059.content: You can't expect someone whose head is on the chopping block to not resist.

120151060.content: If you can't even understand this, then no need for further talking here.

120151061.content: ... You Modifiers are but creations of this world.

120151062.content: Even if the world is flawed, even if everything is starting over and over again... all you do is live with the cards you've been dealt.

120151063.content: Your destiny is to be stuck here forever.

120151064.content: Aw, thanks for caring so much about us.

120151065.content: We have not yet reached the point of desperation of having to believe in things like "destiny."

120151067.content: You'll understand what I'm saying the next time we meet.

120151068.content: Gremory slowly closes her eyes as the vortex behind her expands suddenly. Sensing the huge amount of boiling Bane Energy in there, both Mengzhang and Jianbing square up for fighting.

120151069.content: However, the vortex quickly closes and disappears together with Gremory in a flit of darkness, leaving the two Modifiers in mild shock.

120151070.content: She ran away? Just like that?!

120151071.content: I really want to believe that we scared her off...

120151072.content: How powerful do you think Gremory really is?

120151073.content: Probably more powerful than you are.

120151074.content: And... what about the one who opened the vortex?

120151075.content: Jianbing looks at Mengzhang without a word, then shakes his head.

120151076.content: We should get out of here, now, and return to the Surface Layer to meet with Lingguang and the others.

120151077.content: Mengzhang, Jianbing. What are you doing here?

120151078.content: They hear a voice, quiet and still, from behind them. It sounds faraway, but very clear at the same time. And most importantly, it's a voice they know well.

120151079.content: Mengzhang and Jianbing look at each other with pure excitement on their faces. They turn around together.

120151080.content: The battle is finally over. After checking on everyone, Lingguang slumps against a wall to rest.

120151082.content: I'm fine. I'm glad I could do what I set out to do...

120151083.content: A passage that leads to the Source Layer suddenly appears inside the workshop. Did we celebrate too early...?

120151084.content: That passage... Are the Visbanes back?

120151085.content: Lingguang immediately sets up her fighting stance in front of us again. However, she's not prepared for the figure who walks out of the passage.

120151086.content: Ver's eyes and mine grow wide as plates. How in the world...

120151088.content: Looks like you've had a rough time, rookie.

120151089.content: We see another two figures emerge from the passage, and both of them look relieved to see us.

120151090.content: Ha ha, Jianbing, what did I tell you? Lingguang's clearly taken care of things over here.

120151093.content: Don't worry about me. We got the Heterocore back. But Gremory escaped.

120151094.content: But what's going on? Why are you with Odin...

120151095.content: Lingguang stops herself, like she's already come upon the answer to her own question.

120151096.content: If Odin's here, the person who's traveling with her must have come along, too.

120151097.content: A figure with fluttering white hair and dressed in a simple but elegant suit steps lightly onto the mountain path. The rift in the air slowly closes behind her.

120151099.content: Though this is the first time I'm meeting her, her name had already popped into my mind when I heard Lingguang call out... No, even before that.

120151103.content: She's passed out for now, but I don't see any signs of Bane Energy corruption. She should be fine in a few days.

120151104.content: Gengchen nods and walks over to me. She takes Linyu from behind me and into her arms, then looks at Ver and I.

120151105.content: #{nickname}#, Verthandi. It's my fault that the two of you were put in danger.

120151106.content: No, no... not at all, lady Gengchen. I've been very well taken care of by everyone here.

120151107.content: I open my mouth to speak as my eyes and Gengchen's meet, but find myself lost for words.

120151108.content: I'm not surprised Ver is a little nervous. It's a gaze completely different from Odin's. It's like looking into a magnificent and silent star-filled sky. Something that mere words cannot describe.

120151109.content: It's quite a while before I realize I'm staring, and I quickly look away. But Gengchen doesn't seem to mind at all. Her expression is as placid as ever.

120151110.content: That's okay, Gengchen. Anyway, it's not a bad thing for the young ones to gain more experience.

120151111.content: I'm just happy to be of help.

120151112.content: It's not the first time something like this has happened anyway...

120151113.content: Odin and Gengchen's unexpected appearance has boosted everyone's spirits, and the three deputies of the Quad make a brief report of what happened.

120151114.content: Oh? So this is Zhu's workshop...

120151115.content: Mengzhang, since you're already familiar with the tech, you hold on to the Heterocore for now.

120151116.content: Mengzhang nods and takes the Heterocore from Jianbing. Lingguang, a little surprised, looks anxiously at Gengchen.

120151117.content: Huh? Chief, I... um... would like to study it as soon as possible. So that I can cure you...

120151118.content: There's no rush. Get Linyu back on her feet first. There are likely to be side effects from the extended Bane contact.

120151120.content: Let's head back to Yu Jing, everyone. I can take it from here.

120151121.content: Gengchen ruffles Linyu's hair, then looks at Odin, Ver, and I.

120151122.content: It's also time the Quad extends a proper welcome to our guests who've come all this way.

120411003.content: Yes. It'll take more than a night's sleep to forget what happened yesterday.

120411005.content: We're in the room Tian Lu Traders arranged for me. Odin leans back in her chair, pondering the report Ver and I had just given.

120411006.content: Ver and I are sitting directly opposite her. Still she says nothing, and we both exchange a furtive glance.

120411007.content: (Whispering) Aren't you going to mention what happened with you and Gremory on the mountain? That was so dangerous...

120411008.content: (Whispering) Huh? It's not like you're saying anything about your injury...

120411009.content: (Whispering) What's the point? It's all healed up now. Besides, such a small wound wouldn't kill me...

120411011.content: What are you two whispering about?

120411012.content: Ver and I sit up straight in an instant with an embarrassed laugh.

120411013.content: We were just wondering... How come we couldn't contact you before? Where did you go?

120411014.content: ...I went with Gengchen to the Source Layer to find something called the Cinders.

120411016.content: That's all I can tell you for now. Knowing too much is often more of a burden than a blessing.

120411017.content: Then thank you for not burdening me... To be honest, I'm more concerned about what's happening now.

120411018.content: We have no idea where the Cognizant Visbane calling itself Gremory has gone but, based on my limited experience, having one of them roaming free is never a good thing.

120411019.content: Ver, you fought with her. Is she strong?

120411020.content: Huh? I don't know. I only blocked a few blows for the Administrator...

120411021.content: Jianbing and Mengzhang probably know more than me. They're the ones who brought the Heterocore back.

120411022.content: I asked them yesterday when we were on our way back to Yu Jing. They just ended up bickering—Jianbing said Gremory is stronger than Mengzhang, and Mengzhang said he'd win in a fight.

120411023.content: Who do you think I should believe?

120411025.content: Having been manipulated by Mengzhang, there must be some resentment there.

120411026.content: To suddenly have a sword pointed at me... Yeah, wasn't the most pleasant experience.

120411027.content: I blocked one of his blows and could barely feel my arm after. He didn't hold back.

120411028.content: If you're trying to fool someone, you have to make it believable. I would have done the same if I were him.

120411029.content: Well, that's not right. We're Modifiers! What if he'd really hurt the Administrator?

120411030.content: He can adapt his behavior to ever-changing circumstances. Usually, it's a sign of a keen sense of intuition.

120411031.content:
His skills of observation are excellent, and Ver is easy to read.
He knew you would try to stop him, and that you would succeed.

120411032.content: It's true that everyone knows it's my mission to protect the Admin...

120411033.content: It was just a very risky move. If Gremory had chosen that moment to ambush us, and Mengzhang was able to fend her off...

120411034.content: There's no victory without a little risk involved. You both shouldn't be so hesitant.

120411035.content: And this risk was well calculated, because our opponent turned out to be little more than a mouse.

120411037.content: Mice are adept at hiding. Even in broad daylight, you'd struggle to spot one in a field.

120411038.content: And yet they still don't come out during the day—not because they fear the light, but because they're afraid of being seen. Because they know they are weak...

120411039.content: If I were Gremory, I would have just followed you up the mountain and killed you on seeing the Heterocore. That would have been the simplest course of action.

120411040.content: But she didn't, because she knew she wouldn't have been able to overpower you. She still has something to fear, so she's been in hiding ever since Gengchen came back.

120411041.content: Odin stands. Ver and I unconsciously rise with her, and accompany her to the door.

120411042.content: I'll leave you two to rest.

120411043.content: And when I say that, what I mean is you're both staying in Xu Heng to get some rest. Starting now, you two are tourists.

120411044.content: The Quad and Tian Lu Traders won't give you any new assignments; and I don't want you going out to find work for yourselves. Gengchen will deal with the Xu Heng situation. Think of this as a holiday, and only come back to Ain Soph once you're fully recharged.

120411045.content: I'm not someone who likes looking for trouble.

120411046.content: That wasn't a suggestion, it was an order. The Cryptics have sent your spare pistol over, but that's not so you can go out looking for trouble.

120411047.content: The winds are blowing, and you are ill-prepared.

120411050.content: A knock at the door cuts our conversation short. Seeing that Odin isn't going to answer my question, I shrug and go to see who the visitor is.

120411056.content: Oh, no... I just wasn't expecting you.

120411057.content: I thought you'd be holed up in the office for at least three days.

120411058.content:
I don't have that much work to do.
And I heard you're heading back.

120411059.content:
You know what I'm heading back to do.
Keep the Cognizant Visbane in check, and look after the Cinders.

120411060.content: As soon as the Cryptics finish the container for the Cinders, I'll bring it back myself.

120411061.content: The container will take at least five days to make.

120411062.content: There's no point in you trying to hurry the Cryptics.

120411063.content: Even so, watching them work will be interesting. Is there anything you need me here for?

120411064.content: There will be a welcome banquet tomorrow night. Eat before you go.

120411066.content: On a typical day, about 90% of the people in Tian Lu Traders are merchants, while the remaining usually have low-key black and white dragon emblems on their clothes.

120411067.content: The traders do not interact with these people, because that dragon emblem represents the Quad, the mysterious power that protects Xu Heng... Even though those people don't usually look all that mysterious.

120411069.content: In the corner of the passageway is a rocking chair, which is currently occupied by Jianbing snoozing in the sun with his hands clasped comfortably behind his head.

120411070.content: His nose suddenly itches, so he scratches it. Then he feels something blowing against his ear.

120411071.content: He lazily opens his eyes a fraction, and spies a thread dangling in front of him. He sighs.

120411073.content: Jianbing grabs the leaf hanging from the thread, then looks up at Mengzhang, who is standing behind him smirking.

120411074.content: Almost everyone in the Quad is on the move. You, Lingguang, and I aren't in Yu Jing for a party. Don't tell me you've got nothing to do.

120411075.content: You're the one who's just sitting here basking in the sun.

120411076.content: Don't tell me you're hiding up here sulking? Because you're not allowed to go chasing after Gremory?

120411077.content: Nonsense... I'm not questioning the Chief's judgment.

120411078.content: A few squads have been dispatched to locate her, and I heard in this morning's report that they need someone to coordinate them.

120411079.content: Judging from your expression, I'm guessing they haven't made any progress yet?

120411080.content: I was prepared for that. This was never going to be that easy.

120411082.content: Guests cannot be neglected, no matter how busy one is.

120411083.content: Aether Gazer has helped us a lot, and deserves to be rewarded. Chief said that the host's friendship is invaluable.

120411084.content: Hmm, you're right. I have been neglecting those two. What restaurant are we going to?

120411085.content: Two? Are you forgetting about Odin? Naturally, Chief is going to take care of them personally.

120411086.content: Chief's going to cook? But lately...

120411087.content: Now now, don't say anything to spoil the fun. If the Chief said it, then it's going to happen.

120411088.content: There's a banquet tomorrow night, I want to see you there. So if you have anything that needs doing I suggest you finish it before then.

120411089.content: Why don't you follow your own advice? I've lost count of the number of times I haven't been able to get hold of you.

120411090.content: Me? I'm the one who's been burdened with the Heterocore, and Zhiming's not around either. Just thinking about it gives me a headache.

120411091.content: I've spent the past two days waiting for the results of the lab's automatic analysis, so I've had time to wander around. But now things are getting busy, so you really won't see me. I might not even be able to make it to the banquet...

120411092.content: What? You're inviting me, but you're not going yourself?

120411093.content: ...Our schedule has already been decided for the next two weeks, and our research into the Heterocore cannot wait.

120411094.content: You must have noticed something yesterday as we were coming back from Mount Jingdu.

120411095.content: Lingguang hesitated a few times, but it was pretty obvious. The Chief's powers... seem to be weakening.

120411096.content: I fear the Chief expended too much energy on this expedition with Odin.

120411097.content: Jianbing shakes his head gravely, refusing to speculate further. Mengzhang's smile fades a little.

120411098.content: For a while, neither of them speaks. Suddenly, Mengzhang reaches out and takes the leaf from Jianbing's hand, then holds it up to the sunlight so its veins are visible.

120411099.content: Jianbing doesn't understand what Mengzhang is doing, but he doesn't care. He puts his hands back behind his head.

120411100.content: Listen, I've told you a hundred times before not to disturb me while I'm relaxing. If there's nothing else, I'll see you tomorrow night.

120411101.content: Jianbing doesn't hear Mengzhang's answer. His breathing slows as the glow of sunset warms his face...

120411102.content: His nose suddenly itches, and he also feels something brushing against his ear.

120411104.content: Surprised by Jianbing leaping up from his chair, Mengzhang drops the thread and leaf he was holding and turns and runs away, stifling his laughter.

120411105.content: Even though we're on leave in Xu Heng, we still need to go to Luliang's to do some paperwork, such as obtaining our visa, confirming our expense budget, and taking out travel insurance. If there's one thing you can count on in business, it's bureaucracy—even when you're supposedly on vacation.

120411106.content: Odin, who is difficult enough to track down at the best of times, disappears after receiving the banquet invitation. Ver is hit by a sudden wave of exhaustion and insists on going back to her room to sleep, leaving me to deal with everything on my own.

120411107.content: However, it just so turns out that Gengchen also has business with Luliang, so the two of us head there together.

120411108.content: My gaze keeps flitting to Gengchen as we walk.

120411110.content: Hmm? Oh no, I was just thinking that I'm much less nervous walking with you today than I was yesterday.

120411111.content: Nervous? Odin and I are friends. You don't need to be nervous around me!

120411112.content: Maybe it's because we'd only just met and your personality, your temperament... It's probably just because Odin's one of those people everyone feels an instant connection to.

120411113.content:
Odin? An instant connection?
It's funny how we all see each other differently.

120411114.content: I look around the Tian Lu Traders lobby, which is much less crowded than it was yesterday. Not only are there fewer traders, but I can hardly see any members of staff.

120411115.content: I open my mouth to ask Gengchen what's going on today, but remember what Odin said and think better of it.

120411116.content: Luliang's office is at the end of the corridor. The door is ajar, and from within I can hear a young woman admonishing her subordinates.

120411117.content: The company Gremory works for... Yes, Illusory Isle Industry... Gremory's disappeared, so you need to send someone there right now to help them finish their current projects.

120411118.content: What? Background checks? Don't worry about that, the Quad and Commercial Department will deal with it. Just do as I say...

120411119.content: I exchange looks with Gengchen, and we both stop in our tracks.

120411122.content: We wait outside. A sense of calm radiates from Gengchen. Even just standing next to her I can feel myself start to relax.

120411123.content: Yet silence always becomes awkward after a while, and there always has to be someone brave enough to break it.

120411126.content: Oh... That's what I've always heard Lingguang and Mengzhang call you. Should I not call you that?

120411127.content: I don't know who started with that first...

120411128.content: Aether Gazer and the Quad are partners, so you don't need to be so formal with me. Please, just call me Gengchen.

120411131.content: Ah, I forgot what I was going to ask now... It'll come back to me.

120411132.content: I always have thoughts that pop up in my head one second and then disappear the next if I'm distracted. I guess they can't be that important.

120411133.content: The reprimanding voice in the office is still going, while a familiar cry can be heard drifting down the corridor.

120411134.content: Why did you do that? Such a dumb move!

120411135.content: Stop trying to psyche me out. You'll lose in three moves.

120411136.content: Footsteps approach us, and two figures come around the corner opposite Luliang's office.

120411137.content: Floating between them is a chessboard and chess pieces made from condensed Divine Power, which they are playing as they walk. Their tone is relaxed but their eyes are serious. It's obvious that this game is high stakes for both of them.

120411138.content: Who's standing there lurking outside my door... Woah!

120411139.content: Luliang emerges from her office to investigate the source of the disturbance, and nearly collides with Jianbing as he walks past. Luckily, Jianbing manages to sidestep in time.

120411141.content: With Jianbing suddenly distracted, the chessboard disappears and the void causes a small rush of air. To us it feels like little more than a breeze, but to something less stable...

120411142.content: A loud crashing sound makes Jianbing jump out of his skin. All of us turn to look behind him, and see shattered ceramic strewn across the floor.

120411144.content: Luliang is staring at the fragments littering the ground, all color drained from her face. She opens her mouth to speak, but no sound comes out.

120411145.content: Mengzhang, his face also deathly pale, rushes over to where Jianbing is standing and attempts to piece some of the fragments back together, to no avail.

120411146.content: Oh no... That wasn't the blue celadon glaze Double Dragon Bottle, was it?

120411148.content: What does it matter now? It was an antique—no amount of money in the world could bring it back.

120411149.content: Look, there are fragments everywhere, and one of the dragon handles has broken off completely. There's no way you could fix this...

120411151.content: Jianbing's expression is grave. He doesn't know anything about antiques, but judging from Mengzhang and Luliang's identical reactions, and Gengchen staring at the broken dragon head in silent shock, he can guess that it's a pretty big deal.

120411152.content: How can I make it up to you, boss? Whatever you want.

120411154.content: Luliang, this vase belonged to you. If it was valuable, the Quad will compensate you.

120411155.content: It was my fault, chief. I don't want the Quad to take responsibility for my mistake. I'll pay...

120411156.content: Hey hey hey, will somebody let me speak?

120411157.content: Dismissing Jianbing's grand speech with a wave of her hand, Luliang stares down at the pieces with a look somewhere between a smile and tears. She kneels beside the shattered vase and delicately caresses one of the larger fragments.

120411158.content: Mengzhang, take a closer look. This isn't real. It's a high-quality replica I commissioned someone to make. As if I'd put something so expensive out on display in a corridor like that...

120411161.content: Most of the people here know what Mengzhang is like, and he knows it. With all eyes on him, he makes his way to the outermost circle of the crowd.

120411162.content: Oh, so it was a fake... I honestly didn't know.

120411163.content: Mengzhang, you will be responsible for the damage.

120411164.content: Of course, boss. I'll repay you with some black glaze pottery someday.

120411165.content: You can relax, Jianbing. It was all an honest mistake. Now, if you'll excuse me...

120411166.content: Faced with Jianbing's glare, Mengzhang grins before beating a hasty retreat.

120411167.content: Did you think that was funny?!

120411168.content: As the two men begin to bicker like small children, Gengchen reveals a rare look of wordlessness.

120411170.content: It's okay, I think they're funny.

120411171.content: Gengchen glances at Luliang, who's still on the floor toying with the broken porcelain.

120411173.content: Mengzhang said it can't be fixed.

120411174.content: It was only a replica. Why does it matter?

120411176.content: It still cost me a lot of money!

120411177.content: I look around at the extravagant interior of this building belonging to Luliang's company, and the helpless expression on Gengchen's face.

120411178.content: Jianbing and Mengzhang have left. We never found out why they were even playing chess in the corridor in the first place.

120411179.content: Luliang brings out a potted plant from her office to replace the broken vase.

120411180.content: It didn't feel right to leave the shelf empty...

120411181.content: #{nickname}#, if you're here to do your vacation paperwork, you don't need to worry—I've already done it.

120411182.content: Did you bug our room or something?

120411183.content:
Give me some credit!
Odin personally sent me an email about it, so of course I did it all straight away.

120411184.content: All of your and Miss Ver's expenses in Xu Heng over the next three days will be wholly covered by Tian Lu Traders. It's just a shame we're all so busy at the moment that we can't spare anyone to go and take you around.

120411185.content: Luliang pats me on the shoulder, then turns to Gengchen.

120411189.content: Oh I'm sorry. It's an inside joke.

120411192.content: Something happened many years ago, and it's been her little nickname for me ever since.

120411193.content: Luliang, I need a reliable team to go to Mount Jingdu and retrieve something Zhu left.

120411194.content: Mount Jingdu? Is this a clean-up mission?

120411195.content: Yingzhao is due back soon, so she can take care of this. I'll send an advance party to secure the place...

120411196.content: Seeing as they have business to discuss, I decide to leave them to it. I have to admit I am curious about what it is Gengchen wants to retrieve, but it's not really my place to ask questions.

120411197.content: I'll leave you two to it. I'll go and find Ver so we can start enjoying our vacation.

120411198.content: Okay. Get in touch if you need anything.

120411199.content: I watch them both go into the office, then smile and head back to our accommodation.

120421004.content: The scars will protect us. Don't resist.

120421008.content: It won't. It belongs to us. It's …

120421009.content: Come back, just like before. If you come back, it won't hurt.

120421010.content: Come back... How long will I need to stay this time?

120421012.content: I see. You still can't let go of it...

120421014.content: It's okay. You'll come back when you're tired.

120421015.content: I'll be waiting for you when you get back.

120421016.content: I'll always, always be waiting for you—

120421018.content: Ver sits up in bed, cradling her head as the dream slowly fades from her memory, like watching a photograph slowly burn. She gently pats her face.

120421019.content: I knew I wouldn't be able to remember again.

120421021.content: Pushing open the door and stretching, Ver stares blankly down the empty corridor. She pokes her head out and looks at the door next to hers.

120421022.content: Aren't Admin and Gengchen back yet?

120421023.content: Ver rubs her eyes and makes to go back in her room. Just like the living quarters of Aether Gazer Division Nine, the guest rooms on this floor are all reserved for Modifiers only, so it's pretty deserted.

120421026.content: Lingguang appears from the stairwell and sees Ver, surprising both of them. Lingguang walks over, checking the time as she does so.

120421027.content: It's almost ten, why haven't you gone out yet?

120421028.content: The Admin went to sort out some paperwork with Gengchen, and I was still tired so I went back to bed.

120421029.content: It's not good to sleep in so late. Or was it a late one last night?

120421030.content: No no, I got plenty of sleep, I slept until I woke up naturally.

120421031.content: That's just how it's been for me lately. I get sleepy sometimes and have these strange dreams...

120421032.content: Speaking of which, do you know how to remember your dreams after you wake up?

120421033.content: Technology isn't there yet, I'm afraid. Are you having a specific dream you want to remember?

120421034.content: It's not that I want to remember. I just keep dreaming of someone telling me to go back, or something like that...

120421035.content: I don't know where they want me to go back to, but in my dream this person is someone I've seen before. I can just never remember anything once I've woken up.

120421036.content: Dreams are a reflection of your state of mind, and contain things about yourself that you might not even be aware of yet.

120421037.content: Is it the Administrator you're dreaming of?

120421038.content: No, no. My dreams of the Admin are always clear, and are usually just us going to the movies or a restaurant or things like that.

120421039.content: Haha, sounds like you and #{nickname}# are spending a lot of time together.

120421040.content: Well yeah, the Admin joined Aether Gazer around the same time that I did.

120421041.content: The Admin isn't a Mod, but we still went through induction training together and helped each other out, so we're quite close now.

120421042.content: Well, if it's not the Admin you're dreaming of, it must be someone else you're close to.

120421043.content: Think—could it be anyone else you know? Someone important to you? Someone you work with?

120421044.content: Someone else? Let me see, there's Shu, Lil Osi, Poseidon... I don't think it's any of them.

120421045.content: Ah, I had a really close friend when I was younger but... It can't be her...

120421046.content: Did you lose touch with her?

120421047.content: Ver smiles through pursed lips, and places a hand on her heart to try and cover the hollow feeling she has in her chest.

120421049.content: I got very sick when I was a kid, and I was put in the same ward as her. She was a little bit older than me, but she was always nice to me and tried to make me feel better. But it turns out she was much sicker than me.

120421050.content: We both went in for surgery at the same time, but I was the only one who came out...

120421051.content: I'm so sorry... I didn't mean to dig up painful memories...

120421052.content: It's okay, Ms. Lingguang. It's been years now.

120421053.content: And Tarina never let on how much pain she was in. Even when it was at its worst she never cried. She was always trying to cheer me up until the very end...

120421054.content: I'll never be as strong as she was, but whenever things start to feel overwhelming, I think back to those days we spent together and the fear just melts away.

120421055.content: She sounds like a strong kid.

120421056.content: Yeah... And I have to do her proud. I have to see the world that she never got the chance to see.

120421057.content: When I return to the room, I see Ver and Lingguang locked deep in conversation.

120421058.content: Lingguang, what are you doing at Tian Lu Traders so early? What are you guys talking about?

120421059.content: You two are going out tomorrow, right? I want Ver to buy a new outfit to lift her spirits.

120421060.content: Ms. Lingguang knows a tailor who can make us custom clothes. Admin, do you want to come with me?

120421061.content: Sure! We can also pick up some presents for Lil Osi.

120421062.content: Ver, you should tell #{nickname}# about your dreams. Hear a different perspective, you know? And one more thing...

120421063.content: If you don't mind, I'd rather you didn't call me "Ms." Lingguang. I'm not that high-ranking!

120421064.content: Sure, Lingguang. Okay, so you said we should go to the tailor in the afternoon—what should we do now, then?

120421065.content: Are you here to see Linyu?

120421066.content: Yes... It's been twenty-some-odd hours since Linyu came back, and she's still not awake.

120421067.content: The technique I used to drive Gremory out of Linyu's body was just a temporary solution. She isn't displaying any symptoms, but I still want to check up on her regularly.

120421068.content: Where is she? Ver and I would like to see her too.

120421069.content: She's on this floor as well. Come with me.

120421072.content: Huh? Oh, it's a call from my boss... I'm obviously just a few meters from Tian Lu Traders.

120421073.content: Seeing the name "Luliang" flash on the screen of her communicator, Yingzhao sighs and brings the phone to her ear, her pace unchanged.

120421074.content: You're back already? That's why you're my favorite HR manager!

120421075.content: Before you start arranging your vacation, though, there's some overtime I need you to do. We have an antique collection job.

120421076.content: I'm a bit tired. Can't I take the time off?

120421077.content: Sure—once you've done this. It's official business.

120421078.content: Fine... I've noticed a lot of Quad and our people on the streets dressed in ordinary clothes. That wouldn't have anything to do with this "antique collection" job, would it?

120421079.content: If you say so... Things are a bit unstable down on the ground currently, which really hampered the Quad yesterday. So you can guess why I need your help specifically.

120421080.content: All right, I'll protect the team.

120421081.content: There's something else... But I can't say it here. I'll tell you when you get back.

120421083.content: Where is Linyu? I'd like to see her.

120421084.content: To her surprise, Yingzhao receives no reply. She stops for an instant, clenches her fists, then resumes walking.

120421085.content: What you said happened yesterday... Does it have anything to do with Linyu?

120421086.content: She went ground-side on an important job, but she got possessed by a Cognizant Visbane and still hasn't regained consciousness...

120421087.content: Calm down, she's on the top floor recovering. Lingguang has given her a full examination and she doesn't appear to be injured. Physically, at least.

120421089.content: Yingzhao hangs up and begins to sprint, all other missions forgotten.

120421090.content: Usually, security stops anyone approaching the entrance to Tian Lu Traders, but they halt when they see who's coming.

120421092.content: Ignoring the rules that state no running in the corridors, Yingzhao charges toward the innermost room on the top floor.

120421094.content: Chest heaving, Yingzhao stops herself from throwing open the door until she's regained her composure. A desolate expression is etched on her face.

120421095.content: She gingerly reaches out to grab the doorknob, worried she'll disturb the patient inside.

120421097.content: The smell of medicinal incense wafts out as the door opens. Yingzhao finds a somewhat unfamiliar face awaiting her on the other side.

120421099.content: Yingzhao looks into the room, but does not see Linyu lying unconscious on the bed as expected.

120421100.content: The girl is standing quietly by the window, watching the clouds. Hearing someone enter, she turns her head and sees Yingzhao. Her eyes widen, and a delighted smile plays across her face.

120421102.content: Linyu... Someone told me you were unconscious... Lingguang?

120421103.content: She woke up this morning. Don't worry, Yingzhao, she's fine.

120421104.content: What happened? Who are these people?

120421105.content: Lingguang ushers the confused Yingzhao into the room, and introduces her to the equally confused Ver and me.

120421106.content: Lingguang briefly explains what happened during the job, and I see various emotions flicker across Yingzhao's eyes as the story progresses. When it gets to the part where Mengzhang and Jianbing were unable to stop Gremory, she looks at Linyu and sighs softly.

120421107.content: I don't think anyone was expecting that. Even if I'd have been here, I don't think I would have been able to stop you...

120421108.content: Heh, I knew you wouldn't blame me.

120421110.content: Yingzhao raps her sister's head with her knuckles. Linyu rubs her forehead, then hides behind the curtain as she sees Yingzhao raise her hand for more.

120421111.content: Ever since you were little, combat has never been your strong suit. I remember the very first time you saw a Visbane—you went and hid in the corner, just like you're doing now...

120421112.content: But you're capable of so much more than just taking out a couple of Visbanes. It's just like Zhiming said the day she took you on as a student: there's more to being a Modifier than fighting.

120421113.content: I don't want to see you get hurt.

120421114.content: I only wanted to be more like you...

120421116.content: I got used to fighting, and now it's the only thing I can do. I don't want you to be like me.

120421118.content: No buts, Linyu. Think about it—what would Lingguang have done if you weren't able to break free of Gremory's hold?

120421120.content: Go easy on her, Yingzhao. It's not her fault.

120421121.content: If you want to blame someone, blame me. I didn't even notice Gremory had possessed her.

120421122.content: I don't blame you for that.

120421123.content: Then don't blame Linyu either. She's already done enough.

120421124.content: Gremory is sly and unpredictable. I don't think anyone can claim to be immune to her mind control.

120421125.content: If Linyu hadn't bought us some extra time in the workshop, it would have been almost impossible for us to make Gremory appear. If she'd have remained dormant, the consequences would have been even more serious.

120421127.content: I was barely able to stop the Bane Energy. I just... hid...

120421128.content: Linyu's eyes lose their shine, and she looks down at her feet in shame. Yingzhao is silent for a long time, and finally raises her hand.

120421129.content: We think she's about to say something, but instead she takes a candy out from her pouch and waves it in front of Linyu, who doesn't react.

120421130.content: Yingzhao seems to be at a loss over what to do, but Linyu suddenly reaches out and snatches the candy from her.

120421131.content: I didn't see what it was. It's not some weird flavor, is it?

120421133.content: I'm sorry, Linyu. I was just worried about you.

120421134.content: I know, and I'm sorry too. But really, I'm fine.

120421135.content: Linyu fiddles with the candy in her fingers, not wanting to unwrap it just yet. Yingzhao strokes her hair, then turns to face us.

120421136.content: Thank you, Lingguang. You too, #{nickname}#, and Verthandi. I have to get going.

120421138.content: The boss has given me a job to do, so I've got to work overtime. Looks like I'm not going to get a good vacation after all...

120421139.content: Now that Linyu is okay, there's no need for me to stay.

120421140.content: Yingzhao leaves abruptly, accidentally slamming the door behind her in her haste. It must be an urgent job she has to do, but I can't help feeling there's something else going on.

120421141.content: Your sister loves you a lot, doesn't she?

120421142.content: That's right. Now now, don't be sad, Linyu.

120421143.content: I-I know she loves me. If she ever got hurt, I'd be even more worried than she was...

120421144.content: But she's right, I do suck at combat... She's been protecting me ever since we were kids. But look at me, I might as well still be a kid!

120421145.content: I just... I just wish I could help people like she does.

120421146.content: Linyu carefully places the candy in her pocket and looks in the direction of the door. She smiles.

120421147.content: I just wish I could stand alongside Yingzhao.

120421148.content: Yingzhao back pressed against the door, and holds her breath as she hears silence descend in the room.

120421149.content: Not until the sound of voices can once again be heard does she exhale. After taking a second to compose herself, she goes downstairs to Luliang's office.

120421150.content: She does not enter, however, because the person she is going to see is already waiting outside.

120421152.content: I take it from your face that Linyu is awake?

120421153.content: Yes. Lingguang is in there with some people from Aether Gazer, and they told me what happened...

120421154.content: I'm guessing you want me to retrieve the AGI Mechas and equipment from Mount Jingdu?

120421156.content: You're sharp, Yingzhao. That puts my mind at ease.

120421157.content: There's something else we need you to do on Mount Jingdu apart from picking up the stuff that Zhu left.

120431001.content: Is there really nothing else you want to eat other than barbecue?

120431002.content: You folks can choose the rest, heh...

120431003.content: What are you looking at, Admin?

120431004.content: Nothing. I was just thinking how nice it is to see the streets so busy...

120431005.content: Really? Isn't it always like this?

120431006.content: The streets bustling with people happily living their lives... This is what it was like three days ago when Ver and I first arrived in Xu Heng.

120431007.content: At the time, all I could do was marvel at the stability of this floating island. Now, I understand how hard they've had to fight for this stability.

120431008.content: Is there anything you want to eat, Admin?

120431009.content: If we're going to a restaurant, I'm sure I'll find something on the menu. Gengchen, why are you buying groceries?

120431012.content: I don't know if my signature dishes are to your taste, so...

120431013.content: Ver and I can't hide our surprise. Gengchen is looking at us strangely. I don't think she's joking...

120431014.content: Is that why you dragged Ver and I with you?

120431015.content: Yes. So if you see anything in the market you'd like to try, let me know.

120431016.content: We follow Gengchen into the market. Lots of the stall owners wave enthusiastically at us when they see her.

120431017.content: Nice to see you again, Chief Gengchen!

120431019.content: See how fresh these vegetables are—there's still dew on the leaves! Why don't you take a pound or two home with you?

120431020.content: Are these your friends? If they're staying with you, you should rustle them up a feast! I've got some premium beef here, and some chicken from the Tsai family farm.

120431021.content: The stall owners shout over each other, each one recommending their wares to Gengchen as though she were an ordinary customer.

120431022.content: Gengchen listens to them patiently, then seems to suddenly remember something and turns toward Ver and me.

120431023.content: Ver, I'll let you pick which meat you want. I've just got to go and buy some essentials.

120431024.content: I eye Gengchen suspiciously as she walks over to a vegetable stand, unsure what these "essentials" could be. Ver and I pick a few pounds of meat.

120431025.content: Gengchen soon returns, carrying a heavy bag.

120431026.content: We've got the meat, Gengchen. What did you get?

120431028.content: Gengchen examines our selection and nods in satisfaction, then leads us further into the market.

120431029.content: That's enough vegetables, we just need a bit more meat. Oh, and something to drink...

120431030.content: We don't need anything pre-cooked. Meatballs... Do you want hot pot?

120431031.content: The hot pot is in the center of the table. Meatballs churn to and fro on top of the bubbling broth.

120431032.content: In the reception room transformed into a makeshift restaurant, the four of us sit around the pot and chat over our meal, like we're having an ordinary dinner between friends.

120431033.content: I just realized, we're normally all so busy on the different islands, this is the first time in ages we've all sat down together like this.

120431034.content: It's a shame Zhiming isn't here. And I saw Mengzhang yesterday, but I don't know where he's got to now... When was the last time all five of us were in the same room?

120431035.content: It must have been three years ago now.

120431036.content: Oh yeah, when we went fishing in Shuofang Isle. Man, that place was weird.

120431037.content: #{nickname}#, Ver, if you go to Shuofang Isle while you're here, you should take fishing rods with you.

120431039.content: It's a small lake in the mountain next to Zhiming's research institute.

120431040.content: Zhiming said it's the easiest fishing she's ever had, but we were there for hours and didn't get a single bite.

120431041.content: You and Mengzhang were being so loud and clumsy, you probably scared all the fish away.

120431042.content: It's a good thing Chief had laid out some traps beforehand—she caught two carp in them and cooked us up a fish stew. We would have gone hungry were it not for her.

120431043.content: I thought it was over-seasoned. You couldn't really taste the fish.

120431044.content: Chief Gengchen... set up fish traps?

120431045.content: You'd be surprised at the number of odd skills she has up her sleeve.

120431046.content: She used to live alone before the Quad was founded, and even though she's moved there now, she's still not used to having people look after her.

120431047.content: Not only that, she takes care of everyone else even more than others do.

120431048.content: Although, come to think of it, it has been a while since the chief cooked for us.

120431049.content: But that's because she... No, never mind.

120431050.content: Perhaps it's because she's too busy. The Quad has had a lot on its plate these past couple of years.

120431051.content: Ver and I exchange glances. We can tell Lingguang is hiding something from us, but we know we can't ask what. Our conversation is interrupted by the sound of approaching footsteps outside.

120431052.content: I always find the most interesting conversations take place before dinner.

120431053.content: The final member of the dinner party enters the room with a smile, props her black umbrella next to the door and takes a seat next to Ver.

120431055.content: Quite a lot. The forecast got it wrong again.

120431056.content: Sudden storms are normal here in this season. It'll have stopped by the time we finish.

120431057.content: I hope so—I need to leave again as soon as I've eaten.

120431059.content: In the kitchen. She hasn't had time to cook recently, and we didn't want to spoil her fun.

120431060.content: She has been in there a long time, though... Maybe she's rustling us up something special.

120431061.content: Now you mention it... Can everybody smell that?

120431062.content: Yes! I thought I was the only one...

120431063.content: You mean that chili pepper smell?

120431064.content: I suddenly remember the big bag of "seasoning" Gengchen bought earlier, and it dawns on me.

120431065.content: I'm allowed to go in the kitchen, right?

120431066.content: I scurry out to the kitchen, and my nose is assaulted by the pungent smell of the spicy peppers. I cover my nose to try and protect myself.

120431068.content: As I squint at my surroundings, I can make out Gengchen holding a spatula in both hands, and a bag of something bright red next to the stove.

120431069.content: It's taken me a while to get the balance of flavors right...

120431070.content: I don't think you need to add any more, I can't really handle...

120431071.content: I give up on the sentence when I see how many chilis are already floating in the pot.

120431073.content: As the meatballs finish cooking, Gengchen and I bring out one delicious dish after another, until the table is full.

120431074.content: The smell alone is enough to get the saliva running, and the taste... I take back all the silent doubts I had about Gengchen's skill in the kitchen.

120431075.content: Yum! This is so delicious even without the chilis!

120431076.content: Where are you going, rookie? The food's over here!

120431077.content:
I wanted to take a photo of everything. Don't worry, I won't post it anywhere.
Slow down, Ver, the food's not going anywhere!

120431078.content: First time I've ever seen someone who enjoys meat more than I do...

120431079.content: This is all so good! Even better than a restaurant!

120431080.content: Dig in! There's plenty for everyone.

120431081.content: You should drink some tea to help with digestion... Not that much, Jianbing.

120431082.content: Stop being a buzzkill. We haven't had chief's cooking in months...

120431083.content: The dishes are quite small and the seasoning can be quite strong, so everything needs to be cooked very precisely to bring out the flavors better. I'll be able to cook more often once we get through all we've had going on lately.

120431085.content: I was just wondering what you would have brought out for us, if the rookie here hadn't gone in the kitchen to check up on you.

120431086.content: Oh... Just some Xu Heng specialties.

120431087.content: Haha, that isn't what it looked like when the rookie came back out.

120431088.content: Er... I just thought all those chilis would have made it too spicy for us. If it's a Xu Heng specialty though, I'll give it a try next time.

120431089.content: Deal. I'll give you a double portion.

120431090.content: Eat it while it's hot, Admin. Would you like anything to drink?

120431092.content: Ver, slow down! Save me a little...

120431093.content: It's fine, there's still so much left.

120431094.content: The meal lasts for over an hour. Everyone is completely stuffed, yet we all wish we could continue eating.

120431095.content: Talk around the table covers a whole host of topics, from the differences between Xu Heng and Ain Soph, to stories from the Quad and Aether Gazer...

120431096.content: Yet there is absolutely no mention of Mount Jingdu or Gremory, as though there is a tacit understanding not to let these lingering shadows spoil the party atmosphere.

120431099.content: The puddles after the rain hold trembling reflections of the moon and neon street signs, as though the streets were strewn with broken shards of the night sky.

120431100.content: Odin looks down to check her trousers as her boots send splashes of water leaping into the air, then waves at me and Ver.

120431101.content: I won't be too long. If everything goes well, I'll be able to go back with you two the day after tomorrow.

120431102.content: Is it the container for the Cinders?

120431103.content: A good memory can be a curse, rookie.

120431104.content: Of course I'm curious about something that's so important you have to deliver it personally.

120431105.content: Well, you'll have to just keep being curious for the time being.

120431106.content: You don't need to walk me to the harbor. You should take Ver back to her room, she's practically asleep on her feet.

120431108.content: Oh, sorry Odin... I'm really sleepy again...

120431110.content: I don't know... Food coma, I guess.

120431111.content: But you don't need to come with me, I can find my own way back.

120431112.content: Tian Lu Traders is quite far from here. Are you sure you'll be okay on your own?

120431113.content: Sure. I promise I won't fall asleep until my head hits the pillow...

120431114.content: Admin, I'll leave it up to you to plan our day tomorrow. Good night!

120431115.content: I can sense that something isn't right with Ver and wants to follow her, but Odin gently grabs my shoulders until she's gone.

120431116.content: I look at her, confused, and think I see a pale golden light disappear from her eyes.

120431117.content: She's fine, you don't need to worry about her. You'll ruin it if you follow her.

120431121.content: Why? So I can ask you more questions you'll refuse to answer?

120431122.content: Perhaps you need to start asking smarter questions.

120431123.content: Will you care if it's a smart question or not if I ask something that's got nothing to do with you?

120431124.content: Let's give it a try. Fire away.

120431126.content: Odin looks up and stares at me, and I see a flash of danger in her eyes.

120431127.content: Firstly, rookie, you shouldn't think that Gengchen has nothing to do with me. Especially now, when there's actually no one else who's more important to me than she is.

120431128.content: And let's not forget, all of the Modifiers have something to do with me, because it's my job to protect them all. If anyone wants to bring them harm, they'll have to go through me first.

120431130.content: Odin pats me on the shoulder and continues walking toward the harbor. I think I see her smiling.

120431132.content: After leaving the Admin and Odin, Ver feels even sleepier than before. She stumbles in the vague direction of Tian Lu Traders, her expression distracted.

120431133.content: I have to make sure I get enough sleep tonight, otherwise the Admin will get annoyed if I'm too tired to do anything fun tomorrow...

120431134.content: What is up with me? Is it really just because I ate too much? Or is it...

120431136.content: Ver jumps at the sound of someone calling her name. She looks up, and notices that she's walked onto a bridge. Gengchen is standing in front of her.

120431137.content: Gengchen? I just said bye to you at the party... What are you doing here?

120431138.content: I needed to clear my head...

120431139.content: Gengchen gently grasps Ver's wrists and floods her body with Divine Power. Ver feels her mind suddenly clear, like a dirty mirror that has just been polished.

120431140.content: Lingguang told me about your tiredness. You are constantly draining your Divine Power without seeming to notice that you're doing it.

120431142.content: All Modifiers need to learn how to relax and how to control themselves.

120431143.content: I can give it a try...

120431144.content: They stand on the bridge, wordlessly.

120431145.content: The city of Yu Jing stretches from their feet to the twinkling lights of thousands of homes in the distance. The gulf in between keeps watch over the dwindling night.

120431146.content: Ver looks at Gengchen, who is watching the silver-tipped waves on the river below. She suddenly feels everything melting away.

120431148.content: Oh, nothing. It's just a feeling. You are very similar to Odin, and yet also completely different...

120431150.content: Well, you're both strong, reliable, you look out for others...

120431151.content: But Odin... She laughs a lot, but she's still quite intimidating, and she always seems to be thinking of something far away.

120431152.content: Whereas you're more... Well, you look more serious, but you make everyone feel at ease. Even when you're not around, it's still possible to feel your comforting presence nearby...

120431154.content: Oh, I'm sorry, it's just that I've never seen you laughing...

120431155.content: It's fine, you're not the first person who's said that about me.

120431156.content: Much has happened, and much more has yet to happen. Everyone has their own reaction to these situations. Our choices change who we are.

120431157.content: Odin and I have known each other for many years now, but we each have our own experiences. Who knows how they have shaped us differently?

120431158.content: Odin is just so hard to read. She's handed the running of Aether Gazer to Miss Shu, she doesn't seem to care about the Cognizant Visbane...

120431159.content: I think you've misunderstood her. First off, she's never cared about the business side of things. As for the Cognizant Visbane...

120431160.content: She cares more about the roots than the shoots. As far as she's concerned, it's much more important to eradicate the source of the Visbanes than it is to take care of the ones that have already appeared. That's what she's always been working toward.

120431162.content: Yes. So if Odin feels like a matter doesn't require her involvement, she'll delegate it to Aether Gazer. Whereas I wouldn't be able to ignore a crisis that's right in front of my eyes.

120431163.content: She's used to walking much further ahead than the rest of us. That's just her way, and her conviction. I can't be as single-minded as that.

120431164.content: Verthandi, you're a member of Aether Gazer. Do you share Odin's conviction?

120431165.content: I... I don't know how to answer that.

120431166.content: Odin tells us it's our duty to eliminate the Visbanes and defend humanity...

120431167.content: Yes... Perhaps she doesn't want you to think about these other questions.

120431168.content: Modifiers are not born to fulfill a single destiny. We will encounter a great many difficult choices and decisions where we won't have time to think.

120431169.content: There is nothing pushing us forward, no signs to tell us if we're heading the right way or not... At least, Odin and I don't know that for sure yet.

120431170.content: But even when we doubt ourselves, we will never waver in the judgments we make.

120431172.content: You never know what's right and what's wrong until you follow your actions through to the very end.

120431173.content: Everyone has their own path. Sooner or later, you'll find the answers you're looking for.

120431174.content: Modifiers stand up for humanity, but we also stand up for our beliefs and what we're fighting for. And that is an especially long and winding road.

120431175.content: All you need to know, Verthandi, is that each and every slash of your sword has significance.

120441004.content: Ver and I high-five each other like school kids who've just finished school for the summer.

120441005.content: But we're smooth, because we've practiced it tons of times in Ain Soph.

120441006.content: I like your new outfit. I remember you weren't too keen when Lingguang made you try it on yesterday.

120441007.content: Hehe, I was worried you'd think it doesn't suit me.

120441008.content: I'm just worried you won't last today. You were so tired last night, but look how much energy you have at 7:30 AM.

120441009.content: Oh yes, that reminds me—I bumped into Gengchen on the way back last night. She examined me.

120441010.content: She said I'd been draining my Divine Power without realizing it, and that's why I'm so tired all the time. I have no idea what I was doing, but I'm feeling much better now!

120441011.content: You saw Gengchen? That can't be what Odin was talking about...

120441012.content: I laugh involuntarily, not thinking too deeply about the cause or the effect of Ver's meeting with Gengchen.

120441013.content: Did Odin say something to you?

120441014.content: She said the Xu Heng Source Layer is beautiful.

120441015.content: Okay, now I know you're lying. I know the Source Layer is dark and depressing. There's no way anyone who's seen it would say it's beautiful.

120441016.content: Maybe normal people wouldn't, but this is Odin we're talking about...

120441017.content: Ver and I chat on our way down to the Tian Lu Traders ground floor, where we're interrupted by a hubbub coming from the lobby.

120441018.content: We both stop talking, and go to see what's happening. There is a crowd of businessmen and women gathered in the lobby's waiting area.

120441019.content: All we want is an explanation.

120441020.content: The lone voice causes the crowd to quieten down, as everyone's gaze turns to the young woman who spoke.

120441021.content: We can't see anyone from CORG here, but we still demand an explanation.

120441022.content: Ms. Luliang, what does the "Xu Heng Evacuation" mean exactly?

120441023.content: Allow me to clarify. It is simply one of CORG's contingency plans. We are not aware of there being any issues with the Astral Engine.

120441024.content: I broke protocol to give you all the green light for the photon rail, and avoid the hassle of transferring districts. It's good business practice to plan for all eventualities. There is absolutely nothing to worry about.

120441025.content: But the preliminary survey was sent to our office, so it must be a pretty certain eventuality. And you're telling us not to worry?

120441027.content: Everyone in the crowd begins talking over each other. It takes Luliang a long time to restore order.

120441028.content: Can you all just calm down? The most important thing in business is credit, and I've already told you everything you need to know.

120441029.content: This is not compulsory and won't be punished, so if you don't want to leave you can just disregard it. But if it really does bother everyone, the Quad and I shall talk to CORG on your behalf.

120441030.content: I'm not pointing fingers, Ms. Luliang, but our last representative, Ms. Gremory, seems to have disappeared.

120441031.content: All production by Illusory Isle Industry in Xu Heng was wrapped up in two days without anyone saying anything. I went to speak to her staff, and they told me they knew as much as I did...

120441032.content: We don't want to send any more representatives. We want to hear the explanation for ourselves.

120441033.content: Cries rise once more from the crowd.

120441034.content: Although I can sympathize with the traders for feeling uneasy, I still feel a sense of cognitive dissonance when I hear them mention Gremory's name.

120441035.content: It sounds like they really trusted Gremory, Admin... How did that happen?

120441036.content: Maybe it's just like she said. She's just really good at playing the game of "life..."

120441037.content: Xu Heng Evacuation... I remember Jianbing mentioning it. Now they've gone and done a preliminary survey?

120441038.content: Hey, you two! Who do you work for?

120441040.content: Come talk with us. Tell us about the plan to evacuate Xu Heng.

120441041.content: Perhaps because we're short and surrounded by people, but it's not until just now that Luliang realizes we're there. She rubs her forehead in irritation.

120441042.content: I'm sorry, these are special guests of Tian Lu Traders and they're here on vacation. They have nothing to do with this matter.

120441043.content: We just want to chat, that's not illegal is it? This is a matter that anyone can sympathize with.

120441044.content: How would you like it if someone suddenly told you to give up everything you've worked for, your plans for the future, your achievements, your passions... to go and hide from a disaster? What would you do in our shoes?

120441045.content: Talking of a "disaster" is a bit of an exaggeration, but we can understand the apprehension of these people who come from another Sephirah Zone. They have all paid a high price to come to Xu Heng, so they have a strong reason to want to stay here.

120441046.content: Everyone is looking at me and Ver. Luliang shakes her head ever so slightly at us, in a sign that we're not obligated to answer this question. But seeing the impact of wild speculation on these traders, I think it best to capitalize on my status as an "outsider" to answer their questions.

120441047.content: I would... think about whether it was truly necessary.

120441049.content: I know a little bit about business, and I know that the calculation of risk-benefit ratios and risk classifications is all about trust.

120441050.content: You must all know that the Quad has emergency plans in place to protect Xu Heng citizens should anything untoward happen. Everyone's safety is guaranteed. What you're really worried about is your assets and your careers.

120441051.content: If what is effectively an insurance policy rattles you enough for you to throw all of that trust out the window, then yes, I do think you need to be somewhere else.

120441052.content: That's easy enough for you to say!

120441053.content: Hey, please show our esteemed guest some respect.

120441054.content: Now that #{nickname}# has spoken up and you're all aware of the facts, let's be frank with each other.

120441055.content: Information isn't a living thing—people are. You all must have decided which one you choose to believe before you came here. You stand to lose something out of this, so you came to see what other people think.

120441056.content: You want me to explain CORG's behavior, but I'm not a part of CORG, so would you believe anything I said? Or would you rather drag me to CORG's door so you can shout at them there? Do you have the guts?

120441057.content: So that's it in a nutshell. If you don't want to leave, stay in Yu Jing and enjoy the party! And if you really want to leave, the letter of intent has already been submitted, right?

120441058.content: The crowd is silent. Seeing the traders throw questioning glances at each other, Luliang smiles and gives us a secret thumbs up.

120441059.content: On the other hand, if there's anyone who's struggling to calculate their profits and losses, I'll be more than happy to help. For a small consultancy fee, of course...

120441062.content: Out on the street, Ver and I look with admiration at the bustling lobby in the Tian Lu Traders building.

120441063.content: I can see why she's the boss—a one-minute speech and she makes a killing!

120441064.content: Luliang has been running Tian Lu Traders for decades, there can't be anything she hasn't seen before. But not even I was expecting her to get out of that situation so quickly, let alone profit from it.

120441065.content: It shows how much people trust her business acumen.

120441066.content: You did well too, Admin. You could sense the way she wanted things to go.

120441067.content: That's thanks to Miss Shu's teachings. You shadow a CEO for a couple of days, and you quickly learn how businesspeople think.

120441068.content:
Anyway, that's quite enough business for one day. Let's go and enjoy our vacation!
The first stop recommended by the Xu Heng guidebook is the Spring Gardens!

120441070.content: What's wrong? Don't you want to go? It's the biggest park in Yu Jing...

120441071.content: I look at Ver doubtfully. I know she usually has a good time no matter where she goes, but at the end of the day we all have our own likes and dislikes...

120441072.content: Oh no... It's not that, Admin.

120441073.content: I meant, shouldn't the first stop be breakfast?

120441074.content: Five minutes later, Ver and I are strolling down the street with steaming sesame buns in our hands.

120441075.content: So have you decided on an itinerary for today?

120441076.content: Of course! Somebody tasked me with that yesterday, and I put a lot of thought and effort into it.

120441077.content: Do you want to take a look? If there's somewhere you don't want to go, or somewhere you do that's not on the list, we can adjust the schedule slightly.

120441078.content: I hand Ver my phone with the proposed itinerary written on it.

120441080.content: "First stop: the Spring Gardens, Yu Jing's most famous park. With its traditional pavilions and rustic courtyards, it's not hard to imagine yourself back in ancient Xu Heng..."
