121431002.content: The aircraft hovers twenty meters above the peak of Mount Jingdu. Luliang opens the cabin hatch and gives the pilot a thumbs up.

121431003.content: Spotting the workshop, Luliang takes out her abacus, "Omnicalc," and throws it out of the aircraft. She then jumps out after it.

121431005.content: The workshop and surrounding paths are a hive of activity. Hearing a strange noise coming from above them, the people look up and are greeted with the sight of a young lady seeming to "skateboard" down from the sky.

121431006.content: Huh? Oh, boss! What are you doing here?

121431008.content: Yingzhao said there was an emergency. Where is she?

121431009.content: Director Yingzhao? She just went down the mountain, but didn't say what for.

121431012.content: The debris has been cleared out, but the defense system override is going to take more time. Zhu's technology is so complicated that it's taking Engineering ages to figure it out.

121431013.content: Luckily the outer shields and jammers had been disabled, otherwise the transporters wouldn't have been able to get in.

121431014.content: Alright, just be careful when you're messing about with it. Otherwise, when Zhiming gets back and finds out...

121431015.content: In short, don't waste your effort doing things you shouldn't. Just clean it up and get back.

121431017.content: Oh, and where are the AGI Mechas?

121431018.content: Mechas? I haven't seen any Mechas up here...

121431019.content: Luliang seems surprised by the answer. Her gaze darts to the mountain path leading down as a hint of concern clouds her expression.

121431020.content: Nothing... Keep up the good work. I'll go down and check on her.

121431021.content: As Luliang follows the path down the mountain, the workshop gradually gets swallowed up by the trees until the vegetation is all she can see on either side of her. There isn't a single man-made thing in sight.

121431022.content: The mountain slopes are not in the scope of the Modifier's investigations, but Luliang knows why Yingzhao would have come here.

121431023.content: There's something else we need you to do on Mount Jingdu apart from picking up the stuff that Zhu left.

121431025.content: When Lingguang and the others got to Mount Jingdu yesterday, she and Jianbing got themselves caught in a space trap. It was so well hidden that Jianbing concluded it must have been placed there deliberately by someone.

121431026.content: I've tasked Jianbing with following Gremory's tracks. The trap might have clues we haven't discovered yet, and the Cognizant Visbane will know how to get rid of them.

121431027.content: Take a team to camp on the mountaintop and sort through what Zhu left behind, and set up surveillance cameras near the space trap.

121431028.content: Work alone. Gremory has been hiding in Yu Jing all these years. She'll have her spies everywhere. If you come across the Cognizant Visbane, tell me and I'll come.

121431030.content: What are you waiting for, a farewell speech? Just be careful.

121431032.content: Surely she didn't bump into the Cognizant Visbane? Or she would have told Mantou...

121431033.content: The anxiety builds in her chest. The only thing that comforts her is the fact that Yingzhao had time to send a message at least.

121431035.content: The silence of the forest is torn apart by the sound of an explosion. In the distance, Luliang can see debris thrown into the air and crashing into the trees.

121431037.content: Her eyes wide in confusion, Luliang can suddenly make out Yingzhao's voice, and dashes off in the direction of the explosion.

121432001.content: Hah, looks like you could get a little rusty if you haven't been fighting for years. These past couple of days were quite some exercise for me...

121432002.content: Are you all right, Yingzhao? Why did you start fighting the AGI Mechas?

121432003.content: They tripped the surveillance cameras. The trap Lingguang found is just up ahead.

121432004.content: Yingzhao points off to one side of the mountain path, towards a large crater.

121432005.content: The mechas are destroying this area of the mountain, and I don't know why. Maybe it's like Chief Gengchen said. They're trying to cover up something.

121432007.content: No. I didn't even see the AGI Mechas when I got to Mount Jingdu.

121432008.content: I asked Mengzhang and he told me to search around nearby. I wasted all day yesterday looking for them. I figured they'd been transferred.

121432010.content: Yes. The Bane-corrupted AGI Mechas that have been seen in other Sephirah Zones can't have been created by the mechas themselves. They can only be controlled. Whatever's doing it must be going from place to place, sowing havoc...

121432011.content: Wait wait wait... Are you saying somebody is controlling these AGI Mechas?

121432012.content: Makes sense, right? Even if they're Zhu's, they're still little more than hunks of iron.

121432013.content: Are you sure these AGI Mechas are Zhu's? These models are hardly out of the ordinary.

121432014.content: Yingzhao nods and picks up a fragment of mecha shell, blowing off the dirt covering it and handing it to Luliang. She points to a barely visible engraving of the ancient character for "nine".

121432015.content: Craftsmen usually engrave their own emblems on the machines they use, a bit like painters' signatures. This character of the word "nine" is the one Zhu used.

121432016.content: I must say, I'm impressed by all the random facts you seem to know.

121432017.content: ...Mengzhang told Gengchen, and she told me.

121432019.content: If it really is Gremory or her secret accomplice who's controlling these, then we've just gone and shown ourselves to the enemy.

121432020.content: Even Tian Lu Traders was attacked by Visbanes. I shudder to think about how long Gremory must have infiltrated us for...

121432021.content: I also hear there was a fault with the Astral Engine last night.

121432022.content: It's been dealt with. Trust in the Quad.

121432023.content: Dealt with... Why don't I believe that?

121432024.content: Yingzhao looks down at the ground, then suddenly pulls Luliang down into a crouch.

121432027.content: A tremendous shock shakes the ground, so severe that Luliang almost loses her balance. It subsides as suddenly as it started, and it's as though nothing had happened.

121432028.content: Boss, you got really... unlucky. There are normally only two tremors a day.

121432029.content: Was that the Engineers doing? Are they trying to bring down the mountain?

121432033.content: Luliang is speechless. Though she has long grown accustomed to Yingzhao's ever-calm, never-changing expression, she wishes that for once she would just show some emotion.

121432034.content: ...You know, lots of people didn't want to believe what CORG said when they tried to convince them to leave Xu Heng.

121432035.content: People don't need to know every little detail about Cloudsong Ore and the Astral Engine. The more people care about something, the more likely they'd be emotionally manipulated.

121432036.content: I told everyone to keep it secret. The sky dwellers don't know about it yet.

121432037.content: No matter if it's secret or not, we shouldn't make assumptions before we have proof. After all, the stability of the Cloudsong Ore is...

121432038.content: Yingzhao says nothing. She hops into the pit and strikes the ground with her Access Key, creating a column of solidified air so powerful it drills a tunnel into the rock formation.

121432039.content: What lies at the end of this tunnel is not a spring, but the exposed tip of a giant seam of green ore.

121432041.content: At almost the same time that daylight reaches the Cloudsong Ore, the mountain once again begins to shake violently.

121432042.content: Seeing the look on Luliang's face, Yingzhao kicks some large rocks into the tunnel to block the entrance. The shaking gradually comes to a stop.

121432043.content: Was that enough proof for you?

121432044.content: Boss, if the Astral Engine really is malfunctioning, we're not going to be able to stop it.

121432047.content: You're worrying too much. If Mantou hasn't said anything, then there isn't a problem.

121432048.content: Luliang takes a deep breath in, then abruptly turns to go back up the mountain. She waves casually to Yingzhao without turning her head, as if she doesn't want to reveal her expression.

121432049.content: Once the clean-up is done, I want a team to stay stationed here to monitor the mountain. If you discover any signs of instability, get it fixed.

121432050.content: ...This is a good mountain. We should not let Cloudsong Ore destroy it again.

121441003.content: Morning. Is the chief in her office?

121441004.content: I haven't seen the chief yet. There was a visit from CORG last night, and the light in her office was on all the way till dawn. She must still be sleeping.

121441005.content: It couldn't have been easy for her to agree to CORG's plan... I'll pay her a visit.

121441008.content: The chief has been looking a little off-color lately. And last night, the Astral Engine... Is she doing alright?

121441010.content: Of course. The chief's just a little... I'll look after her.

121441011.content: Unlike the heavily defended outer perimeter, there are very few patrols inside the Quad.

121441012.content: The closer one gets to the central administrative building, the fewer guards there are. Because there's no safer place than the courtyard behind it.

121441013.content: The door to the courtyard has a plate with Gengchen's name on it, but the identity recognition system allows Lingguang through.

121441015.content: Lingguang approaches the door to Gengchen's bedroom, which is ajar. No sound can be heard coming from inside.

121441017.content: Lingguang? Are you looking for me?

121441018.content: Gengchen emerges from a side room and closes the door behind her. Both are a little surprised to see the other.

121441019.content: Is there a problem with the partnership between the Photon Rail and CORG?

121441020.content: You must have seen the news. Khnum's publicly announced everything, but there's no way I can persuade everyone to leave Xu Heng...

121441021.content: I'm not here to talk business today. Chief, would you mind if I check your power levels again?

121441023.content: Everyone has noticed the change in you since you and Odin returned from the Source Layer, and they're worried. And given what happened with the Astral Engine last night...

121441024.content: I promised everyone I'd look after you. I know there's a lot I'm not qualified to do, but at least this... Now I know everything about the Sephirah Core and Prime Power, I can't just sit back.

121441025.content: Please let me do this, Chief... I know you haven't said anything, but there are some things I can guess.

121441026.content: All of Gengchen's excuses dissolve at the sight of the worry on Lingguang's face, and she bows her head apologetically.

121441028.content: Lingguang says no more and ushers Gengchen into the room. She closes the door and draws the curtains. It's now so dark that they can barely make out each other's faces.

121441029.content: I'm sorry, Lingguang... You are most kind-hearted of all, and the last thing I want is you worrying about me.

121441030.content: I only worry when you hide things from me...

121441031.content: Lingguang undoes Gengchen's collar. Gengchen removes her armor, and then slowly her shirt.

121441032.content: A blue-green light bursts from Gengchen's back, as though suddenly unshackled, and quickly wraps itself around her.

121441034.content: Ancient chains coil in the air like dragons, strong and able to bind anything. However, when the light fades, it is clear to see that they are cracked and broken.

121441035.content: Just as I suspected. It's even more serious than before.

121441036.content: Is there a way to suppress it?

121441037.content: As it stands now, even with the Heterocore it'd be tough... What is it you and Odin did there, exactly?

121441038.content: I helped Odin with something. This power is my gift, and I should use it to its fullest.

121441040.content: If someone else said that to me, I'd advise them that their own health should be their top priority. But since it's you, Chief... I know there's a lot you need to do... that only you can do.

121441041.content: I just can't stand seeing you like this. The problem is staring us right in the face, yet there's nothing we can do to fix it.

121441042.content: It's not your fault. This power was given to the Prime Modifiers by Gaea, of course there's nothing we can do to "fix" it.

121441043.content: I get what you're saying, but that doesn't make it any less frustrating.

121441044.content: I didn't want to tell you when the cracks first started appearing. But I told you eventually, because I thought there maybe was a way.

121441045.content: That was me forcing my false hope onto you. Don't get frustrated because of my selfishness and poor judgment.

121441047.content: So you shouldn't do it, either. You have done much to staunch the loss of my power these past two years.

121441048.content: Has it been two years? If only we had more time, I might actually be more useful...

121441049.content: People are strange. We know we're powerless to change some things, but if there's a method we haven't tried, we'll probably regret it for the rest of our lives.

121441051.content: I'll help you put your clothes back on.

121441052.content: Once Gengchen's armor is back on, Lingguang opens the curtains and takes a deep breath as light floods back into the room. She smiles and turns to look back at Gengchen.

121441053.content: It's a nice day. Shall we go for a walk?

121441054.content: What do you think you are doing here at the Qu—

121441055.content: Hold on, are you... the two visitors from Aether Gazer?

121441056.content: Unless you have other people here in Xu Heng on business, then yes, we're the "two visitors."

121441057.content: My sincere apologies. I heard deputy Mengzhang talk about you two just a couple of days ago. I must really thank you for what you did at Mount Jingdu.

121441058.content:
Oh, there's no need for that. It was our duty.
May I ask, is Ms. Gengchen here?

121441059.content: You here for the chief? Please wait here while I go check.

121441060.content: You could at least show them in, since you already know they're our guests.

121441061.content: Before the Modifier on duty can turn to check, Ver and I see two familiar figures coming out from the courtyard.

121441063.content: Just who the Admin and I have come here to see. Are you busy now, Ms. Gengchen?

121441064.content: We greet Gengchen and Lingguang, and tell them why we are here. Gengchen gives us one of her rare smiles.

121441065.content: I have nothing going on at the moment. Please, step this way so we can discuss further.

121441066.content: And Cangfeng, why are you on duty today? It was only last night you got injured.

121441067.content: Well, I'm perfectly fine. Xiwu is the one who's still recovering.

121441068.content: Still can't remember what happened last night?

121441069.content: I'm sorry, I can't. I only remember that the two of us went after the Visbane...

121441070.content: Lingguang stays back to talk to the Mod some more, then catches back up with us. Sounds like some people did get wounded during the Visbane attack. I can only hope this Xiwu makes a speedy recovery.

121441071.content: I hope you are not affected by last night's incident.

121441072.content: No civilians were harmed in the Visbane attack, but it was a near miss. What shocked us though was...

121441073.content: What's been playing on my mind is just on the tip of my tongue, but I manage to catch myself in time.

121441074.content: No worries. I spoke to Odin earlier this morning, and she said she's told you two about the Sephirah Core.

121441076.content: I'm secretly glad Odin told her, because otherwise it would have been awkward for Ver and I to raise it with Gengchen.

121441077.content: Odin told us everything in detail last night, about how Gengchen had no choice but to take out the Sephirah Core to stop the Cloudsong Crisis, and that they didn't know that the Sephirah Core would sap her powers. It was not something that we could've expected, either.

121441078.content: We tacitly avoid going further on the Sephirah Core topic as we walk into the inner area of the Quad.

121441079.content: Come to think of it, this is our first time in the Quad. It's stunning! Just as good as the other scenic spots we've visited so far.

121441080.content: Every few years Zhiming would bring engineers here to upgrade the equipment and spruce up the place. I also take care of the plants whenever I come to Yu Jing. So yes, it always looks nice here.

121441081.content: Are you usually stationed on Nanjiao Isle, Lingguang?

121441082.content: Yes. The Quad deputies usually all work on the four isles. I wouldn't be in Yu Jing were it not for all the emergencies we've had recently.

121441083.content: Let's go and have some tea in my office. I'll arrange your return photon rail to Ain Soph.

121441084.content: The Quad is relatively small. In comparison to the other buildings in Yu Jing, which are all state-of-the-art and futuristic, the rooms and green areas here are positively retro.

121441085.content: It actually makes me think of the Old Town ruins: I bet this is how they'd look if they were still standing today.

121441086.content: Ver and I take a seat in Gengchen's office as she prepares a pot of tea for us.

121441087.content: Mengzhang is studying the Heterocore and Jianbing is in charge of the teams scouring the five isles for the Cognizant Visbane, so I won't be asking them to join us.

121441088.content: We only popped in to say hello. There's no need to disturb anyone while they're working.

121441089.content: Speaking of the Heterocore... I thought Lingguang was here to treat you with it. Or does Mengzhang still have it?

121441090.content: Well... I was actually just talking to the chief about this.

121441091.content: I hid the truth when I commissioned the job. The Heterocore wasn't meant for restoring my Prime Power.

121441092.content: Huh? Then what does it do?

121441093.content: The Heterocore was the core for the Astral Engine. Zhu and Zhiming designed it together, but they soon abandoned it because the engine kept overloading it's computational power.

121441094.content: Mengzhang is trying to find a way to resolve the overload problem. If he succeeds, the Heterocore will become the engine's new core.

121441095.content: If the chief no longer has to stretch her power to maintain the engine, then that's one less thing to worry about. Preventing her condition from deteriorating further is still a good result.

121441097.content: Sounds like that's the best solution we've got. Maybe the power will recover over time?

121441099.content: I'm not surprised by Gengchen's admission that her power might not be restored.

121441100.content: I think I'd already guessed as much last night when I found out the Astral Engine relies on the Sephirah Core to work.

121441101.content: In a sense, this is one person's fight against Gaea's rules and the will which created them in the first place. Perhaps it's worth the cost.

121441102.content: It will take some time to retrofit the Heterocore though... And since we don't know how long that is, I've had no choice but to agree to CORG's plan.

121441103.content: The Astral Engine is unstable, and the people of Xu Heng will inevitably begin to panic. Odin was right—the sooner you both return to Ain Soph, the better.

121441104.content: I didn't realize last night was going to usher in so much change.

121441105.content: ...But are you sure it's the right thing to do? A lot of people still have faith in the Quad, and they're waiting for your response.

121441106.content: The Quad hasn't been fighting all this time just to win the people's support. We've been fighting for their right to choose.

121441107.content: Promises that can't be kept are fragile and short-lived. #{nickname}#, I cannot let my visions dictate the future of these people.

121441109.content: A person's ability determines how they respond to something that has already happened, whereas their attitude determines how they respond to something yet to come.

121441110.content: I'm in no position to question Gengchen's attitude, because I know that nothing she decides at this point can be easy.

121441111.content: Hey, we've come to say goodbye. No need for the sad faces.

121441112.content: Let's stay positive! I'm sure Mengzhang will find a way to stabilize the Astral Engine!

121441113.content: Hmm, except Gremory still hasn't been found and we don't know what she's got left up her sleeve...

121441114.content: About Gremory... Chief, in this morning's report...

121441115.content: Gengchen cuts Lingguang out with a severe shake of the head, but Ver and I are still able to make out the questioning tone in Lingguang's voice.

121441116.content: We've fought side by side in battle before. You don't need to be polite around us.

121441117.content: Yeah! If there's anything you need taking care of, the Admin and I don't mind getting our hands dirty!

121441118.content: (Whispering) You're making it sound like we're dealing with some illegal business...

121441119.content: (Whispering) I just meant we'd be happy to help out...

121441122.content: It's like when Shu caught us whispering together during training. We instinctively straighten our backs in perfect synchrony.

121441123.content: The two Quad members look amused, and Lingguang tries to stifle a chuckle. Gengchen stays silent, as though pondering how to make comments on our response...

121441124.content: In the end she gives up, and with an apologetic bow of the head she opens the data records on her screen projector.

121441125.content: An energy spike was detected on the ground earlier this morning.

121441126.content: What's that? Is it Gremory's Bane Energy?

121441127.content: No... Bane Energy doesn't have this kind of gradient and flow pattern.

121441128.content: The spike was detected on another mountain not too far away from Mount Jingdu. Our people on the ground can't make heads or tails of the readings they recorded.

121441129.content: The Mimir system might be able to help us shed some light on this...

121441130.content: I see... Lord Mimir is powerful indeed. Just like when we were looking for the Heterocore.

121441131.content: But please don't feel obligated to help us.

121441132.content: It's no bother at all. Actually, Ver and I agreed last night that if there was anything you needed...

121441133.content: We'd do everything we can to help.

121441135.content: Everyone here is hellbent on sticking to their own ideas. Well, this is ours.

121441136.content: Where is this mountain? I'll go there with the Admin.

121441137.content: It's not the kind of place you'd want to stay. I'll go with you so we can get out again as quickly as possible.

121451002.content: When I regain consciousness, I find myself in the Source Layer. I've never seen Xu Heng's Source Layer before, but the cold, oppressive feeling is pretty familiar.

121451003.content: Gengchen leads us down a path that isn't really a path. I find myself unable to relax, and spend the entire time gripping my gun tightly and closely surveying the strange surroundings.

121451004.content: Ver seems to have forgotten that we almost lost our lives the last time we traveled to the Source Layer. She looks up in amazement at this building... thing.

121451005.content: This is... spectacular! Now I understand why Odin said the Xu Heng Source Layer is beautiful.

121451006.content: I'd love to bring Lil' Osi here if we get a chance!

121451007.content: Maybe Shu will let you come visit the Source Layer when you get as strong as Thor.

121451008.content: But it'll take me forever to become as strong as Thor! So you're basically saying it'll never happen?

121451009.content: Divine Power can be strong or weak, but you have control over your own ability. Don't put yourself down like that.

121451010.content: Well, when you put it like that... I just feel like Thor and I are worlds apart.

121451011.content: Admin, you don't need to be so jumpy. Tell you what, I'll go make sure there are no Visbanes around.

121451012.content: (Cough) I'm fine... Just don't get yourself lost.

121451013.content: Ver isn't going far, so I leave her to it. It was her idea, after all. I realize that she's been getting more assertive recently, and is growing both on the battlefield and in her relationships with people.

121451014.content: Gengchen, I know it's quicker to travel through the Source Layer, but it still feels a bit strange...

121451016.content: It's not that. Your and Ver's Divine Power is protecting me... I'm just positive there are Visbanes in the Source Layer, so we probably have to fight sooner or later. And that'll cost us extra time.

121451017.content: Like you said, it's quicker to travel through the Source Layer. There's a direct route from the Quad to the target.

121451018.content: Are we avoiding other people? Because of the Sephirah Core?

121451019.content: Yes. #{nickname}#, the Sephirah Core has always been safe in the past. But I've heard you've had two incidents with it in the past six months alone.

121451020.content: Otis, and Ladon... Strictly speaking, these probably don't count as incidents that only happened in the past six months.

121451021.content: Otis' experiments ran for several years. Ladon was lying in wait in Omorfies for a long time, too. They'd had their eyes on the Sephirah Core for quite a while.

121451022.content: "Everything is governed by cause and effect; only fools believe in coincidence." It is no accident that both Otis and Ladon chose to act now.

121451023.content: What could there be that connects these two things?

121451024.content: Whoever that covets the Sephirah Core... is dangerous.

121451025.content: I can't determine if it's only the Mimir system that'd identified the anomaly triggered by the Sephirah Core last night, #{nickname}#.

121451026.content: If I publicly leave Yu Jing, I think something might happen to the Astral Engine.

121451027.content: "We mustn't gamble with the whole civilization."

121451028.content: Right... Is that what Odin told you? She must really trust you.

121451029.content: It was when I walked her to the harbor the other night. She'd had a bit to drink, and there was the sea breeze... It's easy to let secrets slip in a situation like that.

121451030.content: Actually, as a human, I'd rather...

121451032.content: That is an option worth exploring.

121451033.content: I haven't think it through myself. Just a rough idea.

121451034.content: After having spent time with you and Odin, I've realized that my ideas are often too simplistic. How many things do I need to experience before I can be as assertive as you two?

121451035.content: Experience isn't always a good thing...

121451037.content: We hadn't realized how long Ver had been gone for, until we hear her cry out. It sounds like she's "patrolled" a bit further than she originally intended.

121451038.content: She suddenly appears around the corner, along with a swarm of Visbanes. It's hard to tell who's chasing whom, and Gengchen and I can't decide if she's actually "helping"...

121452001.content: I can't see anything... No people, and no Visbanes either.

121452002.content: After leaving the Source Layer, we find ourselves in an empty grassy field, as quiet as though we were the first people to have ever come here.

121452003.content: Is this the place, Ms. Gengchen?

121452005.content: Gengchen's Access Key glows faintly. She brings her fingers together as a brush, and calmly draws an inky pattern in the air. The lines are connecting something in all four directions.

121452006.content: High levels of energy detected! High levels of energy detected!

121452007.content: A slight vibration can be felt in the air for kilometers around. Gengchen's Divine Grace appears to be scanning the void, and gathers the unnatural energy signatures in front of us.

121452008.content: The floating energy trapped in front of us is barely bigger than a football. I quickly take out my terminal and scan it to analyze.

121452009.content: These restraints won't hold for long.

121452011.content: Gengchen separates her hands and the vibrations quickly subside. The energy ball dissipates in a second.

121452012.content: Looks like you were right, Admin. It's not Bane Energy.

121452013.content: But that's all we know. Mimir was only able to acquire basic data, and it didn't give a conclusion. So that means...

121452014.content: Mimir, retrieve records from the sample database and cross-validate matching features.

121452015.content: Searching... Search complete. No matching records found.

121452016.content: So, it's something no one at Aether Gazer has ever seen before?

121452017.content: It's more than just a difference in size.

121452018.content: It's alright, guys. Everything was unknown at first. Admin, how about we ask the Cryptics to look into it?

121452019.content: The reason Odin went back to Ain Soph was to speak to the Cryptics, so I don't know if Heimdall and her team have any time... I might as well ask. Mimir, continue scanning for nearby signals.

121452020.content: Let's scout around. At the very least, that energy ball proves there is something alive around here. And if it's existed once, it will have left clues.

121452021.content: I decide to leave the technical wizardry to the professionals. I message the Cryptics, and Heimdall simply replies with, "I've got time.", leaving me standing there staring at the blank screen, waiting for more details to be sent back.

121452022.content: Ver searches the surrounding area for more traces. Gengchen stands beside the mountain path and stares deep in thought at the spot where the energy ball was.

121452023.content: ...Ten minutes later, my communicator rings. I accept the video call, and am greeted by the Cryptics' laboratory, which is a hive of activity. Heimdall appears, looking tired.

121452024.content: Admin, sorry... The Cryptics are a little busy right now, as you can probably see.

121452025.content: You know I've been researching the basic structure of Bane Energy. Well, there are some unverified results that haven't been entered into the database yet. But you may take a look...

121452026.content: The sample you just collected looks like Bane Energy fused with another kind of energy. I've seen similar energy signatures when testing Bane Energy's corrosion on Divine Grace.

121452027.content: But these signatures only show up irregularly, and as of now I can't ascertain the source, nor can I reliably reproduce the conditions needed to trigger them...

121452028.content: Machine 2 has enough power! Don't use the mold as an real Access Key, because that will damage it. I don't care if Odin is rushing you...

121452029.content: ...In short, Admin, since Aether Gazer technology is incapable of controlling this energy, it's going to be very difficult to trace.

121452030.content: Once the Cryptics have finished this current project, I'll be able to look into this matter in more detail. With all this data you sent us, we'll probably be able to make some breakthroughs.

121452031.content: Right, I need to supervise this new mission from Odin now. Talk to you soon.

121452032.content: This is Heimdall, a technical expert from the Cryptics.

121452033.content: Heimdall is very thorough in her work, and her conclusions are usually reliable.

121452035.content: I've seen her before... About the force that rescued Gremory that day, Odin and I had no clue either. And it was untraceable, as expected.

121452036.content: If this turns out to be useful in her research into Bane Energy, it won't be a wasted trip.

121452037.content: Admin, take a look at this.

121452038.content: Ver uses her sword to gently pick something white up from the ground, and holds it up so Gengchen and I can see.

121452040.content: Yes. There's just this one, and it doesn't look like it's been used... What's a tissue doing up this mountain? Surely it wasn't just blown here by the wind.

121452041.content: The edges look like they've been pinched.

121452042.content: The scan is saying there are no fingerprints or active tissue traces... Was the person wearing gloves? It was used on something already clean? Or was it just dropped here?

121452043.content: People only take out a tissue when they're planning on using it.

121452044.content: I suddenly realize that Ver's statement is absolutely correct.

121452045.content: I think about my day-to-day life. Sometimes I might use a tissue to wipe a bit of dust off the table in my room, and afterward the tissue might look like it's never been used. But who would do that outdoors?

121452046.content: I'm a bit disappointed that a tissue is all we've managed to turn up, but it was unrealistic of me to hope that a Cognizant Visbane would leave us an obvious clue as to its presence.

121452049.content: Mimir was still searching for nearby signals. It sounds the alarm, interrupting Gengchen as she was about to open the Source Layer pathway.

121452050.content: SOS signal coming from the south-southeast! SOS signal coming from the south-southeast!

121452051.content: We run to the other side of the path and look in the direction indicated by Mimir. There is an abandoned town planted in the middle of a logistics route.

121462001.content: We eventually locate the source of the SOS signal.

121462002.content: A truck half-loaded with ore is stationed on the side of the road. The driver's door has been torn off and an arm is hanging limply out of the vehicle. On the floor lies a broken communicator.

121462005.content: Gengchen forms a black and white arrow in the air, and shoots it at the driver with a flick of the hand.

121462006.content: When the arrow is flung off, a plume of malevolent black mist surges from the driver's body, resisting Gengchen's attempt to stop the Bane corruption—but it's already too late.

121462007.content: Gengchen's arrow dissipates any Bane Energy it touches. The Encroacher Type and the corrupted body both disappear in a puff of jet-black smoke.

121462008.content: No more Bane Energy signal now.

121462009.content: The crumbling ruins are deathly silent. Not only has the Bane Energy disappeared, but so too have the people who sent us the SOS signal.

121462010.content: They were dead, devoured by the Visbanes, and their bodies have disappeared as though they had never existed. As though they were leaves that had already returned to the soil.

121462011.content: Was that the last one? If only we'd gotten here sooner...

121462012.content: There's no such thing as "if only." May his departed soul rest in peace.

121462014.content: Mimir, access the data on the truck's console and recorder.

121462015.content: Got it... Connection established, entering system... Hardware corrupted. Reading remaining data...

121462016.content: As I read the data Mimir is able to pull back, I shake my head at Gengchen and Ver with a sigh.

121462017.content: The console's been destroyed and Mimir can't find any matches. All we've got is a message from CORG and Tian Lu Traders that required the trucks to return.

121462018.content: Before we left this morning, I remember Khnum saying he wanted Luliang to pull back some team she had on the ground.

121462019.content: I thought the Visbanes we saw on Mount Jingdu were only because of Gremory's trickery, but it seems like it's dangerous everywhere on the ground...

121462020.content: Death hangs in the air. These poor people didn't die of disease or old age—they'd experienced true death.

121462021.content: Gaea grants humans an imperceptible privilege, and the Visbanes take it away before they even know it: The consciousness of anyone killed by a Visbane is unable to enter the Cycle.

121462022.content: We find a patch of land. Gengchen uses ink to carve a gravestone. But since we know nothing about the victims, the only thing she can write on it is today's date.

121462023.content: Once we've placed it securely in the ground, we stand silently before it.

121462024.content: "If only we'd gotten here sooner..." Although it had been Ver who uttered these words, I can tell Gengchen is thinking the exact same thing.

121462025.content: Holding a bunch of white chrysanthemums, she no longer looks like a strict chief of the Quad, but more like an ordinary young woman who's in mourning.

121462026.content:
When the color of the season fades, a swallow knows it's time to leave.
When the peace of the world is stained, we know it's time to grieve.

121462027.content:
If only we had the strength of the mountain, we might hold on to our true conviction.
But there are so many wrong paths in life, and no fixed destination.

121462028.content:
Undisturbed by honor or disgrace, now your worries have come to a cease.
May your thoughts soar toward the highest, while your soul rests in peace.

121462029.content:
But like the trees of four seasons, all lives shall be reborn anew.
For death has no permanence over life, and Xu Heng will always stand with you.

121462030.content: The mountain breeze blows Gengchen's hair and the wildflowers in her hand. As the last word of the eulogy falls, she gently closes her eyes.

121462031.content: I can't tell if what I can hear is the sound of the wind or Gengchen sighing.

121462032.content: Even though I'm searching too... I still believe that everyone who's lived in this world will leave their mark on it in some way.

121462033.content: Their souls may no longer be with us, but there will always be someone who remembers them.

121462035.content: In the end, that's all we can do. I remember every single person who's passed away in Xu Heng... Really passed away, I mean.

121462036.content: But that doesn't make death any easier to confront.

121462037.content: There are some things one should never get used to... I just hope there won't be any more people for you to remember like this.

121462039.content: Gengchen's eyes well up, and she bends down to place the white chrysanthemums on the grave.

121462040.content: After the ceremony, I notice Ver is staring blankly at the tombstone. I wave my hand in front of her eyes.

121462042.content: Huh? Oh, I was just thinking about that Quake in the Duskfall Area...

121462043.content: The Visbanes killed a lot of people then, and I remember reading the list of victims over and over again... but I've forgotten most of their names now.

121462044.content: Dwight Thomas, Glen Gregorio, Alexander Andersen... So many dead, and these are the only names I still remember.

121462046.content: I didn't know them, but the thought of them being lost forever still makes me sad.

121462047.content: We might have sat in the same train carriage once, watched the same movie, eaten in the same restaurant... I'll never have a chance of knowing.

121462048.content: And I can't help but think, even though I still remember the names now, the day will come when they fade from my memory. Maybe I'm just stupid...

121462049.content: Ver turns to me with a forced smile, as though she's the one trying to make me feel better. I gently stroke her head.

121462050.content: Let's promise to work even harder so you'll never need to have these kinds of regrets again.

121462051.content: I wanted to say that, but you'd look at me again as though I were a little kid.

121462052.content: Hey, what do you mean by "again...?"

121462053.content: With one final look back at the tombstone, Gengchen leads us to a clearing and opens the Source Layer pathway with a swipe of her hand.

121462054.content: You're right. Even if something is impossible to achieve, that shouldn't stop us from trying.

121462055.content: It proves that we're not confined by ourselves, and that we are changing this world for the better.

121462056.content: Something that's impossible to achieve... You mean like ridding the world of Visbanes?

121462057.content: Maybe Odin will give you the answer someday.

121462058.content: Gengchen shakes her head and is about to step into the Source Layer pathway when she suddenly stops and gazes at the distant plains beyond the mountain.

121462059.content: We feel the tremor beneath our feet from dozens of kilometers away, as the shadow cast across the plains gets smaller and smaller. Our senses react faster than our minds do, but we know instinctively what has just happened.

121462060.content: Please tell me that was a hologram or something.

121462061.content: The shockwave from the impact answers Ver's question.

121462062.content: The rumbling is so loud it shakes our bones, and the ensuing dust cloud blots out the sun. The vast plains are rippling like water.

121471001.content: That's what happened to the exploration team. We would appreciate you cooperating with the Quad in compensating the injured parties.

121471002.content: Tian Lu Traders will continue to fulfill its responsibility as long as it exists. Besides, CORG and I issued a joint recall notice, but we didn't dispatch any escort teams. That was a neglection on our part.

121471003.content: I can't believe you and the Aether Gazer visitors were there when it happened... So you must have seen the rock bed fly up and crash back down again. Luckily no one was working in the vicinity when it happened.

121471004.content: I think it's time you came clean with me, Mantou. How much has the Astral Engine's field actually weakened?

121471005.content: ...Beyond the five isles, by 30%. Beyond the Old Town, by 50%.

121471006.content: That much? And I thought I was being pessimistic.

121471007.content: That rock bed was half the size of Yu Jing. It's been a long time since something that big has risen into the air.

121471008.content: Fifty years ago, the rock bed wouldn't have been torn apart like that. The problem with the Cloudsong Ore's gravity coefficient is getting worse.

121471009.content: It's terrible news, but I'm not at all surprised... It's not like Gaea began giving us problems just yesterday.

121471010.content: How's it going with the Heterocore?

121471011.content: Mengzhang won't stop until he's succeeded. Besides, it's no use rushing over something like that.

121471012.content: Yeah, but people need answers now. It'll take less than half an hour for news this big to travel the whole of Yu Jing.

121471013.content: Everyone was already fired up about what happened last night, and Khnum couldn't resist coming to Tian Lu Traders this morning to fan the flames. This latest incident is going to pour even more fuel on the fire.

121471014.content: I'm sorry for the trouble this is causing you.

121471015.content: What trouble? I've already said everything there is to say in Tian Lu Traders over the years.

121471016.content: But things are different now, Mantou. Very different... When it comes to the Astral Engine, you're the only person anyone will listen to.

121471017.content: I'm traveling back to Yu Jing, but I've heard about what's been happening at the Quad. We should meet with everyone and reassure them.

121471018.content: The communication ends and the screen cuts out. Gengchen gazes at a paperweight on her desk, then lifts her head as though she's come to a decision.

121471020.content: Wait, chief... There are CORG people out there as well as civilians. If we're going to discuss something, better if we do it in here?

121471021.content: Jianbing is keeping watch outside. It'll be alright.

121471022.content: Just a discussion. We don't need to call in the big guns.

121471024.content: As for you two, the Quad and Tian Lu Traders are eternally grateful for all the help you've given us.

121471025.content: Port Carp is about to get very busy. I'd advise you return to Ain Soph sooner rather than later.

121471026.content: Ver shoots me a pleading look. I sigh and shake my head at her, then turn to Gengchen and smile.

121471027.content: Odin has eyes and ears everywhere. If we don't go back now, she'll find out and come to force us back herself.

121471028.content: Since we're all leaving now anyway, we may as well accompany you.

121471029.content: Judging from the noise, there must be over a hundred people outside the door. That amount of whispering builds up to form a blanket of constant noise that spills over the wall and into the Quad grounds.

121471030.content: When the person those voices are waiting for suddenly opens the door, the noise recedes like a wave falling back into the sea.

121471032.content: Have you said anything to them?

121471033.content: Just told them to wait for you. They know the rules.

121471034.content: Good... Luliang is about to head out to put a stop to all activity on the ground. I want you to pick a team to go with her.

121471035.content: Jianbing accepts the task, but doesn't look like he has any intention of leaving; instead, he leans against the wall with his arms folded. Gengchen surveys the crowd who have gathered in the square, and seems to lost in thoughts.

121471036.content: She steps forward, across the shadow of the doorframe: the only thing separating her from the waiting crowd.

121471037.content: Young and old, rich and poor, angry and frightened... Hundreds of faces look at her, all different yet all similar.

121471038.content: The crowd falls silent as all eyes stare at the only person who can give them answers, or simply waiting for Gengchen to say something.

121471039.content: Yet she says nothing. She looks at the nearby individuals wearing CORG uniforms, and slowly places her right back behind her back. As she walks past me, I notice that she slightly clenches her fist.

121471040.content: Chief Gengchen. And... our Aether Gazer friends. It's nice to see you again.

121471042.content: (Whispering) There are so many people here, Admin. Do you think we should wait to make sure Gengchen's alright and that everyone has gone before we leave?

121471043.content: (Whispering) Yeah. It wouldn't be right to just walk away from a situation like this, especially without seeing what CORG is going to do.

121471045.content: You know full well that everyone is here for the same thing. They deserve honesty and transparency, and that's what they're going to get.

121471046.content: ...Fine by me. What we have to discuss doesn't concern state secrets after all.

121471047.content: The Quad has been responsible for managing the Astral Engine for decades now, all without incident. No one thought they'd see the day that the ground would be torn apart beneath their feet.

121471048.content: We don't know exactly how the Astral Engine works. Nor do we know exactly what's wrong with it now. But something of this importance needs an explanation.

121471049.content: We don't want to hear about theories and what-ifs. We want solid answers...

121471050.content: Khnum pauses to turn back and survey the crowd behind him, as though he wants to make sure everybody is listening. However, it could also be to give Gengchen time to formulate her response.

121471051.content: Can the Astral Engine and Cloudsong Ore be repaired, or are we at risk of experiencing a second Cloudsong Crisis?

121471052.content: Nobody in the crowd speaks, their silence the most eloquent endorsement of Khnum's words.

121471054.content: Jianbing frowns as Gengchen appears to stumble over her words, and shakes his head. Mengzhang still needs time, and time is what Xu Heng needs most of all. What everyone needs right now is a firm promise to reboost their confidence.

121471055.content: After all, plans of evacuating Xu Heng are already underway, and the worst-case scenario is seeing them reach a full conclusion...

121471056.content: But Jianbing is shaking his head because he knows what Gengchen will choose to do, and he knows that nothing will make her change her mind even if she did see his sign of objection.

121471057.content: We need time to stabilize the Astral Engine, and the Quad cannot guarantee that we will succeed.

121471058.content: Still not a sound from the crowd. But their expressions are slowly replaced by the same fear and disbelief, and before long the silence is broken.

121471059.content: Cannot guarantee... What are the chances of success?

121471060.content: Everything's been fine for decades, why are things suddenly going wrong now?

121471061.content: Chief Gengchen, should we evacuate? Is the Cloudsong Crisis not actually over yet?

121471062.content: Disparate voices all begin clamoring for attention as their emotions begin to rollercoaster, trying to find somewhere to settle and unify.

121471063.content: Gengchen remains quiet, with something like apology in her eyes, as she waits for the crowd to vent its emotions. But not everyone is willing to accept this taciturn response.

121471064.content: The Astral Engine is still running and the Quad has given you its honest answer. What more do you want? Would you have rather Gengchen gave you fake excuses?

121471065.content: And let's not forget everything the Quad has done for Xu Heng over the years. What would be the point in embarrassing them over this now?

121471067.content: I came out here to find a solution, not to waste time on meaningless speculation.

121471068.content: Ver and I look at Khnum in surprise. We weren't expecting this cold, corporate CORG Modifier to stand up for the Quad in this matter.

121471069.content: The public still holds the mysterious CORG in high regard, and Khnum's intervention is enough to quiet the crowd. Silence returns, but this time with a sense of practicality and calmness as the truth has been accepted.

121471070.content: Do you have any other information that's worth telling us?

121471072.content: But there is something else I want to say to you all.

121471073.content: Gengchen descends the steps in front of the door, and turns back to look up at the plaque affixed to the beam.

121471074.content: "The Quad." This plaque has been renewed several times in the decades, and yet it has never changed.

121471075.content: Gengchen still remembers the first time it was put up here as if it were yesterday.

121471076.content: When the Quad was first established, they faced a similar situation to the one we face now.

121471077.content: The land was cracking and cities were tumbling. It was when the Cloudsong Crisis was at its worst.

121471078.content: Everyone gathered here and asked: Will this disaster ever end?

121471079.content: She turns back to face the crowd, her silent, ocean-deep strength already recovered.

121471080.content: But we did not promise anything for the future, because we were not able to.

121471081.content: What we could do, and what we still can do, is to try. To never stop trying until we reach a situation that you all can accept.

121471082.content: So now, like in the past, I cannot give you answers.

121471083.content: All we can promise is that the Quad was created to serve the people, and we will never forget that.

121471084.content: The Quad will exist for as long as Xu Heng does.

121471085.content: After the crowd has dispersed, Luliang comes running into the Quad. She greets us briefly, then pulls Gengchen into another room.

121471086.content: Ver and I decide to leave them to it. I know the situation is already bad enough as it is, and they surely are facing more problems than I do.

121471087.content: I didn't think there would be anyone left to escort us to Port Carp, until someone unexpected appears to see us off.

121471088.content: Chief Khnum, you're not from Xu Heng either, are you?

121471090.content: Ah, I've heard of that Sephirah Zone, but I've never been there.

121471091.content: Are you taking the photon rail back home too?

121471092.content: That's actually part of my job. I'm responsible for arranging all district transfers for this evacuation.

121471093.content: You guys already have a photon rail pass. Why didn't you leave this morning?

121471094.content: We had something to take care of first.

121471095.content: Oh really? I knew the Quad were short-staffed, but I didn't expect that they needed to rope outsiders in to help them.

121471096.content: I know the Admin and I are technically outsiders, but it still sounds weird to call us that... We're all Mods after all. We're supposed to help each other.

121471097.content: Wait, how do you know the Quad is short-staffed?

121471098.content: CORG has been working closely with the Quad for some time now, and I can see their people are overworked.

121471099.content: What did you help them with? Don't you have the same feeling as well?

121471101.content: Khnum asks no more questions, and simply nods his head.

121471102.content: Mr. Khnum, I must say I was in awe when I saw you quiet down the crowd back there.

121471103.content: I always thought you were against Ms. Gengchen and Ms. Luliang. Sorry for the misunderstanding.

121471104.content: We have different points of view, that's all. There's no bad blood between us.

121471105.content: So what's your mission? Do you also believe the Quad is incapable of fixing the Astral Engine?

121471106.content: What I think makes no difference. We all have our own job to do.

121471107.content: Gengchen and Luliang were born in Xu Heng, and they want to keep it going until the very end... even if it means watching their homeland burn. I can understand it, but I cannot agree to it.

121471108.content: The Modifiers were created by Gaea. If they want to try and resist its inherent flaws, the only thing they can rely on is courage, nothing else.

121471109.content: Created by Gaea... Sure, even though that's the case, that's not what we go around thinking.

121471110.content: Mr. Khnum, do you feel like you're one of Gaea's creations?

121471112.content: Khnum stops dead in his tracks. I don't know if it's because of Ver's question or something else.

121471113.content: He doesn't move for a few seconds, then shakes his head at us before abruptly turning and walking in the opposite direction of Port Carp.

121471114.content: Something's come up. Will you be able to get to the port on your own?

121471115.content: He leaves without giving us time to answer. Ver and I look at each other in shared astonishment.

121471116.content: Is he really leaving just like that?

121471117.content: He's been wearing his tactical goggles this whole time, maybe he received an urgent message or something... What, have you thought of something?

121471119.content: You always scratch your head and have that look on your face when you've got something to say but aren't sure whether you should say it or not. Surely you know that by now.

121471120.content: Oh, I was just thinking about what he said. Protecting Xu Heng until its destruction must be hard, even for someone like Gengchen.

121471121.content: So what, do you want to stay even longer?

121471123.content: Think about it—we helped retrieve the Heterocore, so we should stay to make sure it actually works, right?

121471124.content: And Mr. Khnum said the Quad are short-staffed. I'd personally like to see this thing out. Even if one extra person only makes a little difference, just think how it would affect the result if everyone came together.

121471125.content: And what if the Sephirah Zone actually is destroyed? How guilty would we feel seeing it on the news in Ain Soph, knowing that we didn't do everything we could to stop it?

121471127.content: Really? You want to stay longer?

121471128.content: Port Carp, the biggest aerial port in Xu Heng is also where the Yu Jing Photon Rail Station is located. It's hard to believe it was only five days ago Ver and I first arrived here.

121471129.content: After some hesitation, we decide to call Odin from outside the port. However, hearing us explain our reasons for wanting to stay out loud, I can't help but feel this act of disobedience is somewhat impulsive.

121471130.content: But when I see Ver's clenched fists and the keen expectancy with which she awaits Odin's answer, I realize that if we went back in time I'd still choose to do this again.

121471131.content: It's been half an hour since the news reports of a giant floating rock in Xu Heng.

121471132.content: And it's been nine hours since I ordered the two of you to return to Ain Soph.

121471134.content: I sent you there to take a vacation, but I guess you must have accidentally followed Gengchen into a Visbane den while you were shopping for souvenirs.

121471135.content: And now you're telling me you want to stay even longer.

121471136.content: We're sorry, Ms. Odin, but I feel like this is something I need to do...

121471138.content: Odin's voice grows louder, forcing Ver to be quiet. Just as we think she's about to explode with rage, we hear her chuckle on the other end of the communicator.

121471139.content: Hehe, you've only been in Xu Heng a few days and you're already starting to sound like Gengchen.

121471140.content: Okay, I'll stop joking around. It was only a matter of time before you'd start thinking for yourself.

121471142.content: But I do NOT want to hear any stories of you two running off to capture the Cognizant Visbane by yourselves. And don't make Gengchen's life more difficult than it already is.

121471143.content: Your tourist visas will have expired by now, so you'll have to say you're journalists. If anything happens in Xu Heng while you're there, especially anything involving the Quad and CORG, I want to know about it.

121471144.content: And I want to know about it as soon as it happens. Understood?

121481001.content: Ah, where's the teapot? I need a drink of warm water.

121481004.content: Luliang's eyes widen as she swallows the boiling water, and exclaims as it burns its way down her throat. Feeling the mouth on fire, she snatches the cup of cold water Gengchen quickly hands over to her.

121481005.content: With the two inside, Gengchen's single office room strangely seems more spacious instead of more crowded.

121481006.content: Ooh, I forgot you drink your tea scalding hot... Is Lingguang not here?

121481007.content: We're short-staffed, so everyone has a lot on their plates at the moment.

121481008.content: How's the situation on the ground?

121481009.content: Word about the rock bed has gotten out. Everyone nearby is hurrying to get away without any ushering from me.

121481010.content: The real problem is that other small hills and mounds are also beginning to come loose. I'm worried they might crash into Yu Jing due to inertia.

121481011.content: I'm going down to the ground myself if Yu Jing's existence were at stake.

121481012.content: Huh? You're not thinking of doing what you did before the Astral Engine was built, are you? Using Divine Power to restrict all those ley lines...

121481013.content: Then we'll just have to wait for Mengzhang...

121481014.content: No, absolutely not! You'll be on the ground for too long that way, right at the time Yu Jing needs you the most.

121481015.content: You're worrying too much. CORG has deployed heavy particle cannons around the borders of the five isles. If something does look like it's about to crash into us, they'll shoot it down.

121481016.content: Particle cannons? Who's in charge of them?

121481017.content: Khnum, of course. You know how much authority he has, now that the evacuation plan has been put into effect. And half of the particle cannons have been positioned in the port area, which falls under his jurisdiction.

121481018.content: CORG sure isn't taking any chances this time. Still, they're helping us. Our people have bigger things to take care of...

121481019.content: That supplies team you came across this morning isn't the only one that ran into trouble. We lost contact with a lot of teams on their way back to the Old Town. Some of them we found, others weren't so lucky.

121481020.content: Was it Visbanes or the Cloudsong Ore?

121481021.content: Probably both. We're getting lots of Bane Energy reactions scattered on the ground, and everyone's running around like headless chickens. Nothing major though.

121481022.content: Around 70% of our people has been sent out to retrieve our teams and assets down there. I'll check on them when they all get back.

121481023.content: And I guess you don't need me to tell you about the Cloudsong Ore? You know the changes in the Astral Engine field better than anyone... That mission of yours has failed, too. The Cloudsong Ore down that pit causes violent tremors whenever it's exposed to light. I need to dispatch people to go reinforce the mountain.

121481024.content: Oh, and the AGI Mechas. Mengzhang said there are lots of scrap mechas on Mount Jingdu, but they'd all gone by the time Yingzhao got there. The ones she did find had all been corroded by Bane Energy. Took us a lot of effort to take them down.

121481025.content: Phew. I guess that's all. Anyways, they do say bad things tend to come in threes.

121481026.content: It feels like someone is conspiring against us.

121481028.content: Too bad there are so many mountains and rivers and the Source Layer out there—if Gremory is determined to avoid detection, there are plenty of hiding places to choose from. Not to mention the other guy you said about...

121481029.content: There's so much to deal with, and everyone is snowed under with work... Oh yes, I almost forgot what I came here for.

121481030.content: Luliang takes an old wooden photo frame out of her bag and hands it to Gengchen.

121481031.content: There wasn't anyone available to run this errand for me, and I didn't dare trust it to the drones. The photo frame is delicate, and quite old...

121481032.content: Gengchen's eyes lighten up as she sees the photo in the frame. She strokes the long-lost face of her friend, as well as her old self standing awkwardly beside her.

121481033.content: They're standing in front of a train station sign, with the town streets winding out behind them towards the endless countryside.

121481035.content: Don't mention it. There always should be someone to remember the past at least.

121481036.content: The Mount Jingdu has been cleaned up, and all of the workshop equipment will be back up skywards in the next day or so. It's all in good condition. Where are you planning on sending it? Yuyi Isle?

121481037.content: Mengzhang says he doesn't need it. I might send it to Shuofang Isle so Zhiming can use it after she comes back.

121481038.content:
Alright.
That's enough chit-chatting. I should be getting back...

121481039.content: Oh yeah, will CORG be sending anyone else out to help us? If they're going to be stingy, then the stuff on the ground is going to have to wait. The security of the five isles is our top priority.

121481040.content: And the Astral Engine is the key to that. If there's any progress with the Heterocore, you should let everyone know as soon as possible to calm their nerves.

121481041.content: Hmm... I'll go and ask Mengzhang.

121481042.content: As she watches Luliang leave, Gengchen sees a look of surprise and confusion cross her face just before the door closes.

121481044.content: Gengchen waits a moment after the door closes, but nobody knocks. She thinks no more of it, and sits back at her desk as she dials a number.

121481045.content: Chief? Are we going to use it now? I know what's going on, I've been keeping up with the news.

121481046.content: There's no rush. But our people need a deadline.

121481047.content: Time.... Indeed, CORG would need it. And so would the civilians...

121481048.content: It's fine if you can't give one.

121481049.content: No... The Heterocore itself shouldn't be a problem. I've pretty much figured it out.

121481050.content: Before the Astral Engine was built, Zhu once told me that we may just need a "medium" that can solve the problem of computing power overload.

121481051.content: Back then, the "medium" only existed in theory. After all, it is something that supersedes the laws of Gaea.

121481052.content: It's hard to imagine something like that, right? That's what Zhiming said after months of furious calculations. So unless something else is wrong with Gaea...

121481053.content:
Zhiming's told me about this.
Do you have any clue what the medium could be?

121481054.content: For a long time there's no answer, just the sound of Mengzhang's breath as though he's about to start talking, then thinks better of it.

121481055.content: If you've got something to say, just say it... We're talking about the fate of Xu Heng here, Mengzhang.

121481056.content: I... If there is more time, I may be able to come up with something I'm more confident about. That, and a little luck. But time is running out...

121481057.content: And...? Speak, we can worry about the consequences later.

121481058.content: ...I found a research log before we took the Heterocore from Zhu's workshop. There are some pretty old notes in there that no one has seen before...

121481059.content: Chief, do you still have it? The thing you showed me the day after we returned from Mount Jingdu?

121481060.content: Port Carp. A constant stream of people are moving up and down an engineering passage here that's normally hardly ever used.

121481061.content: Teams are flooding back to Yu Jing, but there's none of the atmosphere that usually accompanies a triumphant return home. Instead, snatches of whispered conversations betray an overwhelming sense of confusion and doubt.

121481062.content: Should we report the situation here to Odin?

121481063.content: Let's note it down for now.

121481064.content: Isn't she expecting a bit too much from two amateur journalists to report on everything the Quad and CORG are doing?

121481065.content: Hey, does this count as the Quad's movement?

121481066.content: Ver tugs on my sleeve. I follow the direction of her gaze, and see someone striding into the engineering passage.

121481067.content: As though he can feel our eyes on him, the man turns to look at us. His pace slows, and then he begins walking over to us.

121481068.content: What are you still doing here? Is there a problem with the photon rail?

121481069.content: No no, we just wanted to stay behind to help. We'll leave once the Astral Engine is stable again.

121481070.content: ...Something tells me this wasn't a spur-of-the-moment decision.

121481071.content: But it's true that we're short-staffed at the moment, and both chief and the boss are run off their feet. I'd like to thank you for your kind offer of assistance.

121481072.content: Now that all the teams are coming back, what are you off to do?

121481073.content: To investigate some things that can't be entrusted to anyone else. I've always hated sitting back and doing nothing.

121481074.content: I don't think the boss is free at the moment. You can head to the Quad and have a cup of tea first.

121481075.content: Alright. Best of luck in your investigations.

121481076.content: Sensing that Jianbing doesn't want to spend too long talking to us, we bid him farewell and walk away.

121481077.content: Probably both. We're getting lots of Bane Energy reactions scattered on the ground, and everyone's running around like headless chickens. Nothing major though.

121481079.content: Too bad there are so many mountains and rivers and the Source Layer out there—if Gremory is determined to avoid detection, there are plenty of hiding places to choose from. Not to mention the other guy you said about...

121481081.content: Scared, huh? Maybe you should hide better.

121481082.content: If you move, you'll leave traces. Even if they're misleading, there'll be a grain of truth in there, and I will find you sooner or later...

121481083.content: Jianbing scrutinizes the surrounding ruins as he follows the weak Bane Energy trace.

121481084.content: An entire afternoon of searching has led him to this area. But knowing that the hardest part is always at the end, he chooses not to go any further at this moment.

121481085.content: These scratches and crystal dust... An AGI Mecha?

121481086.content: Huh? What an outdated trip alarm. But the more primitive they are, the harder they are to spot. Interesting...

121481087.content: Spotting tightly-knit rows of thin lines on the ground, barely discernible to the naked eye, Jianbing smirks to himself and lightly jumps over them onto the ruined blocks of the buildings.

121481089.content: The sound of constant hammering and tinkering can be heard coming from deep within the ruins. Jianbing climbs to the highest point and looks in the direction the sound is coming from.

121481091.content: He spies a large clearing framed by steep trenches, with rocks and mud scattered along their edges. From his vantage point, he can see dozens of AGI Mechas digging downwards in the ditches.

121481092.content: AGI Mechas... The ones that attacked Linyu in the Old Town... Not doing a good job of keeping a low profile, are you?

121481093.content: Jianbing waits a few minutes to make sure his presence hasn't been noticed. Seeing no change in the behavior of the "construction site" workers, he takes out his Access Key. It quickly transforms from a Chinese podao into a large bow in his hand.

121481094.content: He aims the bow at the distant trip alarm, as Divine Grace confluences through the bow to the tip of his fingers. The Access Key emits a low tiger roar that causes the building to shake beneath his feet.

121481095.content: It's rude not to greet your guest, you know?

121481096.content: He releases the string, and a Divine Grace arrow crashes down onto the ground like meteor. The explosion sends earth, rocks and dust into the air, shattering the already-ruined street.

121481097.content: As expected, no sirens are triggered. However, Jianbing sees the AGI Mechas climb out of their trenches and quickly activate their weapon systems.

121481098.content: As this is going on, a surprised-looking man in a bowler hat comes running out of an unassuming shack.

121481100.content: Quick, you lumps of scrap metal! Go and check!

121481101.content: The gray-skinned man's hands glimmer with Bane Energy. The surfaces of the AGI Mechas glow red in response, and they all dash over to the crater created by Jianbing's arrow.

121481102.content: Damn it... Gotta get out of here...

121481103.content: Just as he's about to open a Source Layer pathway, his expression suddenly grows frightened and he backs away, desperately trying to reinforce the Bane Energy shield in front of him.

121481104.content: A second Divine Grace arrow crash-lands into the newly opened pathway. The disrupted energy waves force the man to retreat even further back.

121481105.content: Before he's able to steady himself, something slams into his back like a truck and almost sends him flying into one of the trenches. He looks around in wild confusion.

121481107.content: Despite his blurred vision, the man can make out Jianbing casually approaching him with a massive blade. He stifles a cry, but his eyes flash wildly as though seeing an apparition.

121481108.content: Wow, you know me? But I don't know you... Why don't we introduce ourselves before we have a nice little chat?

121481109.content: You're not the one I was waiting for...

121481110.content: Oh, are you expecting company? That'll save me having to go out and look for them.

121481111.content: Just as the man climbs clumsily to his feet, Jianbing take two menacing steps forward. The stranger instinctively steps back, and nearly slips down into the trench.

121481112.content: I think it's time you start answering my questions.

121481113.content: Wh-What do you want to know?

121481114.content: Don't make me ask a second time...

121481115.content: The man's eyes flash and he lowers his head in confusion. His right arm is bent at an unnatural angle, and there's a pain, sharp. He begins to shake.

121481117.content: Forget it. You're so weak I don't care who you are.

121481118.content: Why don't you tell me where your master is instead?

121481119.content: Hahaha! you think you're so strong, don't you? Let me tell you, without your "Chief", Xu Heng would be nothing but maggots... Urgh!

121481120.content: An uppercut to the stomach sends the man flying, before the smack of a palm against his back sends him back towards the ground.

121481121.content: Just as his head is about to hit the floor, Jianbing grabs him and plants him back on his feet. He sneers at the man trembling in fear.

121481123.content: Jianbing pats the man's broken arm as he readjusts the bowler hat on his head.

121481124.content: A loyal dog must always consider his master's reputation. It's not a pretty sight if he only agrees to speak when he's begging for mercy on his knees.

121481125.content: Of course, you can think about how much pain you're willing to take for your master later, while we're on our way back to Yu Jing.

121481126.content: Wh-what do you want from me?

121481127.content: Gremory, the one who rescued her, what have you got planned up your sleeves... You know well what I'm interested in.

121481129.content: This time the man cannot suppress a howl as his left arm is also snapped.

121481130.content: My patience has limits. You know who Gremory is. I want to hear it from you, rather than just figure it out from your reactions.

121481131.content: I'll give you one more chance. I know you're stalling, and you can continue to do so if you don't mind dying... But I have to warn you, it's going to get a lot more painful from here on in.

121481132.content: ...If I tell you, do you promise not to kill me?

121481133.content: I'd at least give you a clean death.

121481134.content: Then we have nothing to discuss. I don't plan on dying here today...

121481135.content: Jianbing glances at the man and says nothing. Without warning, he smashes the blade into the man's skull with a loud crack. Throwing the man's body aside, he looks up at the sky impassively.

121481136.content: At almost the same time, a powerful wave of Bane Energy surges out of the trench, cracking the sky above it like a spiderweb and forming a dome over the area.

121481137.content: Jianbing hears a weak yet manic laughter coming from the fallen man, as the air is filled with the roar of countless Visbanes. They ambush him from all sides within seconds.

121482001.content: Jianbing can't tell how long the battle lasts, but Visbanes continue to pour through the cracks in the sky, and they get stronger as time goes by.

121482002.content: What's worse is that the Bane Energy dome is slowly shrinking, and through the cracks Jianbing can see the Source Layer. However, he's forced to stand in the same spot, unable to approach the regenerating Cognizant Visbane.

121482003.content: No reinforcements arrive. This makes Jianbing realize that the area must be sealed out from the outside world somehow.

121482004.content: After hacking down a five-meter tall Visbane, Jianbing risks a glance at the man behind this all, who has retreated a safe distance away.

121482005.content: How cheaply you value the lives of your fellow creatures.

121482006.content: He fires an arrow straight through the middle of the swarming Visbanes in the sky above him, burning a hole right through them. Unfortunately, it takes just seconds for Bane Energy to slither in to take their place.

121482007.content: Your tactics are so lowbrow I can't even enjoy the battle.

121482008.content: You should be thinking more about how to get out of this alive!

121482009.content: This little gift wasn't even meant for you. But if you willingly throw yourself head-first into a trap, who am I to stop you?

121482010.content: It is a gift indeed. And I'm already thinking of what I can give you in return.

121482011.content: My longest battle so far lasted for seven days. How long are you planning on this one?

121482013.content: If you don't have the guts, you might as well just run away now. Don't say I didn't warn you.

121482015.content: The man in the bowler hat slowly backs away from Jianbing, towards the edge of the clearing.

121482016.content: Fan of big scenes, aren't you?

121482017.content: However many days and nights this lasts, I hope you enjoy it! I have other matters I must attend to.

121482018.content: The cracks in the sky and on the ground suddenly merge together to form one enormous fissure, swallowing Jianbing and countless Visbanes into its void.

121482020.content: When Jianbing's finally disappeared, the man in the bowler hat clasps his head and takes a few deep breaths.

121482021.content: Not sure if I'll be able to mimic again... I can't take that risk.

121482022.content: There's always someone who shows up to ruin my plans!

121482023.content: It's almost time, it's almost time...

121482024.content: He mumbles to himself while straightening his hat, then limps away from the ruins.

121482025.content: The winners in the end will be us...

121491001.content: Chief Gengchen, the last lot of researchers and station staff from the Ocean Observatory have just arrived in the Old Town.

121491002.content: Excellent. Thank you for your hard work.

121491003.content: Luliang and Lingguang have spoken very highly of you two. Your assistance has facilitated the recall operation immensely.

121491004.content: Hehe, the Admin did most of the hard work.

121491005.content: Being an administrator with the Division Nine General Office does give me some useful skills in tasks such as this.

121491006.content: Photon rail will be sending its first train to Ain Soph and Neuhansa this afternoon. Are you two planning on going back?

121491009.content: In that case, the departure time we set the day before yesterday is still valid.

121491010.content: I see. The most urgent matters have all been taken care of now. Everyone's workload is much lighter than it was before.

121491011.content: Lingguang will arrange your schedules. You may take the morning off, then in the afternoon go with her to Port Carp and supervise the first batch of departures.

121491012.content: Understood. We'll stand down until then.

121491013.content: (Whispering) "Stand down"? You're talking like the Xu Heng natives already.

121491015.content: After seeing #{nickname}# and Verthandi out, Gengchen pours herself a cup of scalding tea.

121491016.content: She takes a sip, chewing gently on the tea leaves until the warmth has covered her entire mouth, before finally swallowing.

121491018.content: She finishes her tea, then begins scribbling something down in her notepad. Ten minutes later, she is interrupted by a call request on her communicator.

121491021.content: Luliang's voice sounds out both inside and outside the room at the same time. Gengchen smiles as she opens the door.

121491022.content: A paper bag is held triumphantly up to Gengchen's face. A spicy yet delicious aroma wafts out.

121491023.content: Luliang's face peeps round from behind the bag, wearing a sly smile.

121491024.content: The "Good Fortune Skewers" from the Old Bai's. It's been ages since I've had time to go and line up for them. You haven't had them in a while, right?

121491025.content:
Yes. Thanks.
Did you only get the extra spicy ones?

121491026.content: Of course not! When have you ever known me to deny myself anything?
